1b1('bum): na smyargyu gar skad du/shwA ta sa ts+tsha sl-i ka pradz+nyo pA ra mo t+ma/dod
1b2('bum): skad du/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/glegs
1b3('bum): bam thog ma/bram po dang po//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus
1b4('bum): gcig na/bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi ri/bya rgod 'phungs
2a1('bum): /pa la/dge slong lnga stong tsam gyi dge sbyong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /thabs cig ste/thams cad
2a2('bum): kyang dgra bcom pa/zag pa zad pa/nyon mongs pa med pa/dbang du gyur pa/sems shin tu rnam par grol
2a3('bum): ba/shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/cung shes pa/glang po chen po/bya ba byas pa/byed pa byis pa
2a4('bum): khur bor bya/rang gi don rab tu thob pa/srid par kun tu sbyor ba/yongs su zad pa/byaka' yang dag pas
2a5('bum): sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/sems kyi dbang thams cad la/pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob pa sha stag
2b1('bum): ste/gang zag gcig ma gtogs pa ni/'di ltar slob pa rgyun du zhugs pa/tshe dang ldan pa dka' bo'o//dge slong ma glags 'dzin
2b2('bum): dang /skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo la sogs pa lnga brgya tsam dang /dge bsnyen pa dang /dge bsnyen ma dang /shin tu meng ba kun kyang /
2b3('bum): chos mthong ba shra stag dang /byang chub sems dpe'i sems dpa' chen po/tshad med grangs med pa thams cad kyang gzungs rab tu
2b4('bum): thob pa/ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob po/stong pa nyid kyis rnam par spyod pa/mtshan ma med pa'i spyod yul can/rtog pa med pa'i smon lam
2b5('bum): dang ldan pa/chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi bzod pa rab tu thob pa/thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa/bstan pa zud mi
2b6('bum): shes pa la so so yang dag par rig pa'i tshul khong du chud pa/mngon par shes pa chen pos rnam par rtse ba/mngon par shes pa shin tu
3b1('bum): pa dang ldan pa/thog mar smra ba/khro gnyer med pa/snyan cing 'jam pa'i tshig dang ldan pa/pha rol la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs su brjod pa la mkhas
3b2('bum): pA/spobs pa mi chod pa/'khor mtha' yas pa zil gyis garlon pa'i mi 'jigs pa dang ldan pa/bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas par bstan pa'i ye shes
3b3('bum): kyis 'byung ba la mkhas pa/chos thams cad sgyu ma dang /smig rgyu dang /chu zla dang /rmi lem dang /sgra brnyan dang /mig yor dang /nam mkha' dang //
3b4('bum): dri za'i grong khyer dang /sprul pa dang /gzugs brnyan lta bur khong du chud pa/sems yongs su zhum pa med pa/sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud
3b5('bum): dang /shes pa phra ba dang /spyod pa dang /mos pa khong du chud par bya ba la mkhas pa/sems can thams cad la sdang ba med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/
3b6('bum): bzod pa rlabs chen po dang ldan pa/chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs par bya ba'i ye shes la mkhas pa/chos nyid zab mo dang ldan pas gting dpag
3b7('bum): dka' ba/rang gi sems la dbang rab tu thob pa/chos thams cad la dbang shin tu thob pa/las dang /nyon mongs pa dang /lta ba'i sgrib pa thams cad
4a1('bum): /las rnam par grol ba/brten pa rtogs par bstan pa la mkhas pa/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i tshul zad mi shes pa la bzhugs pa/
4a2('bum): lta ba dang /bag la nyal ba dang /kun nas ldang ba thams cad dang bral ba/kun tu sbyor ba thams cad spangs pa/las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu
4a3('bum): zhi bar bya ba la mkhas pa/bden pa rab tu rtogs par bya ba'i ye shes la mkhasdu pa/chos thams cad sgra brnyan dang 'dra bar rtag tu rgyun mi chad par mos pa/
4a4('bum): chos kyi tshul bstan pa tshad med pa la 'jigs pa med pa/bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud par bya ba la mkhas pa/sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas
4a5('bum): pa rnam par dgod pa'i smon lam gyis 'gro ba yongs su zin pa/'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa ni bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin
4a6('bum): rtag tu rgyun mi chad par mngon du gyur pa/sangs rgyas byung ba thams cad du nye bar 'gro ba la mkhas pa/sangs rgyas dpag tu med bye la gsol ba gdab par
4a7('bum): mkhas pa/sems can gyi lta ba sna tshogs kyis yongs su bskyed pa'i nyon mongs pa zhi bar bya ba la mkhas pa/ting nge 'dzin brgya stong mngon par bsgrub pa
4b1('bum): la rnam par rtse ba'i ye shes rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa/yon tan brjod pa bskal pa mtha' yas par mi zad pa dang ldan pa sha stag dang thabs cig ste/'di ltar
4b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen 'byung gnas dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems
4b3('bum): dpa' chen po rin chen snying po dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen byin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ded dpon dam pa
4b4('bum): dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skyes bus byin dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skyob sbed dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems
4b5('bum): dpa' chen po chu bdag lha dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang pos byin dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang po'i stobs dang /
4b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros dam pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i blo gros dang /byang chub sems
4b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros 'phel ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
5a1('bum): chen po don yod mthong ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib med blo gros dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
5a2('bum): rab tu zhugs pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu dam pas rnam par gnon pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson
5a3('bum): 'grus mtha' yas dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu brtson pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu sbyor ba dang /byang
5a4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi gtong brtson pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i snying po dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems
5a5('bum): dpa' chen po zla ba'i snying po dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros dpe med pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po spyan ras gzigs
5a6('bum): kyi dbang po dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen po thob pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhan nur gyur pa
5a7('bum): dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud kyi stobs rab tu 'joms pa dong /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje blo gros dang /bya
5b1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin chen phyag rgya dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu lag brkyang dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems
5b2('bum): dpe' chen po snying rje cher sems dang /byang chub sems dpa'o sems dpa' chen po rgyun chen po dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par bkod pa'i rgyal
5b3('bum): po dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ri bo'i zom dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems
5b4('bum): dpa' chen po de dag dang /gzhan yang bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mye dag dong thabs cig tu bzhugs so//de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'dasde nyid kyis gdan seng ge'i khri
5b5('bum): bshams nas/sku drang por bsrang ste/dgongs pa mngon du bzhag nas/skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs so//der bzhugs nas ting nge 'dzin gang du ting nge 'dzin thams cad
5b6('bum): 'du ba dang /khongs su chud pa dang /rjes su 'brang ba dang /'du bar 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba la mnyam par bzhug go//de nas bcom
5b7('bum): ldan 'das dgongs shing yang dag par mkhyen pas ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/'phrul gyi spyan gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di la rnam par gzigs so//de ltar
6a1('bum): gzigs nas sku thams cad nas 'od zer rab tu bkye ste/de'i zhabs kyi mthil gnyis kyi 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa gnyis las 'od zer bye ba khrag
6a2('bum): khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo //zhabs kyi sor mo bcu las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo //zhabs kyi long bu gnyis los kyang 'od
6a3('bum): zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo //zhabs byin pa gnyis lngas kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo //zhabs pus mo gnyis las
6a4('bum): kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo //zhabs brla gnyis las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug nu byung ngo //sku lta zur gnyis
6a5('bum): las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo //sku lte ba'i dkyil 'khor nas kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu byung ngo //sku rtsib logs gnyis
6a6('bum): las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo //thugs ka'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dpal gyi be'u las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu byung ngo //
6a7('bum): phyag gi sor mo bcu las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya snying drug cu drug cu byung ngo //phyag lag ngar gnyis las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug nu drug cu byung
6b1('bum): sku phrag pa gnyis las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug du byung ngo //mgur nas kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu byung ngo //tshems mche ba bzhi las
6b2('bum): kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo //tshems bzhi bcu las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya skyong drug cu drug cu byung ngo //spyan gnyis nas kyang 'od zer bye ba
6b3('bum): khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo //snyan gnyis nas kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo //shangs kyi sbubs gnyis nas kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig
6b4('bum): brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo //smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu byung ngo //steng gi spyi gtsug nas kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya
6b5('bum): stong drug cu byung ngo //zhal gyi sgo nas kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu byung ste/'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu po de dag thams cad kyis stong gsum gyi stong
6b6('bum): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par byas te/shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so//
6b7('bum): lho phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang po chen pos khyab par byas so//nub phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos
7a1('bum): khyab par byas so//byang phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so//byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams su
7a2('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams ga dA'i klong gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so//shwar lho'i phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khyams gad+mo'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen po
7a3('bum): khyab par byas so//lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so//nub byang gi phyogs mchims su
7a4('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams gr-id+hA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so//'og gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma stod snang ba chen pos bya
7a5('bum): par byas so//steng gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so//sems can gang gis 'od de mthong ba dang /'od
7a6('bum): des gong la reg par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges por gyur to//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis ba spu'i sgo
7a7('bum): thams cad nas 'od zer rab tu dgye ba mdzad de/'od des kyang stong gsum gyi sbyong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so//
7b1('bum): phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so//lho phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos
7b2('bum): khyab par byas so//nub phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so//byang phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gi ng+ge'i klung gi bye ma snyed
7b3('bum): snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so//byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so//shar lho'i phyogs
7b4('bum): mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so//lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye mo snyed snang
7b5('bum): ba chen pos khyab par byas so//nub byang gi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams /ng+ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so//'og gi phyogs su 'jo/
7b6('bum): rten gyi khams gAng+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so//steng gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so//
7b7('bum): sems can gang gis 'di de mthong ba dang /'od des gang la reg par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges por gyur to//de nas
8a1('bum): yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'od kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad/
8a2('bum): de/shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do//lho phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen
8a3('bum): pos khyab par mdzad do//nub phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye mo snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do//byang phyogs su 'jig rten gyi kham thigang+gA'i klung gi
8a4('bum): bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do//byang shar gyi phyogs mtshems su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do//shar
8a5('bum): lho'i phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye mo snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do//lho nub kyi phyogs mchims su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung
8a6('bum): gro bye mo snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do//nub byung gi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do//'og
8a7('bum): gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do//steng gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos
8b1('bum): khyab par mdzad do//sems can gang gis 'od de mthong ba dang /'odra des gang la reg par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par
8b2('bum): gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas/ljags kyi dbang po bkram ste/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnams cid ljags kyi dbang
8b3('bum): pos khyab par mdzad nas/zhal 'dzum pa mdzad do//ljags kyi dbang po de las kyang 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma 'thon te/'od cing de dag thams
8b4('bum): cad lo pad+mo mang po rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/gser gyi mdog tu snang ba 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa/sna tshogs su 'dug pa/blta na sdug pa/yid du 'ong ba/kha dog
8b5('bum): bzang ba/dri zhim pa/'jam pa/ka tsa lin+ti ka ltar reg na bde bar 'gyur ba sha stug kun nas gnas par gyur te/pad+ma de dag la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po
8b6('bum): bzhugs shing /'di lta ste/pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid ston pa mdzad de/dri dag shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
8b7('bum): skyed du gshegs shing de dag tu byon nas/'di lta ste/pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyis chos ston to//de dag lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i
9a1('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing de dag tu byon nas/'di lta ste/pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to//de dag nub
9a2('bum): phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing de dag tu byon nas/'odi lta ste/pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston
9a3('bum): to//de dag byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing de dag tu byon nas/'di lta ste/pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di
9a4('bum): nyid kyi chos ston to//de dag byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing de dag tu byon nas/'di lta ste/pha rol tu phyin
9a5('bum): pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to//de dag shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing de dag
9a6('bum): tu byon nas/'di lta ste/pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to//de dag lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i
9a7('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing de dag tu byon nas/'di lta ste/pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to//de dag nub byang gi
9b1('bum): phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing de dag tu byon nas/'di lta ste/pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi
9b2('bum): chos ston to//de dag 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams grang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gau shegs shing de dag tu byon nas/'di lta ste/pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i
9b3('bum): chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to//de dag steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing de dag tu byon nas 'di lta ste/pha rol tu phyin pa
9b4('bum): drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to//sems can gang gis chos de dag thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
9b5('bum): nges par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gdan seng ge'i khri de la bzhugs bzhin du/sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin seng ge rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba la mnyam par bzhag
9b6('bum): ste/rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad do//rdzu 'phrul de mngon par 'du mdzad pas/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos
9b7('bum): te/g.yos so//rab tu g.yos so//kun tu g.yos so//'gul to//rab tu 'gul to//kun tu 'gul to//ldeg go/rab tu ldeg go/kun tu ldeg go/chem
10a1('bum): chem/rab tu chemachem/kun tu chem chem mo//'ur 'ur/rab tu 'ur 'ur/kun tu 'ur 'ur ro//shig shig/rab tu shig shig/
10a2('bum): kun tu shig shig go/mtha' mtho na ni dbus dma'/dbus mtho na ni mtha' dma' ste/dal bus brags kyis nyams su bde bar sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba
10a3('bum): bskyed par gyur to//de nas de'i tshe'i skad cig thang cig la/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can dmyal ba dang /byol song gi skye gnas
10a4('bum): dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /mi khom pa dang /ngan song dang /ngan 'gro dang /log pa ltung ba gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad rgyun chad par gyur to/sems
10a5('bum): can de dag thams cad kyang mi dang lhar skal ba mnyam par skyes par gyur to//rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang /sum cu rtsa gsum dang /mtshe ma dang /dga' ldan dang /
10a6('bum): 'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang skal ba mnyam par skyes par gyur to//de nas lha de dag dang /mi de dag dga' ba dang /mos pa dang /nyams
10a7('bum): bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang /mos pa dang /nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag bcom ldan 'das
10b1('bum): gang na ba der dong zhing phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal bar gyur to//de nas de'i tshe skad cig yud tsam thang cig la/shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
10b2('bum): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyale ba thams cad dang /byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/mi khom pa thams
10b3('bum): cad kyang nub par gyur te/sems can de dag thams cad kyang mi dang lhar skal po mnyam par skyes so//de nas mi de dag dang /lha de dag dga' ba dang /mos pa dang /nyams
10b4('bum): bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang /mos pa dang /nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing
10b5('bum): de dag na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyin nas zhabs la phyag btsal te/de bzhin
10b6('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to//de nas de'i tshe skad cig yud tsam thang cig la/lho phyogs kyi
10b7('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang /byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad
11a1('bum): mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/sems can de dag thams cad kyang mi dang lhar skal ba mnyam par skyes so//de nas mi de dag dang /lha de dag/
11a2('bum): dga' ba dang /mos pa dang nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang mos pa dang nyams bde ba thob par gyur
11a3('bum): pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyin nus
11a4('bum): zhabs la phyag btsal te/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to//de nas de'i tshe
11a5('bum): skad cig yud tsam thang cig la/nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang /byol song gi skye gnas thams cad
11a6('bum): dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/sems can de dag thams cad kyang mau dang lhar skal ba mnyam par
11a7('bum): skyes so//de nas mi de dag dang /lha de dag dga' ba dang /mos pa dang /nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/rjes su dran nas kyang
11b1('bum): dga' ba dang mos pa dang /nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang
11b2('bum): bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyin nas zhabs la phyag btsal te/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par
11b3('bum): gyur to//de nas de'i tshe skad cig yud tsam thang cig l-i/byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyale ba thams cad dang /byol song gi skye
11b4('bum): gnas thams cad dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/sems can de dag thams cad kyang mi dang lhar skal ba
11b5('bum): mnyam par skyes so//de nas mi de dag dang /lha de dag dga' ba dang /mos pa dang /nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/rjes su dran nas kyang
11b6('bum): dga' ba dang /mos pa dang /nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
11b7('bum): sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du phyin nas zhabs la phyag btsal te/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la
12a1('bum): thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to//de nas de'i tshe skad cig yud tsam thang cig la/byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi
12a2('bum): bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang /byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/mi khom pa thams cad kyang
12a3('bum): nub par gyur te/sems can de dag thams cad kyang mi dang lhar skal ba mnyam par skyes so//de nas mi de dag dang /lha de dag dga' ba dang /mos pa dang /nyams
12a4('bum): bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang /mos pa dang /nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas
12a5('bum): kyi zhing de dag na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang drag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyin nas zhabs la phyag btsal te/
12a6('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to//de nas de'i tshe skad cig yud tsam thong cig la/shar
12a7('bum): lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang /byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang /gshin rje'i
12b1('bum): 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/sems can de dag thams cad kyang mi dang lhar skal ba mnyam par skyes so//de nas mi de dag dang
12b2('bum): lha de dag dga' ba dang /mos pa dang /nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang /mos pa dang /nyams bde ba thob par
12b3('bum): gyur pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyin nas
12b4('bum): zhabs la phyag btsal te/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to//de nas de'i tshe skad cig
12b5('bum): yud tsam thang cig la/lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang /byol song gi skye gnas
12b6('bum): thams cad dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/sems can de dag thams cad kyang mi dang lha ro skal ba
12b7('bum): mnyam par skyes so//de nas mi de dag dang /lha de dag dga' ba dang /mos pa dang /nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/rjes
13a1('bum): su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang /mos pa dang /nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/de bzhin gshegs pa dag
13a2('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyin nas zhabs la phyag btsal to/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
13a3('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur te/de nas de'i tshe skad cig yud tsam thang cig la nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi
13a4('bum): khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang /byol stong gi skye gnas thams cad dang /gshi na rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/
13a5('bum): mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/sems can de dag thams cad kyang mi dang lhor skal ba mnyam par skyes so//de nas mi de dag dang /lha de dag dga' ba dang
13a6('bum): mos pa dang /nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang /mos pa dang nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag rang
13a7('bum): rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyin nas zhabs
13b1('bum): la phyag btsal te/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to//de nas de'i tshe skad cig yud tsam
13b2('bum): thang cig la/'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang /byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang /gshin rje'i 'jig
13b3('bum): rten thams cad kyang rgyun tshod/mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/sems can de dog thams cad kyang mi dang lhar skal ba mnyam par skyes so//de nas mi de dag dang //
13b4('bum): lha de dag dga' ba dang /mos pa dang /nyams badre ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang /mos pa dang /nyams bde
13b5('bum): baM thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag ni/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du
13b6('bum): dong zhing phyin nas zhabs la phyag btsal te/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to//
13b7('bum): nas de'i tshe skad cig yud tsam thang cig la/steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang /byol seng gi skye gnas
14a1('bum): thams cad dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/sems can de dag thams cad kyang mi dang lhar
14a2('bum): skal ba mnyam par skyes so//de nas mi de dag dang /lha de dag dga' ba dang mos pa dang /nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/rjes su dran
14a3('bum): nas kyang dga' ba dang /mos pa dang /nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang drag par rdzogs/
14a4('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyin nas zhabs la phyag btsal te/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
14a5('bum): de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to//de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/sems can dmus long ji snyed cig yod pa de
14a6('bum): dag thams cad kyang mig gis gzugs mthong bar gyur to//'on pa rnams kyang rna bas sgra thos par gyur to//smyon pa rnams kyang dran pa thob par gyur to//sems
14a7('bum): 'khrugs pa rnams kyang 'khrug pa med pa'i sems thob par gyur to//gos med pa rnams kyang gos thob par gyur to//dbul po rnams kyang nor thob par gyur to//bkres
14b1('bum): ba rnams kyang zas thob par gyur to//skom pa rnams kyang btung ba thob par gyur to//nad kyis btab pa rnams kyang nad med par gyur to//lus nyams pa dang dbang po mtshang
14b2('bum): ba rnams kyang lus dang dbang po tshang zhing rgyas par gyur to//ngal ba rnams kyang ngal sros par gyur to//lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' dang /'tsho ba mi dge ba ma
14b3('bum): spangs pa rnams kyang /lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' dang /'tsho ba mi dge ba spangs par gyur to//sems can thams cad kyang sems can thams cad la dper
14b4('bum): na/pha dang ma dang phu nu dang /sring mo dang /mdza' bo dang /gnyen dang /grogs po dang mtshungs pa'i sems kyis sems mnyam pa nyid du gyur to//sems can thams cad kyang
14b5('bum): dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan zhing tshangs par spyod pa dang /gtsang ba dang /nyes pa'i dri nge ba med de/mi dge ba'i rtog pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur to//de'i tshe sems
14b6('bum): can thams cad bde ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu dang ldan par gyur te/dper na dge slong bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par zhugs pa'i bde ba de lta bu'i bde ba thams cad dang ldan
14b7('bum): par gyur to//de'i tshe sems can rnam pa 'di lta bu'i shes rab dang ldan par gyur te/'di ltar sbyin pa ni dge ba'o//dul ba ni dge ba'o//zhi ba ni dge ba'o//sdom pa ni dge
15a1('bum): 'di na pa ni dge pa'o//bag byed pa ni dge ba'o//byams pa ni dge ba//m+b+hi rje ni dge pa'o//sog chags su gyur pa thams cad la mi 'tsho ba na dran//
15a2('bum): pa'o zhes bya bar shes par gyur to//de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das gang na seng ge'i khri de nyid la bzhugs pas/'di lta ste dper na/nyi ma slob pa med pa nam mkha'i dbyings yongs
15a3('bum): su dag pa la 'dug pa 'am/zla ba nyi'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab dang bcas pa/khor yug dang bcas pa/lha'i
15a4('bum): gnas dang bcas pa/dbang po dang bcas pa/dbang byed dang bcas pa/lha dang lha ma yin gyi ris dang bcas pa/tshangs pa dang bcas pa/gtsad ma'i gnas dang bcas
15a5('bum): pa/'di zil gyis mnan te bzhugs na/'od dang /sku mdog dang /gzi brjid dang /dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me/lhan ne lhang nge'o//ji ltar bcom ldan
15a6('bum): 'das kyi stong gsum gyi skyong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di zil gyis mnan te/'od dang /sku mdog dang /gzi brji dang /dpal skyes mdzes shing /lham me ldan na
15a7('bum): lhang nger bzhugs pa de bzhin du/shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te/'od dang /sku mdog dang /gzi brjid dang /dpal
15b1('bum): gyis mdzes shing /lham me/lhan ne lhang nger bzhugs so//de bzhin du lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te/'od dang /sku mdog
15b2('bum): drang /gzi brjid dang /dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me/lhan ne lhang dro ro bzhugs so//de bzhin du nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil
15b3('bum): gyis mnan te/'od dang /sku mdog dang /gzi brjid dang /dpal gyis mdzes shing /lham me/lhan ne lhung nger bzhugs so//de bzhin du byang phyogs kyi
15b4('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te/'od dang /sku mdog dang /gzi brjid dang /dpal gyis mdzes shing /lham me/lhan ne/lhang nger
15b5('bum): bzhugs so//de bzhin du byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te/'od dang /sku mdog dang /gzi brjid dang /
15b6('bum): dpal gyis mdzes shing lham mo/lhan ne/lhang der bzhugs so//de bzhin du shwar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te/
15b7('bum): 'od dang /sku mdog dang /gzi brjid dang /dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me/lhan ne/lhang nger bzhugs so//de bzhin du lho nub kyi phyogs mtshoms kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
16a1('bum): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te/'od dang /sku mdog dang /gzi brjid dang /dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me/lhun ne/lhang nger bzhugs
16a2('bum): so//de bzhin du nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te/'od dang /sku mdog dang /gzi brjid dang /dpal gyis
16a3('bum): mdzes shing lham mo/lhan ne lhang nger bzhugs so//de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams grang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te/'od dang /sku
16a4('bum): mdog dang /gzi brjid dang /dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me/lhan no/lhang nger bzhugs so//de bzhin du steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
16a5('bum): skyed zil gyis mnan te/'od dang /sku mdog dang /gzi brjid dang /dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me/lhan ni/lhang nger bzhugs so//'di lta spyi dper na/
16a6('bum): ri'i rgyal po ri rab ri nag po gzhan thams cad zil gyis non par gnas pa ni/mdzes shing lham me/lhan ne/lhang nge'o//'di lta ste dper na/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
16a7('bum): slar ma'i gzugs thams cad zil gyis non par gnas pa ni/mdzes shing lham me/lhan ne/lhung nge'o//'di lta ste dper na/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od
16b1('bum): gzhan thams cad zil gyis non par gnas pa ni mangs shing lham mo/lhan no//ltung ngog/de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/dbang po dang
16b2('bum): bcas pa/tshangs pa dang bcas pa/gtsang ma'i gnas dang bcas pra/zil gyis non parla bzhugs pa'ang /'di dang /sku mdog dang /gzi brji dang /dpal gyi sde mdzes shrIng
16b3('bum): lham me/lhan ne/ltung nge'o//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir/bcom ldan 'das kyis rang bzhin gyi sku
16b4('bum): 'dra ba de bzhin du bstan to//de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di gtsang ma'i gnas kyi m+b+hi'i ris dang /kun snang rung ba dang /tshangs ris dang /gzhan 'phrul
16b5('bum): dbang byed dang /'phrul dga' dang /dga' ldan dang /mtshe ma dang /sum cu rtsa gsum dang /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyis/de bzhin gshegs
16b6('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdun seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa mthong nas/dga' zhing spro ba dang /yid bde zhing rab tu dga' la nyams byed pa dang /
16b7('bum): bde ba skyes nas/lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang /lha rdzas kyi spos dang /lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang /lha rjes kyi phye ma dang /lha rdzas kyi byug spos dang /lha
17a1('bum): rdzas kyi ut+pal dang /pad+mo dang /ku mud dang /puN+Da rika dang /na lin dang /sau gan+d+hi dang /g+ha rdzas kyi me tog ke sar dang /ta ma la'i lo ma dang /lha rdzas
17a2('bum): kyin bza' dang /lha rdzas kyi rgyan dang /lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang /lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang /lha rdzas kyi ba dan mang po thogs nas/bcom ldan 'das gang na bder dong ste
17a3('bum): phyin nas/me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /byug spos dang /ut+pa la dang /pad+mo dang /ku mud dang /puN+Da ri ka dang /na lin dang /
17a4('bum): gaun+d+hi dang /me tog kaM sar dang /ta ma la'i lo mu dang /na bza' dang /rgyan dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /lha'i bu dran dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gtor to//
17a5('bum): mngon par gtor to//rab tu gtor to//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/'dul ba dang /snod du gyur pa'i mi ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang /me tog chu las
17a6('bum): skyes pa dang /thang las skyes pa mang po khyer nas/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed par gyur to//me tog dang /phreng
17a7('bum): dong /spos dang /byug pa dang /phye ma la sogs pa dang /na bza' dang /rgyan dang /gdugos dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan de dag thams cad kyang de ma thag tu bcom ldan
17b1('bum): 'das kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis/bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i stong gi nam mkha' la me tog la sogs pa'i khyang pa btsugs pa/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
17b2('bum): tsam du gnas par gyur to//khyang pa brdegs pa de las kyang lha rdzas kyi mye tog dang /dar gyi lda ldi mang po 'phyang bar gyur to//mngon par 'phyang bar gyur to//rab tu 'byung bar
17b3('bum): gyur to//me tog deng dUr gyi lnga ldi de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di shin tu mdzes par gyur te//bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba gser gyi 'dog lci brjes
17b4('bum): kyang /shin tu mdzes shing lham mi/lhan ne/lhang nger gyur to//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir ji lta ba de bzhin du/shir phyogs kyi 'jig rten
17b5('bum): khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang /bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyib cing gsal bar gyur to//lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gad+hA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang
17b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to//nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab
17b7('bum): cing gsal bar gyur to//byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to//byang shar gyi
18a1('bum): phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang /bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to//shar lho'i phyogs
18a2('bum): mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang /bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to//lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten
18a3('bum): gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang /bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to//nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung//
18a4('bum): gi bye ma snyed kyang /bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gisal bar gyur to//'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang /bcom ldan
18a5('bum): 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to//steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gaung+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang /bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab
18a6('bum): cing gsal bar gyur to//de la 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas tshig mi shes pa mthong nas/'di snyam du sems par gyur te/de bzhin
18a7('bum): gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo//'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams ji ltar sems pa de bzhin du/nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi mi rnams
18b1('bum): kyis/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/'di snyam du sems par gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston
18b2('bum): to snyam mo//shar gyi lus 'phags po'i mi rnams kyis/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/'di snyam du sems par gyur te/de bzhin gshegs
18b3('bum): pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo//byang gi sgra mi snyan phyi ma rnams kyis/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lte bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/'di snyam
18b4('bum): du sems par gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo//rgyal chen bzhi'i ros kyi lha rnams kyis/de bzhin gshegs pa'i
18b5('bum): sku lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/'di snyam du sems par gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo//sum cu rtsa gsum
18b6('bum): gyi lha rnams kyis/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/'di snyam du sems par gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos
18b7('bum): ston to snyam mo//mtshe ma'i lha rnams kyis/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgyu lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/'di snyam du sems par gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa
19a1('bum): bdag cag gi mdun nu bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo//dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyis/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bsna chog mi shes pa mthong nas/
19a2('bum): 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo//'phrul draga'i lha rnams kyis/de bzhin gshegs pa'i
19a3('bum): sku lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur tI de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo//gzhan 'phrul dbang
19a4('bum): byed kyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas cho ga mi shes pa mthong nas/'di snyam du sems par gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na
19a5('bum): bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo//tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/'di snyam du sems par gyur te/
19a6('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa bdug cag gi mdun na bzhugs shIng chos ston to snyam mo//tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa
19a7('bum): mthong nas/'di snyam du sems par gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo//tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams
19b1('bum): kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/'di snyam du sems par gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo///
19b2('bum): tshangs chen gyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/'di snyam du sems par gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na//
19b3('bum): bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo//snang ba'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lte bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/'di snyam du sems par gyur te/de bzhin gshegs/
19b4('bum): pi bdag cag gi mdun nA bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo//chung sdang ga lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas rnyog mi shes pa mthong nas/'di snyam du sems par
19b5('bum): gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo//tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes
19b6('bum): pa mthong nas/'di snyam du sems par gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo//kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin
19b7('bum): gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo//dge ba'i lha rnams kyis de
20a1('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos
20a2('bum): ston to snyam mo//chung dge'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/'di snyam du sems par gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa
20a3('bum): bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo//tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/'di snyam
20a4('bum): du sems par gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo//dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas tshig

20a6('bum): gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/'di snyam du sems par gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo//
20a7('bum): chung che'i lha rnams kyis/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/'di snyam du sems par gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun
20b1('bum): na bzhugs shing chos skyon to snyam//chad med che ba'i lha rnams kyis/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas rgyug mo shes pa mthong nas/'di snyam du sems par gyur te/
20b2('bum): bzhin ga shegs pa bdag cig gi mdun na bzhugs shing ches ston to snyam mo//'bras bu che ba'i lce rnams kyis/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lte bas chog mi shes pa mtho
20b3('bum): nas/'di snyam du sems par gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing /chos ston to snyam mo//mi che ba'i lha rnams kyis/de bzhin gshegs
20b4('bum): pa'i sku lta bas tshig mi shes pa mthong nas/'di snyam du sems par gyur te/de bzhin ga shugs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing /chos ston to snyam mo//mi gdung
20b5('bum): ba'i lha rnams kyis/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lci bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/'di snyam du sems par gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bdun
20b6('bum): shing /chos ston to snyam mo//shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams kyis/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lte bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/'di snyam du sems par gyur te/de
20b7('bum): bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo//gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams kyis/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong /

21a2('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/'di snyam du sems par gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to/
21a3('bum): snyam mo//de bzhin du stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mi thams cad dang //lha thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/'di snyam
21a4('bum): du sems par gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing /chos ston to snyam mo//stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mi thams cad dang /
21a5('bum): lha thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/'di snyam du sems par gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na
21a6('bum): bzhugs shing /chos ston to snyam mo//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mi thams cad dang /lha thams cad kyis/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
21a7('bum): lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/'di snyam du sems par gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo//de nas yang
21b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis gad na seng ge'i khri de la bzhugs bzhin du 'od rab tu 'gyed pa mdzad de/yang dod des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rab tu snang bar
21b2('bum): gyur to//shar phyogapa kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang rab tu snang bar gyur to//lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang rab tu snang bar gyur

21b4('bum): to//byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang rab tu snang por gyur to//shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung
21b5('bum): gri bye mo snyed kyang rab tu snang bar gyur to//lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang rab tu snang bar gyur to//nab byang gi phyogs mtshams
21b6('bum): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams pang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang rab tu snang bar gyur to//'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang rab tu snang bar gyur to//steng gri
21b7('bum): phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang rab tu snang bar gyur to//'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni/sems can gang ji
22a1('bum): snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gaN+DI klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
22a2('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa mang po mthong bar gyur to//shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i
22a3('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin

22a6('bum): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/bcom ldan 'das de bzhi ni gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa/dge slong gi dge 'dun

22b1('bum): sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
22b2('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa/dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to//byang phyogs kyi
22b3('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams gAng+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khamos 'di na//
22b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa/dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/byang chub sems dpa'i
22b5('bum): 'khor dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to//byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/sems can gang ji snyed
22b6('bum): 'khod pa de dag gis kyang /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khoms 'di na/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
22b7('bum): rgyas shAkya thub pa/dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to//shar lho'i phyogs
23a1('bum): mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang /stong gsum gyi stong chen

23a4('bum): snyed po de dag ni/sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
23a5('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa/dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa
23a6('bum): mthong bar gyur to//nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang /stong
23a7('bum): gsum gyi steng chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/bcom ldan 'das de bzhi ni gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dge slong gi
23b1('bum): dge 'dun dang bcas pa/byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to//'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po
23b2('bum): dag na sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs po dgra bcom pa
23b3('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa/dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to//steng
23b4('bum): gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di
23b5('bum): na/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa/dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/byang chub sems
23b6('bum): dpa'i 'khor dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to//de nas shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol ni/'jig
23b7('bum): rten gyi khams rin chen yod pa zhes bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs
24a1('bum): shing 'tsho skyong ste/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do//
24a2('bum): de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pos/snang ba chen po de dang /sra cher g.yos pa
24a3('bum): de dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgo lta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin
24a4('bum): chen 'byung gnas gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung granas de la 'di
24a5('bum): skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang /dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda'
24a6('bum): ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung
24a7('bum): gnas kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu 'di ni/nub phyogs logs su 'jig
24b1('bum): rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
24b2('bum): shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo //de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/'di ni de'i mthu yin te
24b3('bum): de 'dra'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sdoms dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung bas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
24b4('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang /'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
24b5('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang /de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
24b6('bum): po de dag kun kyang /phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/gzungs dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ting nge 'dzin dang /snyoms par 'jug pa thams
24b7('bum): cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyis bka' stsal pa rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la
25a1('bum): bab par shes na/'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der songs shig/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
25a2('bum): rin chen 'byung gnas kyis/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung ba la/pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/gser gyi mdog
25a3('bum): can stong bskur te/rigs kyi bro bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sang+yas rgyas shAkya thub pa de la pad+mo 'di dag gis gtor cig/
25a4('bum): rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni//
25a5('bum): mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/der nyams par gyur ta re/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung bas/bcom ldan 'das de
25a6('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas de las/pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag
25a7('bum): blangs te/byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang /rab tu byung ba dang /khye'u dang /bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/
25b1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'cha skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang /spos dang /
25b2('bum): bdug spos dang /phreng ba dang /byug pa dang /phye mo dang /na bza' dang /rgyan dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang /bkur stir bya
25b3('bum): ba dang /phu dud du bya ba dang /mchod pa byed cing /byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshig so
25b4('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zha bas gnyis la spyi bos phyag btsal te/phyogs gcig
25b5('bum): tu 'khod do//phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpe'i chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byur bas/bcom ldan 'das lo 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan
25b6('bum): 'das de bzhin goshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas/bcom ldan 'das la skyen mi mnga' 'am/gnod pa ma mchis
25b7('bum): sam/zo bdog bde 'am/sku nyams dang ldan nam/bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang /bcom
26a1('bum): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas kyis/bcom ldan 'as la mchod pa'o snang
26a2('bum): du bskur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/pad+mo de dag bzhes nas/shar phyogs
26a3('bum): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag grang na ba der gtor to//de nas
26a4('bum): pad+mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/pad+mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing /'di ltar pha rol tu
26a5('bum): phyin pa drug po 'di nyid brtsams te chos ston to//chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
26a6('bum): byang chub tu nges par gyur to//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa dang /rab tu byung ba dang /khye'u dang /bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis
26a7('bum): kyang /rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so//
26b1('bum): bkur stir byas so//phu dud du byas so//mchod par byas so////shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam po gnyis pa//de nas lha
26b2('bum): phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams grang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan med pa zhes bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa
26b3('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la
26b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do//de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pa zhes bya ba 'dug
26b5('bum): 'dug pas/snang ba chen po de dang /sa cher g.yos pa de dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
26b6('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
26b7('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang /dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa
27a1('bum): dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rkyen/deskad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa/
27a2('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu 'di ni
27a3('bum): byang phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khoms gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang
27a4('bum): dog por rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho stong ngo //de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
27a5('bum): ston te/'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
27a6('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/bcom
27a7('bum): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de lta ba dang /de la phyag bkyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang /byang chub
27b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/gzungs dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par
27b2('bum): 'jug pa de dag thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa/de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/rigs
27b3('bum): kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na/'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der songs shig/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dogra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
27b4('bum): mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pa la/pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/gser gyi mdog can stong bskur te//
27b5('bum): rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la pad+mo 'di dag gis gtor cig rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi
27b6('bum): zhing der bag yod par spyod cig de ci'i phyir zhe na/'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/der
27b7('bum): nyams par gyur ta re/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
28a1('bum): sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal de las/pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim
28a2('bum): pa dang /rab tu byung ba dang /khye'u dang /bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du me dang 'grogs te/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/
28a3('bum): lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang /spos dang /bdug spos dang /phreng ba dang /
28a4('bum): byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /rgyan dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang /bkur stir bya ba dang /pu dud du bya ba
28a5('bum): dang /mchod pa byed cing byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
28a6('bum): dag par rdzogs po'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag btsal te/phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//
28a7('bum): phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pas/bcom ldan 'das lo 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
28b1('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal/bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/gnod pa ma mchis sam/zo bdog bde 'am/
28b2('bum): sku nyams dang ldan nam/bde ba dang /dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
28b3('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis/bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das
28b4('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/pad+mo de dag bzhis nas/lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
28b5('bum): po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to//de nas pad+mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad
28b6('bum): rgyas par khyab par gyur te/pad+mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing /'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid brtsams te chos ston to//chos
28b7('bum): bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
29a1('bum): chen po khyim pa dang /rab tu byung ba dang /khye'u dang /bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang /rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/bcom ldan 'das de
29a2('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so//bkur stir byas so//phu dud du byas so//mchod pa byas so//
29a3('bum): de nas nub phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/'jig rten gyi khams nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs
29a4('bum): pabapadagra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la
29a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do//de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros
29a6('bum): zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas snang ba chen po de dang /sa tsher g.yos pa de dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lto na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/bcom ldan 'das de
29a7('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro gang na ba der song ste/phyin nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
29b1('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang /dogs
29b2('bum): 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
29b3('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'odi 'phros/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu
29b4('bum): 'di ni shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad ces bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
29b5('bum): pa yang dag por rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo //de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
29b6('bum): ston te 'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o//de nas byang chub sdoms dpa' sems dpa'i chen po spyod pa'i blo gros kyis/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
29b7('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/bcom ldan 'das de bzhir
30a1('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shUk+Sha/thub pa de blta ba dang /de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang /byang chub sems dpa /
30a2('bum): sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur la/gzungs dang /so so yang drag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ting nge 'dzin dang /skyomasdu par 'jug
30a3('bum): pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa/de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phros bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu de ltar
30a4('bum): de'i dus la bab par shes na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad der spongs shig/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od
30a5('bum): 'phros/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros la/pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gyi mdog can stong bskur to/rigs kyi bu
30a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yod drag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyus shAkya thub pa de la pad+mo 'di dag gis gtor cig/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas
30a7('bum): kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin
30b1('bum): sa/der nyams par gyur ta ra/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros kyis/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
30b2('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro de los pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang /rab tu byung ba dang /khye'u dang
30b3('bum): bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang
30b4('bum): ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang /spos dang /bdug spos dang /phreng ba dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza'
30b5('bum): dang /rgyan dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang /bkur stir bya ba dang /phu dud du bya ba dang /mchod pa byed cing byang
30b6('bum): chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshigs pa dgra bcom pa yong dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
30b7('bum): shAkya thub pa gang na be der dong ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag btsal te/phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//phyogs gcig tu 'khod
31a1('bum): nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros kyis/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
31a2('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro/bcom ldan 'odas la snyun mi mnga' 'am/gnod pa ma mchis sam/zo ba dog bde 'am/
31a3('bum): sku nyams dang ldan nam/bde ba dang /dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin

31a5('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/pad+mo de dag bzhes nas/nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de
31a6('bum): ngag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to//de nas pad+mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams
31a7('bum): cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/pad+mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing /'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid brtsams te chos ston to//
31b1('bum): chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
31b2('bum): chen po khyim pa dang /rab tu byung ba dang /khye'u dang /bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra

31b4('bum): su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/'jig rten gyi khams rgyal ba zhes bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dogra bcom pa yang
31b5('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
31b6('bum): pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do//de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/snang ba
31b7('bum): chen po de dang /sa cher g.yos pa de dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta ni cho ga mi shes pa de mthong nas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa ying dag
32a1('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
32a2('bum): sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po de la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang /dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang /de
32a3('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
