32a5('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
32a6('bum): pA'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo //de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/'di
32a7('bum): nide'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin gyis/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
32b1('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
32b2('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang /de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun
32b3('bum): kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/gzungs dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms por 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob bo//de
32b4('bum): drag blta ba'i slad du mtsho'o//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang pos bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na 'jig rten gyi khams
32b5('bum): mi mjed der songs shig/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang pos/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
32b6('bum): po rgyal bas byin la/pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/gser gyi mdog can stong bskur te/riH/sa kyi bu bcom ldan 'das dri bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
32b7('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la pad+mo 'di dag gis gtor cing //rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'jig rten
33a1('bum): gyi khams mi mjed der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/der nyams par gyur ta re/de nas byang chub
33a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin gyis/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po de las
33a3('bum): pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang /rab tu byung ba dang /khye'u dang /bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba
33a4('bum): khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing
33a5('bum): skyong ba de dag thams cad la me togra dang /spos dang /bdug spos dang /phreng ba dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /rgyan dang /gdugs dang /rgyal
33a6('bum): mtshan dang /ba dun dag gis rim gror bya ba dang /bkur stir bya ba dang /phu dud du bya ba dang /mchod pa byed cing byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /byang chub
33a7('bum): sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas//
33b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag btsal te/phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal
33b2('bum): bas byin gyis/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang
33b3('bum): po/bcom ldan 'das la snyan mi mnga' 'am/gnod pa ma mchis sam/ze bdog bde 'am/sku nyams dang ldan nam/bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/pa
33b4('bum): gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang pos//
33b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/pad+mo de dag
33b6('bum): bzhes nas/byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba dar gtor
33b7('bum): to//de nas pad+mod dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dge thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/pad+mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing /'di
34a1('bum): ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid brtsams te chos ston to//chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang /bla na med pa yang/
34a2('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa dang /rab tu byung ba dang /khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag
34a3('bum): gis kyang /rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so//
34a4('bum): bkur stir byas so//phu dud du byas so//mchod pa byas so//de nas byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol
34a5('bum): na/'jig rten gyi khams ting nge 'dzin gyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi
34a6('bum): glang po dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tshe skyong ste/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par
34a7('bum): ston pa mdzad do//de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de no byang chub sems dpe' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/snang
34b1('bum): pa chen po de dang /sa cher g.yos pa de dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
34b2('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge/
34b3('bum): 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang /dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang /de bzhin
34b4('bum): gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
34b5('bum): ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gyis/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu
34b6('bum): 'di ni lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad ces bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa
34b7('bum): ngagra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo //de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha
35a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa ston te/'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pas/bcom
35a2('bum): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag
35a3('bum): kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang /de la
35a4('bum): phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/gzungs dang /so so yang dag par reg pa
35a5('bum): bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ting nge 'dzin dang /snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
35a6('bum): ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der songs shig/de nas
35a7('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gyis/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
35b1('bum): rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pa la pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/gser gyi mdog can stong bskur te/rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
35b2('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la pad+mo 'di dag gis gtor cig/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cing //de ci'i phyir zhe na/'jig rten gyi
35b3('bum): khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis der nyams par gyur ta ra/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
35b4('bum): rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal de las/

35b7('bum): shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang /spos dang /bdug spos dang /phreng ba dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /rgyan dang /gdugs dang /rgyal

36a5('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal/bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/gnod pa ma mchis sam/zo bdog bde'am/sku nyams dang ldan
36a6('bum): nam/bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
36a7('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gyis/bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
36b1('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/pad+mo de dag bzhes nas byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gAng+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po
36b2('bum): de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba dor gtor to//de nas pad+mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams
36b3('bum): cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/pad+mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing /'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid brtsams te chos ston to//chos
36b4('bum): bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
36b5('bum): chen po khyim pa dang /rab tu byung ba dang /khye'u dang /bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
36b6('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so//bkur stir byas so//phu dud du byas so//mchod par byas so//de nas shar lho'i
36b7('bum): phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/'jig rten gyi khams snying po byang chub kyi rgyan shin tu yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba yod
37a1('bum): de/don de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/de byang chub//

37a3('bum): dpa' chen po lag na pad+mo zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/snang ba chen po de dang /sa cher g.yos pa de dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ltan chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/
37a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo dam pa'i dpal gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
37a5('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo dam pa'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang //

37b1('bum): stsal to//rigs kyi bu 'di ni nub byang gi phyogs mtshams logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/de na
37b2('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo //de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
37b3('bum): la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad+mos/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
37b4('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo dam pa'i dpal lo 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/

37b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/gzungs dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ting nge 'dzin drang snyoms par
37b7('bum): 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa/de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo dam pa'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu de ltar
38a1('bum): de'i dus la bab par shes na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der songs shig/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
38a2('bum): pad+mo dam pa'i dpal gyis/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad+mo la/pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gyi mdog can stong bskur te/rigs

38a7('bum): dang /khye'u dang /bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/shar lho'i phyogs

38b2('bum): phye ma dang /na bza' dang /rgyan dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang /bkur stir bya ba dang /phu dud du bya ba dang /mchod pa byed
38b3('bum): tsong byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sang po

39a1('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo dam pa'i dpal gyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
39a2('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/pad+mo de dag bzhes nas/shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs
39a3('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to//de nas pad+mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/

39a5('bum): gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
39a6('bum): khyim pa dang /rab tu byung ba dang /khye'u dang /bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang /rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa

39b1('bum): phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/'jig rten gyi khams rdul gyi tshogs dang bral ba zhes bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs
39b2('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

39b4('bum): zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/snang ba chen po de dang /sa cher g.yos pa de dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta na tshig mi shes pa de mthong nas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
39b5('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal grang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
39b6('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten
39b7('bum): du byung ba dang /dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu/ci'i rkyen/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das
40a1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gyis/byang chub sems dpa'
40a2('bum): sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang ba de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu 'dri ni byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams logs su 'jig rtenI gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi
40a3('bum): bye ma snyed 'das pa na/'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad ces bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin goshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa
40a4('bum): zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo //de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o//
40a5('bum): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang bas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi
40a6('bum): ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/bcom ldan 'das de drizhin
40a7('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang /de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems
40b1('bum): dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/gzungs dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ting nge 'dzin dang /snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad
40b2('bum): la dbang rab tu thob pa/de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi
40b3('bum): bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der songs shig/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil
40b4('bum): 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gyis/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang ba la/pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/gser gyi mdog can stong
40b5('bum): bskur te/rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das dri bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la pad+mo 'di dag gis gtor cig/rigs kyi
40b6('bum): bu songs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka'
40b7('bum): ba yin gyis/der nyams par gyur ta ro/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang bas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
41a1('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal de las/pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te//
41a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang /rab tu byung ba dang /khye'u dang /bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas
41a3('bum): mo snang bar gyur nas/lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang /spos dang /
41a4('bum): bdug spos dang /'phreng ba dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /rgyan dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang /
41a5('bum): bkur stir bya ba dang /phu dud du bya ba dang /mchod pa byed cing /byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/bcom ldan
41a6('bum): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nos/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos
41a7('bum): phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang bas/bcom ldan 'das la
41b1('bum): 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal/bcom ldan
41b2('bum): 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/gnod pa ma mchis sam/zo bdog bde 'am/sku nyams dang ldan nam/bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/pad+mo gser gyi mdog can
41b3('bum): 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal
41b4('bum): gyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/
41b5('bum): pad+mo de dag bzhis nas/lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
41b6('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to//de nas pad+mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/pad+mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i
41b7('bum): sku mang po bzhugs shing /'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid brtsams te ches ston to//chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang
42a1('bum): blun med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges bur gyur to//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa dang /rab tu byung ba dang /
42a2('bum): dang /bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang /rlung rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyu
42a3('bum): shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so//bkur stir byas so//phu drud du byas so//mchod pa byas so//de nas nub byung gi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi
42a4('bum): bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/'jig rten gyi khams dbang du gyur pa zhes bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gau shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
42a5('bum): gdugs dam pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa
42a6('bum): mdzad do//de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen ma tshig ces bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/snang ba chen po de dang /sa cher
42a7('bum): g.yos pa de dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ltan chog mi shes pa de mthong nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
42b1('bum): rgyas gdugs dam pa gang na ba der dong ste byin nas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa de la 'di skad/
42b2('bum): tsAs gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang /ngogs 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di
42b3('bum): ci/ci'i rkyen/de skad ces gsol ba dang /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gu shreg sdu pa drugra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs drim pas/byang chub
42b4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen mchog la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu 'di ni/shar lho'i phyogs mtshams logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gan+ti
42b5('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub
42b6('bum): bzhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo //de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o//
42b7('bum): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen mchog gis/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
43a1('bum): gdugs dam pa la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang /'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
43a2('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang /de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de
43a3('bum): ngag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/gzungs dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ting nge 'dzin dang /snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad
43a4('bum): la dbang rab tu thob pa/de dge blta ba'i slad du mtsho'o//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdugs dam pas bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus
43a5('bum): la bab par shes na/'jig rten gyi khams ma mjed der songs shig/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang drug par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs
43a6('bum): dam pas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen mchog la pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/gser gyi mdog can stong bskur te/rigs kyi
43a7('bum): bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la/pad+mo 'di dag gis gtor cig/rigs kyi bu sangs
43b1('bum): rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cing //de ci'i phyir zhe na/'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/
43b2('bum): dedor nyams par gyur ta re/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen mchog gis/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
43b3('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dmo pa de las pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa dang /rab
43b4('bum): tu byung ba dang /khye'u dang /bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas//nub byang gi phyogs
43b5('bum): mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la/me tog dang /spos dang /bdug spos dang /phreng ba dang /byug pa dang /skye
43b6('bum): ma dang /na bza' dang /rgyan dang gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang /bkur stir bya ba dang /pu drud du bya ba dang /mchod pa byed cing /bya
43b7('bum): chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
44a1('bum): shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag btsal te/phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//phyogs gcig
44a2('bum): tu 'khod nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshon po rin chen mchog gis/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
44a3('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugasu dam pa bcom ldan 'das le snyun mi mnga' 'am/gnod pa ma mchis sam zo bdog bde'am/sku nyams
44a4('bum): dang ldan nam/bde ba dang /dgyes par spyod dma? zhes 'dri ste/pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
44a5('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pas/bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das de
44a6('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/pad+mo de dag bzhes nas/nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi
44a7('bum): khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gong na ba~M der gtor to//de nas pad+mo de dag
44b1('bum): gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/pad+mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid
44b2('bum): brtsams te chos ston to//chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par
44b3('bum): gyur to//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dang khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang /rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/
44b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pA la rim gror byas so bkur stir byas so//phu dud du byas so//
44b5('bum): mchod pa byas so//de nas 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/'jig rten gyi kha ma pad+mo zhes bya ba yod de/de na de
44b6('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang drug par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo'i dpalo zhes bya ba bzhugasla shing 'tsho skyong ste/de byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po rnams
44b7('bum): la/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad de//de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de ni bya chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+mo 'am pa zhes
45a1('bum): bya ba 'dug 'dug pas snang ba chen po de dang /sa cher g.yos pa de dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/bcom ldan
45a2('bum): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo'i dpal gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
45a3('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsil to//bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang /dog sa 'di
45a4('bum): ltar cher g.yos pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu/ci'i rkyen/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
45a5('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo'i dpal gyis/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+mo dam pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi
45a6('bum): bu 'di ni steng gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces byi ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
45a7('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo //de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la/shes rab kyi pha
45b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa ston te/'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+mo dam pas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
45b2('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mor dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad der/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
45b3('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang /de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
45b4('bum): chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la
45b5('bum): dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes
45b6('bum): na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad der songs shig/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa ying dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo'i dpal gyis/byang chub sems
45b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+mo dam pa la/pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/gser gyi mdog can stong bskur te/rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
46a1('bum): pA drug bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la pad+mo 'di dag gis gtor cig/rigs kyi bu spangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod/
46a2('bum): par spyod cig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/der nyams par
46a3('bum): gyur ta re/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+mo dam pas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
46a4('bum): pad+mo'i dpal de lasau/pad+mo ga sder gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag bla raswa te/byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang /rab tu byung ba dang /khye'u dang /bu mo'i
46a5('bum): gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas ma snang bar gyur nas/'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang
46a6('bum): ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang /spos dang /bdug spos dang /phreng ba dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /rgyan drang
46a7('bum): gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang /bkur stir bya ba dang /bu dud du bya ba dang /mchod pa byed cing /byang chub sems dpa'i
46b1('bum): rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yod drug pa rdo rje sau pa'i sa mo rgya skra shAkya thub pa gang na//
46b2('bum): pader dang ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag bcol te/phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems
46b3('bum): dpa' chen po pad+mo dam pas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcoms yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
46b4('bum): pad+mo'i dpal/bcom ldan 'das la sbyin mi mnga' 'am/gnod pa ma mchis sam/zo bdag bde 'am/sku nyams dang ldan nam/bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes
46b5('bum): 'dri ste/pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab mi stong drang ldan pa 'di dag kyang /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra ba rnam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo'i
46b6('bum): dpal gyis/bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shA
46b7('bum): thub pas/pad+mo de dag bzhes nas/'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
47a1('bum): sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtoran to//de nus pad+ma dag gis/'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/pad+mo de dag lar
47a2('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing /'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid brtsams te chos ston to//chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur
47a3('bum): pa de dag thams cad kyang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa dang /rab tu byung ba dang /khye'u
47a4('bum): dang /bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge bo'i rtsabs/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i spangs
47a5('bum): rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so//bkur stir byas so//phu dud du byas so//mchod pa byas so//de nas steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye
47a6('bum): ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol no//'jig rten gyi khamos mdangs dga' bo zhes bya ba yod de/don de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
47a7('bum): rgyas dga' ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag
47b1('bum): bskyon pa mdzad //donas tsun gyi khams ngan byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa tshan podag 'bas rgyu pa zhes byu 'jug 'dug pas/snang brgyan pa da/
47b2('bum): brjo dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ldan chog mo shes pa de mthong nas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dge bcom pa yang dge par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pa
47b3('bum): ba'i dpel gang na bder song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' ba'i dpal de la 'di skad ces
47b4('bum): gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'a chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang /dogs 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di
47b5('bum): tsits+tsha/ci'i rkyen/de skad ces gsol ba dang /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa sang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' ba'i dpal gyis byang chub sems
47b6('bum): dpa'i sems dpa' chen po dga' bas byin pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu 'di ni ngag gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'dus pa /
47b7('bum): rkyen gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogaso pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bye ba bzlogs shing 'tsho skyong ngo //
48a1('bum): de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o//de nas byang chub sems
48a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' bas byin pas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' ba'i dpal la 'di skad
48a3('bum): ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang /'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gi shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
48a4('bum): sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang /de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur
48a5('bum): pa gzungs dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ting nge 'dzin dang /snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa/de dag blta ba'i slad du
48a6('bum): mchi'o//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na 'jig rten gyi khams mi
48a7('bum): mjed der songs shig/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' ba'i dpal gyis/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
48b1('bum): chen po dga' bas byin pA la/pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/gser gyi mdog can stong bskur te rags kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
48b2('bum): yang drug par rdzogs pa'i spangs rgya sa~M shAkya thub pa de la pad+mo 'di dag gis gtor cig/rigs kyi bu snang sa rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/de ci'i phyir zho na/'jig
48b3('bum): rkyen gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/der nyams par gyur ta ro/de nas byang chub sems dpa'
48b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po dga' bos byin pas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' ba'i dpal de las/pad+mo gser
48b5('bum): gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa dang /rab tu byung ba dang /khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa
48b6('bum): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/stong gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs
48b7('bum): shing 'tshe skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang /spos dang /bdug spos dang /phreng ba dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /rgyan dang /gdugs dang
49a1('bum): rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang /bkur stir bya ba dang /phu dud du bya ba dang /mchod pa byed cing byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul
49a2('bum): chen po dang byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der
49a3('bum): dong ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag btsal te/phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/byang chub sems dpa'
49a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po dga' bas byin pas/bcom ldan 'ongs la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
49a5('bum): sangs rgyas dga' ba'i dpal/bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/gnod pa ma mchis sam/zo ba dag bde 'am/sku nyams dang ljon nam/bde ba dang /
49a6('bum): dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/pad+mo ga ser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gasnyegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
49a7('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' ba'i dpal gyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
49b1('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/pad+mo de dag bzhes nas/steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dag
49b2('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to//de nas pad+mo de dag gis/'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/
49b3('bum): pad+mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing /'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid brtsams te/chos ston to//chos bstan pa de sems can gang
49b4('bum): gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa dang /rab
49b5('bum): tu byung ba dang /khye'u dang /bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang /rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
49b6('bum): rdzogs pa'i spangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so//bkur stir byas so//phu dud du byas so//mchod pa byas so//de nas de'i tshe skad cig yud tsam thang cig la//
49b7('bum): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che'i rang bzhin du kun nas gnas por gyur te/me tog sol ma sna tshogs kyis kun tu gang ba dang /dar gyi lnga
50a1('bum): dang /chun po kun nas bres pa dang /snod sna tshogs nas bdug spos sna tshogs 'thul ba dang /dpag bsam gyi shing rgyan dang /'bras bu sna tshogs kyi yal
50a2('bum): ga'i rtse mo g.yur za ba dang /me tog gi shing dang /'bras bu'i shing dang /spos kyi shing dang /phreng ba'i shing dang /phye ma'i shing dang /bdug spos kyi shing sna tshogs
50a3('bum): kyis rab tu brgyan pa kun nas gnas par gyur te/'di lta ste/dper na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog kun nas rgyas pa'i
50a4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing grang na/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dug pa dang /lha'i bu blo gros shin tu brtan pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan yang gzi brjid chen
50a5('bum): po dag 'khod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams pad+mo can bzhin du gyur to//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o///
50a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam pa gsum pa//de'i tshe de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/bdud dang bcas pa/tshangs
50a7('bum): pa dang bcas pa/dge sbyong dang bcas pa bram ze'i skye dgu dang bcas pa/lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin dang bcas pa mang po tshogs pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'
50b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa mang po de dag 'dus par thugs su chud nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di
50b2('bum): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po/chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson
50b3('bum): par bya'o//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams
50b4('bum): cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal bas/ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bgyi/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan
50b5('bum): 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gnas pa med pa'i tshul du/shes
50b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/sbyin pa dang /gtong ba dang /yongs su len pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/yongs su gtang ba med pa'i tshul gyis/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
50b7('bum): phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//ltung ba dang mi ltung ba bya ba med pa'i phyir/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//'khrug pa med pa'i phyir/bzod
51a1('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus nyams pa med pa'i phyir/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
51a2('bum): rdzogs par bya'o//'khrug pa med cing yongs su rdzogs pa med pa'i phyir/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i phyir/
51a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/dran po
51a4('bum): nye bar bzhag pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha
51a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/yang dag par spong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir/yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
51a6('bum): sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//shA
51a7('bum): radwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/dbang po mi dmigs pa'i phyir/dbang po lnga yongs su rdzogs par
51b1('bum): shA radwa tI bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/stabs mi dmigs pa'i phyir/stobs lnga yongs su rdzogs pa/
51b2('bum): bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/byang chub kyi yan lag mi dmigs pa'i phyir/byang chub kyi yan
51b3('bum): log bdun yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/lam mi dmigs pa'i phyir/
51b4('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te//stong pa
51b5('bum): nyid mi dmigs pa'i phyir/stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
51b6('bum): gnas te/mtshan mo med pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//shA radwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
51b7('bum): pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/smon pa med pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang
52a1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/bsam gtan mi dmigs pa'i phyir/bAsam gtan bzhi yongs su
52a2('bum): rdzogs par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/tshad med pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/tshad med pa
52a3('bum): bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/gzugs med pa mi dmigs
52a4('bum): pa'i phyir/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol
52a5('bum): tu phyin pa la gnas te/rnam par thar pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
52a6('bum): dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/mthar gyis gnas pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs
52a7('bum): par bya'o//shA radwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/mngon par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/mngon
52b1('bum): par shes pa lnga yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/'du shes dgu bsgom par
52b2('bum): bya'o//'di ltar rnam par bam pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/rnam par bum pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes
52b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/'bu can mi dmigs pa'i phyir/'bu can gyi 'du shes bsgom par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
52b4('bum): chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/rnam par rnags pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/rnam par rnags pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub
52b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/rnam par dmar ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir/rnam par dmar ba'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o///
52b6('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/rnam par sngos pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/rnam par sngos pa'i 'du
52b7('bum): shes bsgom par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/rnam par zos pa mi dmigs pa'i
53a1('bum): phyir/rnam par zlos pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/
53a2('bum): rnam par 'thor ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir/rnam par 'thor ba'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi
53a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/rus po mi dmigs pa'i phyir/rus pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o//shA ro dwa ti'i 'u byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes
53a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ldan pa te/rnam par tshig pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/rnam phrar tshig pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
53a5('bum): sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/mi mthun pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/zas lA ma mthun pa'i 'du shes bsgom por bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i
53a6('bum): /bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/sangs rgyas ma dmigs pa'i pa/sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom
53a7('bum): bo bya'o//shA ra te'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/chos ma dmigs pa'i phyir/chos rjes su dran pa
53b1('bum): bsgom par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/dge 'dun ma dmigs pa'i phyir/dge 'dun rjes
53b2('bum): su dran pa bsgom par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/tshul khrims mi dmigs pa'i phyir//
53b3('bum): tshul khrims rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/gtong ba mi dmigs pa'i
53b4('bum): phyir/gtong ba rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/lha mi dmigs pa'i phyir/
53b5('bum): lho rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba mi
53b6('bum): dmigs pa'i phyir/dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
53b7('bum): gnas te/skyo ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir/skye ba rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
54a1('bum): la gnas te/'chi ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir/'chi ba rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab
54a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/lus mi dmigs pa'i phyir/lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
54a3('bum): pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/mi rtag po mi dmigs pa'i phyir/mi rtag pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
54a4('bum): dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/sdug bsngal mi dmigs pa'i phyir/sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes bsgom par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
54a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/bdag med pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/bdag med pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu
54a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/mi sdug pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/mi sdug pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o//shA
54a7('bum): r-i dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/'chi ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir/'chi ba'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o//
54b1('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/dga' bar mi bya ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir/'jig rten thams cad la dga'
54b2('bum): b.rarla mi bya ba'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o//shA ra dwa tI'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/yid brtan du mi rung ba mi
54b3('bum): dmigs pa'i phyir/yid brtan du mi rung ba'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
54b4('bum): gnas te/sdug bsngal mi dmigs pa'i phyir/sdug bsngal shes pa bsgom par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol
54b5('bum): tu phyin pa la gnas te/kun 'byung ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir/kun 'byung ba shes po bsgom par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes
54b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/'gog pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/'gog pa shes pa bsgom par bya'o//shA ra dwa tI'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
54b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/lam mi dmigs pa'i phyir/lam shes pa bsgom par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
55a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyid pa la gnas te/zad pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/zad pa shes pa bskum par bya'o//shA radwa tI'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
55a2('bum): dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/mi skye ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir/mi skye ba shes pa bsgom par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
55a3('bum): dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/choso mi dmigs pa'i phyir/chos shes pa bsgom par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
55a4('bum): chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/gnyis su med pa mi dmi gros pa'i phyir/gnyis su med pa shes pa bsgom par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
55a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/kun rdzob mi dmigs pa'i phyir/kun rdzob shes pa bsgom por bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub
55a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/'dris pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/'dris pa shes pa bsgom par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu
55a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha ral tu byin pa la gnas te/sgra ji bzhin mo dmigs pa'i phyir/sgra ji bzhin shes pa bsgom par bya'o//
55b1('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/rnam par
55b2('bum): rtog pa dang bcos rnam par dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu
55b3('bum): phyiphyin pa la gnas te/rnam por rtog pa med cing rnam par dayod pa tsa ma mi dmigs pa'o phyir/rnam par rtog pa med cing rnam par dpyod pa tsam gyi rtinge nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par
55b4('bum): bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/rnam par rtog pa med cing rnam par dpyod pa med pa mi dmigs
55b5('bum): po'i phyir/rnam par rtog pa med cing rnam par dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab
55b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/yongs su ma shes pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i dbang po mi dmigs pa'i phyir/yongs su ma shes pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i dbang po
55b7('bum): yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/kun shes pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/
56a1('bum): kun shes pa'i dbang po yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//shA radwa tI'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/
56a2('bum): te/kun shes pa rig pa'i dbang po mi dmigs pa'i phyir/kun shes pa rig pa'i dbang po yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
56a3('bum): chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched mi dmigs pa'i phyir/zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched yongs su rdzogs par bya'o///
56a4('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/chub pa'i skye mched mi dmigs pa'i phyir/chub pa'i skye mched yongs
56a5('bum): su rdzogs par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/dngos po mi dmigs pa'i phyir/bsdu ba'i
56a6('bum): dngos po bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/rnam par dgod pa mi
56a7('bum): dmigs pa'i phyir/rnam par dgod pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
56b1('bum): gnas te/sa mi dmyigs pa'i phyir/sa bcu yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te//
56b2('bum): spyod pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/spyod pa bcu yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/
56b3('bum): bzod pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/bzod pa bcu yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
56b4('bum): gnas te/lhag pa'i bsam pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/lhag pa'i bsam pa nyi shu yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
56b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mi dmigs pa'i phyir/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu
56b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/zhi gnas dang lhag mthong shes pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/zhi granas dang lhag mthong shes
56b7('bum): po yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/rig pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/rig pa
57a1('bum): gsum yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/so so
57a2('bum): yang dag par rig pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpo' sems dpa' chen pos shes
57a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/mi 'jigs pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
57a4('bum): dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ma nyams pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ma nyams pa'i mngon par shes pa lnga yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//
57a5('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su
57a6('bum): rdzogs par bya'o//shA ra dwa tI'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/nor mi dmigs pa'i phyir nor bdun yongs su
57a7('bum): rdzogs par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/rnam par rtog pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/skyes
57b1('bum): bu chen po'i rnam par rtog pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdus te/soms/
57b2('bum): can gyi glanas mi dmigs pa'i phyir/sems can gyi gnos dgu yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyis
57b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs mi dmigs pa'i phyir/de bzhin gshegs po'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang
57b4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ba
57b5('bum): brgyad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnos te/byamos pa chen po mi dmigs
57b6('bum): pa'i phyir/byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/snying
57b7('bum): rje chen po mi dmigs pa'i phyir/snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
58a1('bum): gnas te/dga' ba chen po mi dmigs pa'i phyir/dga' ba chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
58a2('bum): chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/btang snyoms chen po mi dmigs pa'i phyir/btang snyoms chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//thams cad mkhyen pa'i
58a3('bum): ye shes rnam pa'i mchog thams cod dang ldan pa mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson por bya'o//
58a4('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o//thams
58a5('bum): cad shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o//sems can thams cad kyi sems
58a6('bum): dang spyod pa dang /shes pa'i rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson//
58a7('bum): par bya'o//ngag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
58b1('bum): brtson par bya ste/shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i skyon
58b2('bum): med par 'jug par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//nyon thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyis shes par 'dod//
58b3('bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa lam 'da' bor 'dod pa'i byang chub
58b4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes
58b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//mngon par shes pa drug la gnas par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//
58b6('bum): sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa rnam par g.yo ba shes par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//
58b7('bum): nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes zil gyis gnon par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslob par
59a1('bum): bya'o//gzungs kyi sgo dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po thob par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
59a2('bum): bslab par bya'o//nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo sbyin pa gtong ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad rjes su yi rang ba
59a3('bum): dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig gis zil gyis gnon par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//
59a4('bum): nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo tshul khrims bsrung ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i
59a5('bum): sems bskyed pa gcig gis zil gyis gnon par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//nyan thos dang /
59a6('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo rnams bzod pa sgom pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa
59a7('bum): gcig gis zil gyis gnon par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas
59b1('bum): kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo brtson 'grus rtsom pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig gis zil gyis gnon
59b2('bum): par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang
59b3('bum): rigs kyi bu mo bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dog thams cad rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyod pa gcig gis zil gyis gnon par
59b4('bum): 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs
59b5('bum): kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig gis zil gyis gnon par 'dod pa'i
59b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /
59b7('bum): shes rab dang /rnam par grol ba dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig gis zil gyis gnon par 'dod pa'i byang chub
60a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsla' bar bya'o//nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsam gtan dang /
60a2('bum): rnam par thar pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rjes su yo rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig gis zil gyis gnon par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems
60a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//sems can thams cad kyi don du sbyin pa chung ngu byin yang thabs mkhas pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
60a4('bum): nyid du yongs su bsngo ba'i tshul gyis ji lta bur na tshad med grangs med dpag tu med par 'gyur snyam na'ang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
60a5('bum): pa la bslab par bya'o//sems can thams cad kyi don du tshul khrims chung ngu bsrungs kyang /thabs mkhas pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsngos pa'i tshul gyis ji lta bur
60a6('bum): na tshad med grangs med dpag tu med par 'gyur snyam na'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lo bslab par bya'o//sems can thams cad kyi
60a7('bum): don du bzod pa chung ngu bsgom kyang /thabs mkhas pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba'i tshul gyis ji lta bur na tshad med grangs med dpag tu med par 'gyur/
60b1('bum): snyam na'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//sems can thams cad kyi don du brtson 'grus chung ngu brtsams kyang /thabs
60b2('bum): mkhas pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba'i tshul gyis ji lta bur na tshad med grangs med dpag tu med par 'gyur snyam na'ang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
60b3('bum): pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//sems can thams cad kyi don du bsam gtan chung ngu mnyam par bzhag kyang /thabs mkhas pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
60b4('bum): pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba'i tshul gyis ji lta bur na tshad med grangs med dpag tu med par 'gyur snyam na'ang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
60b5('bum): la bslab par bya'o//sems can thams cad kyi don du shes rab chung ngu bsgom kyang thabs mkhas pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba'i tshul gyis ji lta bur no tshad
60b6('bum): med grangs med dpag tu med par 'gyur snyam nu'ang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang
60b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par 'dod pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pas/shes rab kyi
61a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par 'dod pa dang /
61a2('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhon yang byang chub sems dpa'
61a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par 'dod pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
61a4('bum): bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par 'dod pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
61a5('bum): phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
61a6('bum): bosam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par 'dod pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya bor 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu
61a7('bum): phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par 'dod pa dang /shes rab
61b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
61b2('bum): sems 'di ltar bskyed de/ji ltar na tshe ribs thams cad du bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi sku mthong bar 'gyur/ji ltar na sangs rgyas kyis bskul bar 'gyur/ji ltar na sangs rgyas kyis
61b3('bum): dgongs par 'gyur/ji ltar na sangs rgyas mnyes par 'gyur/ji ltar na sangs rgyas kyis yongs su bzung bar 'gyur snyam na'ang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab
61b4('bum): par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su bsgrub par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par
61b5('bum): bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis thob par 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//
61b6('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu thob par 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i
61b7('bum): bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe rabs thams cad du tshe rabs dran pa thob par 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA
62a1('bum): radwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi sems myi stor ba thob par 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par
62a2('bum): bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mi nyams pa thob par 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
62a3('bum): la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig to'o mdza' bo dang /sdig to'i grogs po thams cad spang bar 'dod pas/shes
62a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i bshes gnyen sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems
62a5('bum): /dpa' thams cad bsnyen bkur bar 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
62a6('bum): po bdud dang /bdud kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha thams cad pham par bya bar 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab por bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang
62a7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyang bar 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang
62b1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad la bsgrib pa med pa thob par 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang
62b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i rigs yongs su bsgrub par 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu
62b3('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi rigs bsgrub par 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan
62b4('bum): yang byang chubo sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi bcad pa'i don du gnas par 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab
62b5('bum): par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhon nu'i sa thob par 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//
62b6('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang mi 'bral bar 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu
62b7('bum): phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i sa las 'da' bar 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu
63a1('bum): phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa yongs su rdzogs pa
63a2('bum): bar 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba dang rnam pa gang dang gang gis
63a3('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rol gror bya ba dang /dkur stir bya ba dang /phu dud du bya ba dang /mchod par bya ba dang /de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang /rnam pa de
63a4('bum): dag phun sum tshogs par 'gyur par dga' bas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems
63a5('bum): can thams cad yongs su dga' bar bya bar 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
63a6('bum): po sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
63a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po zas dang /skom dang /gos dang /rgyan dang /me tog dang /bdug spos dang /spos dang /phreng po dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /mal cha dang /
63b1('bum): stan dang /gnas dang /nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang /yo byad dang /nor dang 'bru dang /lhab lbub dang /nor bu dang /mu tig dang /bai DUr+ya dang /dung dang /man shol dang /byu ru dang /sa
63b2('bum): lo sbram dang /dngul dang /bza' shing gi ra ba dang /rgyal po'i srid la sogs pa yo byad dang /longs spyod thams cad kyis sems can thams cad yongs su tshim par bya'o snyam na'ang
63b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' se mos dpa' chen po phyogs thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung /
63b4('bum): bye ma snyed dag na sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad dge ba bcu'i los kyi lam la dgod par 'dod pa dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /mngon
63b5('bum): par shes pa lnga dang /gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /sangs rgyas dang /chos dang /dge 'dun la mos pa thob pa la dgod par 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab
63b6('bum): par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa'i
63b7('bum): sems can thams cad theg pa chen po lo gzud par 'dod pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par 'dod pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par 'dod pa dang /
64a1('bum): brjod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par 'dod pa nga/brdzun 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par 'dod pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par
64a2('bum): 'dod pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
64a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i sems bskyed pa gcig 'ga' yang snying po byang chub la nam 'jug gri bar du mi zad par bya bar 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
64a4('bum): bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhon yang shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma skyed dag na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de
64a5('bum): dag thams cad bdag gi yon tan brjod par dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//lho phyogs kyi 'jig/
64a6('bum): rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad bdag gi yon tan brjod par dga' bo'i byang chub

64b6('bum): bzhugs pa de dag thams cad bdag gi yon tan brjod par dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//lho nub
64b7('bum): kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs paM de dag thams cad bdag gi yon tan brjod par
65a1('bum): dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi

67b1('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang stong pa nyid la gnas par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa'
67b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po phyi stong pa nyid la gnas par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyi nang stong pa nyid la

67b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chen po stong pa nyid la gnas par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//byang chub

68b1('bum): pa la bslab par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dngos pa med pa'i nga sa nyid stong pa nyid la gnas par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol sbyin pa bslab par bya'o//shA ra tI/
