68b3('bum): bya'o//shA rodwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa dang /mtshan nyid khong du chud par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgrub par bya/
68b4('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid khong du chud par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//
68b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma nor ba de bzhin nyid khong du chud par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
68b6('bum): chen po gzhan ma yin pa'i de bzhin nyid khong du chud par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
68b7('bum): 'gyur ba med pa'i de bzhin nyid khong du chud par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgrub par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dge pa ji lta ba'i de bzhin/
69a1('bum): nyid khong du chud par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams
69a2('bum): cad kyi chos kyi dbyings khong du chud par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
69a3('bum): thams cad kyi yang dag pa'i mtha' khong du chud par 'dod pasu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
69a4('bum): chen po stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad shes par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab
69a5('bum): par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgya mtsho chen po dang /chu klung dang /chu klung
69a6('bum): chen po dang /chu bran dang /lteng ka dang /mtsho dang /rdzing dang /lu ma dag gi chu'i phung po de dag thams cad skra'i rtse mo brgyar bshags pas gyen du slong bar 'dod pa dang /
69a7('bum): de la gnas pa'i srog chags rnams la'ang gnod par mi 'gyur bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
69b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na me'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad 'di lta ste dper na/bskal pa'i me ltar me lce gcig tu
69b2('bum): 'bar bar gyur na'ang /de ltar me lce 'bar bde kha'i dbugs gcig gis zhi bar bya bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang
69b3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khrims na/rlung gi dkyil 'khor ji snyed cig yod pa de dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
69b4('bum): rten gyi khams 'di'ang 'di lta ste dper na/phub ma spar gang la bya ba ltar gter g.yad de/rnam par 'jig par byed pa de lta bur rnam par 'thor ba chen po'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor
69b5('bum): sor mo gcig gi rtse mos yongs su kheb par bya bar 'dod pa dang /gzhil bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
69b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi nam mkha'i dbyings ji tsam pa de thams cad skyil mo krung gcig gis rgyas par dgang bar 'dod pas shes

77a1('bum): rang byang chub la dgod par 'dod pa dang /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la dgod par 'dod pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dgod par 'dod pa dang /

77a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na/sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg
77a4('bum): pa dang /theg pa chen pos yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
77a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /sbyin pa gtong ba'i tshe/'di ltar bsgrub par bya ste/sbyin pa rnam pa 'di ltar byin no ni 'bras bu chen por
77a6('bum): 'gyur/sbyin pa 'di ltar byin nA ni rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye/sbyin pa 'di ltar byin na ni/blam zi che zhing mutho ba'i rigs su skyi/sbyin pa 'di ltar byin na
77a7('bum): ni/khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye/sbyin pa 'di ltar byin ni ni sbyin pa de nyid la gnas pas/rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i nang du skye/sbyin pa 'di ltar byin na
77b1('bum): nI/sbyin pa de nyid la gnas pas/sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i nang du skye/sbyin pa 'di ltar byin na ni/sbyin pa de nyid la gnas pas/mtsho ma'i lha'i nang du skye/sbyin pa 'di ltar byin na ni//
77b2('bum): sbyin pa de nyid la gnas pas/dka' ldan gyi lha'i nang du skye/sbyin pa 'di ltar byin na ni/smyon pa de nyid lo gnas pas/'phrul dga'i lha'i nang du skye/sbyin po 'di ltar byin ni ni/sbyin pa de//
77b3('bum): nyid la gnas pas/gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i nang du skye/sbyin pa 'di ltar byin na no//sbyin pa de nyid la gnas pas/srasam gtan dang po 'byung bar 'gyur/sbyin pa 'di ltar byin
77b4('bum): na ni/sbyin pa de nyid la gnas pas/bsam gtan gnyis pa 'byung bar 'gyur/sbyin pa 'di ltar byin na ni/sbyin pa de nyid la gnas pas/bsam gtan gsum pa 'byung bar
77b5('bum): 'gyur/sbyin pa 'di ltar byin na ni/sbyin pa de nyid la gnas pas/bsam gautan bzhi pa 'gyur bar 'gyur/sbyin pa 'di ltar byin na ni/sbyin pa de nyid la gnas pas/nam
77b6('bum): mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi mnyam par bzhag pa la snyoms par 'jug par 'gyur/sbyin pa 'di ltar byin na ni/sbyin pa de nyid lo gnas pas/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched
77b7('bum): kyi mnyam par bzhag pa la snyoms par 'jug par 'gyur/sbyin pa 'di ltar byin na ni/sbyin pa de nyid la gnas pas/cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi mnyam par bzhag pa lo snyoms
78a1('bum): par 'jug par 'gyur/sbyin pa 'di ltar byin na ni/sbyin pa de nyid la gnas pas/'du shes med 'du shes mod min skye mchod kyi mnyam par bzhag pa la snyoms
78a2('bum): par 'jug par 'gyur/sbyin pa 'di ltar byin na ni/dran pa nye bar bzhag po bzhi 'byung bar 'gyur/sbyin pa 'di ltar byin nu ni/yang dag par spong ba bzhi 'byung bar 'gyur//
78a3('bum): sbyin pa 'di ltar byin na ni/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi 'byung bar 'gyur/sbyin pa 'di ltar byin na ni/dbang po lnga 'byung bar 'gyur/sbyin pa 'di ltar byin na ni/stobs lnga
78a4('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ro/sbyin pa 'di ltar byin na ni/byang chub kyi yan lag bdun 'byung bar 'gyur/sbyin pa 'di ltar byin na ni/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'byung
78a5('bum): bar 'gyur/sbyin pa 'di ltar byin ni no/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa 'byung bar 'gyur/sbyin pa 'di ltar byin na ni//
78a6('bum): rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur/sbyin pa 'di ltar byin na ni/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur/sbyin pa 'di ltar byin na ni/phyir mi 'ong
78a7('bum): po'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur/sbyin pa 'di ltar byin na ni/dgra bcom pa nyid thob por 'gyur/sbyin pa 'di ltar byin na ni/rong byang chub thob par 'gyur/sbyin pa
78b1('bum): 'di ltar byin nano/blon mong pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur zhes bya ba bsgrub par byag/shU d+ya ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
78b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mkhas pas sbyin pa 'di ltar byin pa 'o//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//sbyin pa 'di ltar byin pa ni/tshul
78b3('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//sbyin po 'di ltar byin pa ni/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//sbyin pa 'di ltar byin pa ni/bcan
78b4('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byeng ngo //skyon pa 'di ltar byin pa ni/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//sbyin pa 'di ltar byin pa ni/
78b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do zhes bya bar rab tu shes so///shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam po bzhi pa
78b6('bum): de nas tshe dang ldan pA shA ra dwa ti'i bus/bcom ldan 'das lo 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa rnam pa ji lta bur
78b7('bum): stsal na/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyis pa lags/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa ji ltar tshul khrims
79a1('bum): bsrungs na/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyis pa lags/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa ji
79a2('bum): ltar bzod pa bsgoms na/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyis pa lags/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnamapa ji ltar
79a3('bum): brtson 'grus brtsams na/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyis pa lags/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa
79a4('bum): ji ltar bsam gtan la mnyam par bzhag na/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyis pa lags/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems
79a5('bum): dpa' chen pos rnam pa ji ltar shes rab bsgoms na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyis pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
79a6('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu sbyin pa dang /gtong ba dang /yongs su len pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'khor gsum yongs su dag pas/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par
79a7('bum): byas pa yin/de bzhin du ltung ba dang mi ltung ba bya ba med pa'i phyir/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa yin/'khrug pa med pa'i phyir/bzod pa'i
79b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa yin/lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus 'jig pa med pa'i phyir/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa yin//
79b2('bum): 'khrug pa dang rtog pa med pa'i phyir/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa yin/chos thams cad rab tu shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/shes
79b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa yin no//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang /
79b4('bum): ma byon pa dang /da ltar byung ba rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad shes par 'dod pa dang /thob par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//
79b5('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
79b6('bum): bslab par bya'o//shA ro dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos zag po dang bcas pa dang /zlog pa med pa rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'drod pas
79b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos dge ba dang mi dge ba rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin par
80a1('bum): 'dod pas shos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'jig rten pa dang /
80a2('bum): 'jig rten las 'das pa rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab por bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
80a3('bum): dpa' chen po chos gzugs yod pa dang /gzugs med pa rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan
80a4('bum): yang nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos lung bstan du yod pa dang /lung bstan du med pa rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
80a5('bum): pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos nges pa dang ma nges pa rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'dod pas shes rab
80a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'byung ba dang mi 'byung ba rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin par
80a7('bum): 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'grib pa'i tshul can dang khyad par
80b1('bum): gyi tshul can rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po so so'i
80b2('bum): skye bo'i chos dang /'phags po'i chos rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/1/shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems

80b5('bum): bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'dod pas
80b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'dod pas/
80b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'das pa dang /ma 'ongs po dang /da ltar byung ba
81a1('bum): thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid khong du chud par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
81a2('bum): sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi mi skye ba'i mthar phyin par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
81a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi yang dag pa'i mtha' rtogs par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub
81a4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sngon du 'gro bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ro dwa ti'i bu
81a5('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la rim gror bya bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par
81a6('bum): bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi nang gi 'khor du 'gyur bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi
81a7('bum): pha rol tu yin pa la bsapa par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor mang po dang ldan par 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
81b1('bum): bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor thob par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par

81b4('bum): bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems spang bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par
81b5('bum): bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnod par sems pa'i yid dor bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA
81b6('bum): radwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po le lo'i sems mi bskyed par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan
81b7('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khrug pa'i sems mi bskyed par 'dod pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslob par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub
82a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab 'chal pa'i sems mi bskyed par 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i
82a2('bum): bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po la dgod par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha
82a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i
82a4('bum): dngos po la dgod par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad
82a5('bum): bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po la dgod par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
82a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad rim gro las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po la dgod par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//
82a7('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad dngos po thams cad las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po la dgod par 'dod pas
82b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA radwa tI'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mig lnga rnam pa thams cad du yongs su bsgrub par 'dod pas
82b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//'di lta ste/sha'i mig yongs su bsgrub par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
82b3('bum): bslab par bya'o//lha'i mig yongs su bsgrub par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shes rab kyi mig yongs
82b4('bum): su bsgrub par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//chos kyi mgu yongs su bsgrub par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems
82b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//sangs rgyas kyi spyan yongs su bsgrub par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpo' chen pos
82b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sher phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma'i klung gi bye mya
82b7('bum): snyed dag na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad lha'i mig gis blta bar 'dod pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag chos gang ston
83a1('bum): pa de thams cad lha'i rna bas mnyan par 'dod pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi thugs sems kyis khong du chud par 'dod pa dang /sangs rgyas
83a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sngon gyi sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rjes su dran par 'dod pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi rdzu 'phrul dang /rnam par
83a3('bum): 'phrul pa rnam pa mang po mthong bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lo bslab par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
83a4('bum): gaN+DI'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thamaso cad lha'i mig gis blta bar 'dod pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
83a5('bum): de dag chos gang ston pa de thams cad lha'i rna bas mnyan par 'dod pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi thugs sems kyis khong du chud par 'dod pa dang /
83a6('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sngon gyi sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rjes su dran par 'dod pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi rdzu 'phrul
83a7('bum): dang /rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa mang po mthong por 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po la bslab par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nub phyogs kyi
83b1('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams skang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad lha'i mig gis blta bar 'dod pa dang /sangs rgyas
83b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das de dag chos grong ston pa de thams cad lha'i rna bso mnyan par 'dod pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi thugs sems kyis khong du chud par 'dod pa dang /
83b3('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sngon gyi sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rjes su dran par 'dod pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi rdzu 'phrul dang /rnam
83b4('bum): par 'phrul pa rnam pa mang po mthong bar 'dod paso shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i
83b5('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad lha'i mig gis blta bar 'dod pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag chos
83b6('bum): gang ston pa de thams cad lha'i rna bas mnyan par 'dod pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi thugs sems kyis khong du chud par 'dod pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
83b7('bum): de dag gi sngon gyi sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rjes su dran par 'dod pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi rdzu 'phrul dang /rnam par 'phrul pa rnam
84a1('bum): pa mang po mthong bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyu
84a2('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad lha'i mig gis blta bar 'dod pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom
84a3('bum): ldan 'das de dag chos gang ston pa de thams cad lha'i rna bas mnyan par 'dod pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi thugs sems kyis khong du chud par 'dod pa dang /
84a4('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sngon gyi sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rjes su dran par 'dod pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi rdzu 'phrul
84a5('bum): dang /rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa mang po mthong bar 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shar lho'i
84a6('bum): phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad lha'i mig gris blta bar
84a7('bum): 'dod pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag chos gang ston pa de thams cad lha'i rna bas mnyan par 'dod pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi thugs sems
84b1('bum): kyis khong du chud par 'dod pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sngon gyi sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rjes su dran par 'dod pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan
84b2('bum): 'das de dag gi rdzu 'phrul dang /rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa mang po mthong bar 'dod pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lho nub/
84b3('bum): kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag nA/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dog thams cad lha'i mig gis blta bar 'i dang
84b4('bum): pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag chos gang ston pa de thams cad lha'i rna bsnga mnyan par 'dod pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi thugs sems kyis khong du chud par
84b5('bum): 'dod pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sngon gyi sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rjes su dran par 'dod pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag/
84b6('bum): gi rdzu 'phrul dang /rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa mang po mthong por 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nub
84b7('bum): byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig bzhugos pa de dog thams cad lha'i mig gis blta bar 'dod po
85a1('bum): dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag chos gang ston pa de thams cad lha'i rna bas mnyan par 'dod pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi thugs sems
85a2('bum): kyis khong du chud par 'dod pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sngon gyi sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rjes su dran par 'dod pa dang /sangs rgyas
85a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das de dag gi rdzu 'phrul dang /rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa mang po mthong por 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po la bslab par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa'
85a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad lha'i
85a5('bum): mig gis blta bar 'dod pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag chos gang ston pa de thams cad lha'i rna bas mnyan par 'dod pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de
85a6('bum): ngadag gi thugs sems kyis khong du chud par 'dod pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sngon gyi sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rjes su dran par
85a7('bum): 'dod pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi rdzu 'phrul dang /rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa mang po mthong bar 'dod pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab
85b1('bum): par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig bzhugs pa/
85b2('bum): de dag thams cad lha'i mig gis blta bar 'dod pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag chos gang stod pa de thams cad lha'i rna bas mnyan par 'dod pa dang /sangs rgyas
85b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das de dag gi thugs sems kyis khong du chud par 'dod pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sngon gyi sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rjes
85b4('bum): su dran par 'dod pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi rdzu 'phrul dang /rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa mang po mthong bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par
85b5('bum): bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag phyogs bcu kun tu chos gang ston pa de thams cad dran pa'i stobs dang
85b6('bum): shugs bcad du mi chod pas yang dag par gzung bar 'dod pa dang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du de thams cad chud mi za bar bya bar 'dod pas shes
85b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang /
86a1('bum): da ltar byung ba rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi dong dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa mang po mthong bar 'dod pa dang /yongs su bsgrub par 'dod pas shes rab tu
86a2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis mdo dang /dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa
86a3('bum): dang /lung bstan pa dang /tshigs su bcad pa dang /ched du brjod pa dang /gleng gzhi dang /'di ltar 'das pa dang /skyes pa'i rabs dang /shin tu rgyas pa dang /rtogs pa
86a4('bum): brjod pa dang /gtan la bab par bstan pa dang /chos rmad du byung ba nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyis ma thos pa gang ci bstan kyang rung ste/de dag thams cad thos par 'dod
86a5('bum): pa dang /gzung bar 'dod pa dang /bcang bar 'dod pa dang /klag par 'dod pa dang /yongs su chub par bya bar 'dod pa dang /ma nor bar nan tan du bya bar 'dod pa dang /gzhan
86a6('bum): la'ang rgya cher bstan par 'dod pa dang /yang dag par bstan par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
86a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shar phyogs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis gsungs pa dang /gsung ba dang /gsung bar 'gyur ba gang ci 'di rung ste/de thams
86b1('bum): cad mnyan par 'dod pa dang /gzung bar 'dod pa dang /bcang bar 'dod pa dang /klag par 'dod pa dang /yongs su chub par bya bar 'dod pa dang /gzhan la'ang rgya cher yang dag par
86b2('bum): bstan par 'dod pa dang /de la'ang ma nor bar nan tan du bya bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lho phyogs su sangs
86b3('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis gsungs pa dang /gsung ba dang /gsung bar 'gyur ba gang ci'ang rung ste/de thams cad mnyan par 'dod pa dang /gzung bar 'dod pa dang /
86b4('bum): bcang bar 'dod pa dang /klag par 'dod pa dang /yongs su chub par bya bar 'dod pa dang /gzhan la'ang rgya cher yang dag par bstan par 'dod pa dang /de la'ang ma nor bar nan
86b5('bum): tAn du bya bar 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nub phyogs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad
86b6('bum): kyis gsungs pa dang /gsung ba dang /gsung bar 'gyur ba gang ci 'ong rung ste/de thams cad mnyan par 'dod pa dang /gzung bar 'dod pa dang /bcang bar 'dod pa dang /klag

87b1('bum): ba dang /gsung bar 'gyur ba gang ci'ang rung ste/de thams cad mnyan par 'dod pa dang /gzung bar 'dod pa dang /bcang bar 'dod pa dang /klag par 'dod pa dang /yongs su chub par//

88b1('bum): phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/mun pa mun nag smag tu gyur pa smag gis khyab pa/nyi ma dang zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di ltar gzi brjid che la/
88b2('bum): 'di ltar mthu che ba gnyis kyis kyang /lham mor mi rung /lhan nerA mi rung lhang nger mi rung ba de lta bu thams cad snang bar bya bar 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par
88b3('bum): bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag ni/mun pa mun nag smug tu gyur pa/smag gis khyab pa/nyi ma
88b4('bum): dong zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing /'di ltar gzi brjid tshe la/'di ltar mthu che ba gnyis kyis kyang /lham mer ma rung lhan ner mi dang /lhang nger mi rung ba de lta bu thams cad snang bar bya/
88b5('bum): bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/mun pa
88b6('bum): mun nag smag tu gyur pa smag gis khyab pa/nyi ma dang zlo ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing /'di ltar gzi brjid che la/'di ltar mthu che ba gnyis kyis kyang /lham mer mi rung ldan ner mi
88b7('bum): rung /lhang nger mi rung ba de lta bu thams cad snang bar bya bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi
89a1('bum): khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/mun pa mun nag smag tu gyur pa/smag gis khyab pa/nyi ma dang zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing /'di ltar gzi brjid che la/'di
89a2('bum): ltar mthu che ba gnyis kyis kyang /lham mer mi rung /lhan ner mi rung /lhang nger mi rung ba de lta bu thams cad snang bar bya bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//byang
89a3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams grang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/mun pa mun nag smag tu gyur pa/smag gis khyab pa/nyi

89a5('bum): thams cad snang bar bya bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi
89a6('bum): khams grang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/mun pa mun nug smag tu gyur pa/smug gis khyab pa/nyi ma dang zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing /'di ltar gzi brjid che la/'di ltar mthu
89a7('bum): che ba gnyis kyis kyang /lham mer mi rung /lhan nor me rung /lhang nger mi rung ba de lta bu thams cad snang bar bya bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/
89b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma skyed dag na/mun pa mun naka smag tu gyur pa/smag gis khyab pa/nyi ma
89b2('bum): dang zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing /'di ltar gzi brjid che la/'di ltar mthu che ba gnyis kyis kyang /lham mer mi rung /lhan ner mi rung /lhang nger mi rung ba de lta bu thams cad snang bar
89b3('bum): bya bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/
89b4('bum): mun pa mun nag smag tu gyur pa smag gis khyab pa/nyi ma dang zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing /'di ltar gzi brjid che la/'di ltar mthu che ba gnyis kyis kyang /lham mer mi rung /lhan nor mi rung
89b5('bum): lhung nger mi rung ba de lta bu thams cad snang bar bya bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten
89b6('bum): gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma sred dag na/mun pa mun nag smag tu gyur pa/smag gis khyab pa/nyi ma dang zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di ltar glazi brjid che la/'di ltar mthu che ba
89b7('bum): gnyis kyis kyang /lham me ma rung /lhan nar mi rung /lteng nger mi rung ba de lta bu thams cad snang bar bya bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//byang chub
90a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skyong gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/mun pa mun nas smag tu gyur pa/smug gis khyab pa/nyi ma
90a2('bum): dang zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing /'di ltar gzi brjid che la/'di ltar mthu che ba gnyis kyis kyang /lham mir mi rung /lhan ner mi rung /lhang nger mi rung ba de lta bu thams
90a3('bum): cad snang bar bya bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten
90a4('bum): gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed ji snyed pa gang du sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang /chos kyi skye dang /dge 'dun gyi sgra sems can rnams kyis mi thos pa de lta bu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
90a5('bum): dag tu sems can de dag thams cad kyis/sangs rgyas dang /chos dang /dge 'dun gyi sgra thos par bya bar 'dod pa dang /yang dag pa'i lta ba la dgod par 'dod pas
90a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed ji
90a7('bum): snyed pa gang du sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang /chos kyi sgra dang /dge 'dun gyi sgra sems can rnams kyi mi thos pa de lta bu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu sems can de dag thams cad
90b1('bum): kyis sangs rgyas dang /chos dang /dge 'dun gyi sgra thos par bya bar 'dod pa dang /yang dag po'i lta ba la dgod par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA radwa
90b2('bum): ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed ji snyed pa gang du sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang chos kyi sgra dang /dge 'dun gyi sgra
90b3('bum): sems can rnams kyis mi thos pa de lta bu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu sems can de dag thams cad kyis sangs rgyas dang /chos dang /dge 'dun gyi sgra thos par bya bar 'dod pa dang /
90b4('bum): yang dag pa'i lta ba la dgod par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi
90b5('bum): khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed ji snyed pa gang du sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang /chos kyi sgra dang /dge 'dun gyi sgra sems can rnams kyis ma thos pa de lta bu'i 'jig rten gyi khams ngag tu sems
90b6('bum): can de dag thams cad kyis sangs rgyas dang /chos dang /dge 'dun gyi sgra thos par bya bar 'dod pa dang /yang dag pa'i lta ba la dgod par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
90b7('bum): bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed ji snyed pa gang du sangs rgyas kyi
91a1('bum): sgra dang /chos kyi sgra dang /dge 'dun gyi sgra sems can rnams kyis ma thos pa de lta bu'i 'jig rten gyi khams drug tu sems can de dag thams cad kyis sangs rgyas
91a2('bum): dang chos dang dge 'dun gyi sgra thos par bya bar 'dod pa dang /yang dag pa'i lta ba la dgod par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub
91a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shor lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed ji snyed pa gang du sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang /chos kyi sgra dang /dge 'dun
91a4('bum): gyi sgra sems can rnams kyis mi thos pa de lta bu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu sems can de dag thams cad kyis spangs rgyas dang /chos dang dge 'dun gyi sgra thos par bya bar 'dod
91a5('bum): pa dang /yang dag pa'i lta ba la dgod par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lho nub kyi
91a6('bum): phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed ji snyed pa gang du sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang /chos kyi sgra dang /dge 'dun gyi sgra sems can rnams kyi mi thos pa de lta bu'i
91a7('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu sems can de dag thams cad kyis sangs rgyas dang /chos dang dge 'dun gyi sgra thos par bya bar 'dod pa dang /yang dag pa'i lta ba la dgod par 'dod pas
91b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed //
91b2('bum): snyed pa gang du sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang /chos kyi sgra dang dge 'dun gyi sgra sems can rnams kyis mi thos pa de lta bu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu sems can de dag thams cad kyis sangs rgyas
91b3('bum): dang /chos dang dge 'dun gyi sgra thos par bya bar 'dod pa dang /yang dag pa'i lta ba la dgod par 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang
91b4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed ji snyed pa gang du sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang /chos kyi sgra dang /dge 'dun gyi sgra sems
91b5('bum): can rnams kyis mi thos pa de lta bu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu sems can de dag thams cad kyis sangs rgyas dang /chos dang /dge 'dun gyi sgra thos par bya bar 'dod pa dang /yang
91b6('bum): dgra pa'i lta bu la dgod par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
91b7('bum): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed ji snyed pa gang du sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang /chos kyi sgra dang /dge 'dun gyi sgra sems can rnams kyis mi thos pa de lta bu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu sems can de dag
92a1('bum): thams cad kyis sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun gyi sgra thos par bya bar 'dod pa dang /yang dag pa'i lta ba la dgod par 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/
92a2('bum): la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/sems can long
92a3('bum): bab ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad bdag gi mthus/mig gis gzugs mthong ba dang /'on pa rnams rna bas sgra thos pa dang /spyod pa rnams don pa thob pa dang /gos med pa
92a4('bum): rnams gos thob pa dang /bkres pa dang skom pa rnams zas dang skom thob pa dang /nad pa rnams nad 'tsho bar 'gyur ba dang /btsun ra dang /khri mun na 'khod pa rnams bdag gi
92a5('bum): rdzu 'phrul dang /bdag gi mthus dga' mgur 'dong du yod par bya'o snyam na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
92a6('bum): sems dpa' chen po lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/sems can long ba ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad bdag gi mthus/mig gis
92a7('bum): gzugs mthong ba dang /'on pa rnams rna bas sgra thos pa dang /smyon pa rnams dran pa thob pa dang /gos med pa rnams gos thob pa dang /bkres pa dang skom pa rnams zas
92b1('bum): dang sgom thob pa dang /nad pa rnams nad 'tsho bar 'gyur ba dang /bac+doMn+dar dang /khri mun na 'khod pa rnams bdag gi rdzu 'phrul dang /bdag gi mthus dga' mgur 'dod du yod par bya'o snyam
92b2('bum): nu'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA radwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag ni/
92b3('bum): sems can long ba ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad bdag gi mthus/mig gis gzugs mthong ba dang /'on pa rnams rna bas sgra thos pa dang /spyod pa rnams dran pa thob pa dang /
92b4('bum): gos med pa rnams gos thob pa dang /bkres pa dang skom pa rnams zas dang skom thob pa dang /nad pa rnams nad 'tsho bar 'gyur ba dang /btson ra dang khri mun na 'khod pa rnams bdag gi
92b5('bum): rdzu 'phrul dang /bdag gi mthus dga' mgur 'dod du yod par bya'o snyam na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
92b6('bum): chen po byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gaN+DI'i klung gi bye ma snyed dgan sems can long ba ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad podag gi mthus mig gis gozugs mthong ba dang /'on pa rnams
92b7('bum): rna bas sgro thos pa dang /smyod pa rnams dran pa thob pa dang /gos med pa rnams gos thob pa dang /bkres pa dang sgom pa rnams zas dang skom thob pa dang /nang pa rnams nad 'tsho bar 'gyur
93a1('bum): dang /btsun+da ra dang khri mun na 'khod pa rnams bdag gi rdzu 'phrul dang /bdag gi mthus dga' mgur 'dong du yod par bya'o snyam na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
93a2('bum): bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/sems can long
93a3('bum): ba ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cod bdag gi mthus mig gis gzugs mthong ba dang /'on pa rnams rna bas sgra thos pa dang /smon pa rnams dran pa thob pa dang /gos med pa rnams
93a4('bum): gos thob pa dang /bkres pa dang skom pa rnams zas dang skom thob pa dang /nad pa rnams nad 'tsho bar 'gyur ba dang /btson ra dang khri mun na 'khod pa rnams bdag gi rdzu 'phrul dang /
93a5('bum): bdag gi mthus dga' mgur 'dong du yod par bya'o snyam na'ang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shar lho'i
93a6('bum): phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gaung+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/sems can long ba ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad bdag gi mthus mig gis gzugs mthong ba dang /
93a7('bum): 'on pa rnams rna bas sgra thos pa dang /smon pa rnams dran po thob pa dang /gos med pa rnams gos thob pa dang /bkres pa dang skom pa rnams zas dang skom thob pa dang /nad pa rnams nad
93b1('bum): 'tsho bar 'gyur ba dang /btson ra dang khri mun na 'khod pa rnams bdag gi rdzu 'phrul dang /bdag gi mthus dga' mgur 'dod du yod par bya'o snyam na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab
93b2('bum): par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/sems can long ba ji snyed
93b3('bum): cig yod pa de dag thams cad bdag gi mthus mig gis gzugs mthong ba dang /'on pa rnams rna bas sgra thos pa dang /smyon pa rnams dran pa thob pa dang /gos med pa rnams gros tho po
93b4('bum): dang /bkres pa dang skom pa rnams zas dang skom thob pa dang /nad pa rnams nad 'tsho bar 'gyur ba dang /btson ra dang khri mun na 'khod pa rnams bdag gi rdzu 'phrul dang /bdag gi mthus dga'
93b5('bum): mgur 'dod du yod par bya'o snyam nu'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi
93b6('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/sems can long ba ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad bdag gi mthus/mig gis gzugs mthong ba dang /'on pa rnams rna bas
93b7('bum): sgra thos pa dang /smyon pa rnams dran pa thob pa dang /gos med pa rnams gos thob pa dang /bkres pa dang skom pa rnams zas dang skom thob pa dang /nad pa rnams nad 'tsho bar 'gyur ba dang
94a1('bum): btson ra dang khriman na 'khod pa rnams bdag gi rdzu 'phrul dang bdag gi mthus dga' mgur 'dod du yod par bya'o snyam na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab
94a2('bum): par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can long ba ji snyed cig yod pa
94a3('bum): de dag thams cad bdag gi mthus mig gis gzugs mthong ba dang /'on pa rnams rna bas sgra thos pa dang /smyon pa rnams dran pa thob pa dang /gos med pa rnams gos thob pa dang /
94a4('bum): bkres pa dang sgom pa rnams zas dang skom thob pa dang /nad pa rnams nad 'tsho bar 'gyur ba dang /btson rA dang khri mun na 'khod pa rnams bdag gi rdzu 'phrul dang /bdag gi mthus
94a5('bum): dga' mgu de 'dong du yod par bya'o snyam na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgrub par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig
94a6('bum): rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/sems can long ba rdo snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad bdag go mthus mig gis gzugs mthong ba dang /'on po rnams rna bas
94a7('bum): sgra thos pa dang /smyon pa rnams dran pa thob pa dang /gos med pa rnams smos thob pa dang /bkres pa dang skom pa rnams zas dang skom thob pa dang /nad pa rnams nad 'tsho bar
94b1('bum): 'gyur ba dang /btson ra dang khyi mun na 'khod pa rnams bdag gis rdzu 'phrul dang /bdag gis mthus dga' mgur 'dong du yod par bya'o snyam na'ang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
94b2('bum): bslab par bya'o//ji ltar na phyogs bcu kun gyi phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/sems can mi khom pa dang /ngan song du lhung ba sems can dmyal ba pa
94b3('bum): 'am/byol song gi skye gnas pa 'am/gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad bdag gi mthus de nas 'chi 'phos nas/mi'i lus thob par bya snyam ste/sems
94b4('bum): can de dag thams cad tshul khrims la dgod par 'dod pa dang /ting nge 'dzin la dgod par 'dod pa dang /shes rab la dgod par 'dod pa dang /rnam par grol ba la dgod par 'dod pa
94b5('bum): dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la dgod par 'dod pa dang /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par 'dod pa dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dgod par 'dod pa dang /
94b6('bum): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dgod par 'dod pa dang /dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par 'dod pa dang /rang byang chub la dgod par 'dod pa dang /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la dgod par
94b7('bum): 'dod pa dang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//
95a1('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod lam la bslab par 'dod pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod
95a2('bum): pa dang /tshul rnam par dag pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i phrin las dang /gsung gi phrin las dang /thugs kyi phrin las ye shes sngon du 'gro ba yongs su dag pa la bsla
95a3('bum): par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa
95a4('bum): tshe/'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste/ji ltar na bdag go glang po chen po'i lta stangs kyis bltos te/sems can rnams la thogs pa med par chos bstan par 'gyur/ji ltar
95a5('bum): na seng ge chen po'i rnam par bsgyings pos rnam par bsgreng bar 'gyur/ji ltar na bdag gis don yod pa'i rnam par mnan pas rnam par mnan par bya/ji ltar na bdags chen po
95a6('bum): la sor bani tsam gyis rkang pas mi reg par 'gro bar 'gyur/ji ltar na bdag giswA pad+ma ma stong dang ldan pA la rlung pa gnyis kyi mthil bzhug cing nang po'i 'og na gnas pa'i srog chags
95a7('bum): rnams la mi gnod par 'gro bar bya/ji ltar na bdag rkang pa'i mthil 'khor lo rtsibs sbyong dang ldan pa gnyis kyis chen po la rnam par bris te 'gro bar 'gyur/ji ltar na bdag
95b1('bum): sa chen po la 'khor kun tu 'khor la tsam gyi khyon yongs su bskor cing 'chags nu chag par 'gyur/ji ltar na badrags chen po thams cad du rgyu zhing srong yang sa'i rdul gyis mi gos par 'gyur/ji
95b2('bum): ltar na bdag dpag tshad gcig gam/gnyis sam/gsum mam/bzhi 'am/lnga 'am bcu 'am/nyi shu 'am/sum cu 'am/bzhi bcu 'am/lnga bcu 'am/dpag tshad brgya
95b3('bum): 'am/dpag tshad stong ngam/dpag tshad brgya phrag stong ngam/dpag tshad bye ba 'am/dpag tshad bye ba brgya 'am/dpag tshad bye ba stong ngam/dpag tshad bye ba brgya phrag stong ngam/
95b4('bum): dpag tshad bye ba khrag khrig gam/dpag tshad bye ba khrag khrig brgya 'am/dpag tshad bye ba khrig khrig stong ngam/dpag tshod bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong nas/dpag tshad tshad
95b5('bum): med pa 'am/grangs med pa 'am/bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'am/mtshungs pa med pa 'am/mtha' yas pa'am/kun tu mtha' yas pa 'am/gzhal du med pa 'am/brjod du
95b6('bum): med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag tu rgyus te song yang /lus drang sems la dub pa med par 'gyur snyam na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//
95b7('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste/ji ltar na bdag gis rkang
96a1('bum): pa'i mthil 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa gnyis nas 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong bkye ste/mi khom pa dang /ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad
96a2('bum): rab tu zhi bar byas nas/sems can thams cad bde bar bya bar 'gyur snyam na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
96a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste/ji ltar na bdag rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /sum cu rtsa
96a4('bum): gsum dang /mtshe ma dang /dga' ldan dang /'phrul dgo' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /tshongs ris dang /tshangs lha nye phan dang /tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /tshangs
96a5('bum): chen dang /snang ba dang /chung snang dang /tshad med snang ba dang /kun snang dang ba dang /dge ba dang /chung dge dang /tshad med dge ba dang /dge rgyas dang /che ba dang chung che
96a6('bum): dang /tshad med che ba dang /'bras bu che ba dang /mi che ba dang /mi gdung ba dang /gya nom snang ba dang /shin tu mthong ba dang /'og min gyi lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas
96a7('bum): bskor cing mdun du bdar te/snying po byang chub kyi shing drung du 'gro bar bya snyam na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
96b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste/ji ltar na bdag byang chub kyi shing drung du 'dug pa'i tshe/rgyal po chen pa
96b2('bum): bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang /mtshe mo'i lha dang /dga' ldan gyi lha dang /'phrul dga'i lha dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang /tshangs ris kyi lha dang /
96b3('bum): tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha dang /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha dang /tshangs chen gyi lha dang /snang ba'i lha dang /chung snang gi lha dang /tshad med snang ba'i lha dang /kun snang dang ba'i lha dang /
96b4('bum): dge ba'i lha dang chung dge'i lha dang /tshad med dge ba'i lha dang /dge rgyas kyi lha dang /che ba'i lha dang /chung che'i lha dang tshad med che ba'i lha dang /'bras bu che ba'i lha dang /mi che ba'i lha
96b5('bum): dang /mi gdung ba'i lha dang /gya nom snang ba'i lha dang /shin tu mthong ba'i lha dang /'og min gyi lha rnams stan 'ding bar 'gyur snyam na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab
96b6('bum): par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste/ji ltar
96b7('bum): na bdog snying po byang chub la 'dug ste/mtshan gyis legs par brgyan pa'i lag gis sa chen po la brdabs nas/nag pa'i phyogs bdud 'khor dang bcas pa shin tu phom par bya snyam
97a1('bum): na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la
97a2('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste/ji ltar na bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas/'gro ba dang /'greng ba dang /'dug
97a3('bum): po dang /nyal ba'i sa phyogs de dag rdo rje'i rang bzhin du 'dug par 'gyur snyam na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
97a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' tshon pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste/ji ltar na bdag nyi ma gang la mngon par byung ba de nyid kyi nyi ma
97a5('bum): la nag po'i phyogs 'khor dang bcas pa pham par byas te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya mngon par sangs rgyas nas ni ji ltar nyi ma de
97a6('bum): nyid la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya/'khor lo bskor nas ni ji ltar tshad med grangs med pa'i sems can rnams rdul dang bral to/dri ma dang bral nas chos la chos kyi mig
97a7('bum): rnam par dag par bya/tshad med grangs med pa'i sems can rnams ni ji ltar nye bar len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol bar bya/tshad med grangs med
97b1('bum): pa'i sems can rnams ni ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par bya snyam na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang
97b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/'di ltararo sems bskyed par bya ste/ji ltar na bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
97b3('bum): chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i tshe/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni tshed med grangs med par 'gyur/chos bstan pa gcig gis stan gcig pa'i dgra bcom pa ni tshad med grangs med par
97b4('bum): 'gyur/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni tshad
97b5('bum): med grangs med par 'gyur/tsha'i tshad ni dpag tu med par 'gyur/'od dpag tu med pa ni phun sum tshogs par 'gyur snyam na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra
97b6('bum): ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/ji ltar na bdag bla na med pa yang dag
97b7('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i tshe/sangs rgyas kyi zhing der 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug gi sgra 'ang mi grag par bya snyam na'ang shes rab kyi
98a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/sems
98a2('bum): 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/ji ltar na bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i tshe/sangs rgyas kyi shing de'i sems can thams cad 'di ltar sbyin pa/
98a3('bum): ni dge pa'o//dul po ni dge ba'o//sdom pa ni dge ba'o//tshangs par spyod pa ni dge ba'o//srog chags su gyur pa thams cad la 'tshe ba med pa ni dge ba'o zhes bya bar shes pa'i shes rab de
98a4('bum): lta bu dang ldan par 'gyur snyam na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol
98a5('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/ji ltar na bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang rim pa'i chos nub ces bya ba'i sgra 'ang mi grag par 'jum snyam na'ang
98a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/'di
98a7('bum): ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste/ji ltar na bdag gi ming thos pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can mang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
98b1('bum): byang chub tu nges par 'gyur snyam na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang gi tshe de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
98b2('bum): phyin pa la spyod cing yon tan 'di dag sgrub par gyur pa de'i tshe/rgyal po chen po bzhi'ang gang sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la sngon gyi rgyal po chen po rnams kyis phul ba'i lhung bzed rnams
98b3('bum): bdag cag gis kyang 'di la dbul bar bya'o zhes dga' bar 'gyur ro//bdag cag gis 'di la rim gro dang /phu dung du bya'o zhes sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyang dga' bar 'gyur ro//
98b4('bum): mtshe ma'i lha rnams kyang dga' bar 'gyur ro//dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyang dga' bar 'gyur ro//'phrul dga' lha rnams kyang dga' bar 'gyur ro//gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi
98b5('bum): lha rnams kyang dga' bar 'gyur ro//de ltar lha ma yin gyi ris rnams ni 'grib par 'gyur/lha'i ris rnams ni 'phel bar 'gyur te/'di mngon par sangs rgyas nas chos
98b6('bum): kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i don du/bdag cag gis gsol ba gdab par bya'o zhes tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyang dga' bar 'gyur ro//kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams kyang dga' bar 'gyur ro//
98b7('bum): dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyang dga' bar 'gyur ro//'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyang dga' bar 'gyur ro//mi che ba'i lha rnams kyang dga' bar 'gyur ro//mi gdung ba'i lha rnams kyang
99a1('bum): dga' bar 'gyur ro//shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams kyang dga' bar 'gyur ro//rgyu no pa snang ba'i lha rnams kyang dga' bar 'gyur ro//'og min gyi lha rnams kyang dga'/
99a2('bum): bar 'gyur ro//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis rnam par 'phel
99a3('bum): par 'gyur ba de'i tshe/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyang bdag cag ni sems can chen po 'di'i pha dang mi dang /phu nu dang /sring mo dang /
99a4('bum): chung ma dang bu dang bu mo dang mdza' bo dang /blon po dang /gnyen pa shes dang /grogs po dang /ba shes par 'gyur ro snyam ste dga' bar 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa'i
99a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po de la btsun mo'i 'khor dbul lo zhes rgyal po chen po bzhi dang rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang /mtshe ma'i lha dang /dga' ldan
99a6('bum): gyi lha dang /'phrul dga'i lha dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang /tshangs ris kyi lha dang /tshangs lha nye phran gyi lha dang /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha dang /tshangs chen gyi lha
99a7('bum): dang /snang ba'i lha dang /chung snang gi lha dang /tshad med snang ba'i lha dang /kun snang dang ba'i lha dang /dge ba'i lha dang /chung dge'i lha dang /tshad med dge ba'i lha dang /dag
99b1('bum): rgyas kyi lha dang /che ba'i lha dang /chung che'i lha dang /tshad mod che ba'i lha dang /'bras bu che ba'i lha dang /mi che ba'i lha dang /mi gdung ba'i lha dang /shin tu mthong ba'i lha dang /gya nam/
99b2('bum): snang ba'i lha dang /'og mid gyi lha rnams kyang dga' bar 'gyur te/de ni sems can rnams byang chub la dgod pa'i phyir/tshangs par spyod pa yin te/'du ba'i chos rnams kyis yongs
99b3('bum): su 'du ba ma yin no//de 'di ltar smon te/bdag gis sems dang po bskyed nas tshangs paro spyad de tshangs par mi spyod pa med par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'dod pa la bsten pa ni/
99b4('bum): tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye ba la'ang bar du gcod na/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la lta ci smos/de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos na mngon
99b5('bum): papar byung nas tshangs par spyod de/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'i/tshangs par mi spyod pas mi bya'o///
99b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam po lnga pa//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa shA r-i dwa ti'i bus/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
99b7('bum): to//ci lags bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la pha dang ma dang /mchis brang dang /bu dang bu mo gdon mi 'tshal bar 'tshal lam/bcom ldan
100a1('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la la la ni pha dang ma gdon mi za bar dgos kyi/bu dang bu mo dang /chung ma mi
100a2('bum): dgos so//la la la ni pha dang ma dang chung ma dang /bu dang bu mo dag kyang gdon mi za bar dgos so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la la ni sems dang po
100a3('bum): bskyed phyin cad/tshangs pa'i spyod pa yang dag par len te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas kyi bar du gzhon nur gyur par 'khod do//byang
100a4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la la ni thabs mkhas pas sems can yongs su smin por bya ba'i phyir/'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la yongs su spyad de chung ma'i 'khor gyi
100a5('bum): nang nas mngon par byung nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
100a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo la rnam par spyod pa/'dod pa'i nyon mongs po dang bral ba la la ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/'dod pa'i yon tan la yongs su spyod pa'ang
100a7('bum): ston te/nyams kyis yongs su spyod pa med do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/sku mi'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa/sgyu ma'i sngags dang /
100b1('bum): sbyor thabs kyi tshul la shin tu bslab pa de lta bu zhig gis 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga mngon par sprul te/'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po de dag la bdag nyid rtse zhing dga' ba dang /yongs su spyod par
100b2('bum): bstan na/shA ra dwa ti'i bu de la ji snyam du sems sgyu ma'i mkhan po dang /sgyu me'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu des 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la yongs su spyod pa yod dam/gsol pa/bcom ldan
100b3('bum): 'das de lta bu ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po'i sgyu ma la shin tu bslabs pa/
100b4('bum): chos nyid sgyu ma lta bus rnam par spyod pa rab tu thob pa/nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral ba dag kyang 'dul ba'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/snying rje chen po'i dbang gis
100b5('bum): 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la yongs su spyod pa'ang ston te/de dag de dang 'grogs pa'ang med/des 'gro bar 'gyur ba'ang med do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
100b6('bum): chen po rnams ni rnam grangs du mas 'dod pa rnams la skyon du brjod de/'dod pa rnams ni kun nas 'bar ba'o//'dod pa rnams ni rab tu smad pa'o//'dod pa rnams ni gsod pa'o//'dod pa
100b7('bum): rnams ni dgra'o//'dod pa rnams ni phyir rgol ba'o//'dod pa rnams ni rtsa'i sgron ma lta bu'o//'dod pa rnams ni kim+ba ka'i 'bras bu lta bu'o//'dod pa rnams ni ral gri'i so lta bu'o//
101a1('bum): 'dod pa rnams ni mi mdag spungs pa lta bu'o//'dod pa rnams ni dug gi lo ma lta bu'o//'dod pa rnams ni mchil pa lta bu'o//'dod pa rnams ni mi gtsang ba'i drungs/
101a2('bum): lta bu'o zhes de ltar shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'dod pa yongs su shes kyang sems can thabs mkhas pa ma yin pa rnams yongs su smin par
101a3('bum): bya ba'i don du 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga las skye bar bya ba dang /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang bral ba'i phyir/'dod pa'i yon tan lnga nye bar ston te/de dag gis myos par 'gyur ba 'ang me/
101a4('bum): bag med par 'gyur ba'ang med/'dod po'i rgyu dang /'dod pa'i gzhis sdig to'i las byed par 'gyur ba'ang med do//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i du
101a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bgyi/bcom ldan 'das
101a6('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/byang chub sems dbang yang dag par rjes su mi mtho
101a7('bum): dod/byang chub sems dpa'i ming yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang
101b1('bum): yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //spyod ces bya bar yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //ma stod ces bya bar
101b2('bum): yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //gzugs kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //tshor ba ldang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //'du shes kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong
101b3('bum): ro//'du byed kyang yang drug par rjes su mi mthong ngo //rnam par shes pa'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/shU dwa tI'i bu de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'
101b4('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa'i rang bzhin gyis stong /byang chub sems dpa'i ming yang byang chub sems dpa'i ming gis stong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/de'i rang bzhin de yin te/de ni 'di ltar
101b5('bum): stong pa nyid kyis/gzugs stong pa ma yin/gzugs las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so//stong pa nyid kyis tshor ba
101b6('bum): stong pa ma yin/tsher ba las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o//stong pa nyid kyis 'du shes stong pa ma yin/'du shes las
101b7('bum): gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/'du shes nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes so//stong pa nyid kyis 'du byed stong pa ma yin/'du byed las gung na'ang stong pa nyid med de/'du
102a1('bum): byed nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed do//stong pa nyid kyis rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin/rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/rnam par
102a2('bum): shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di lta ste/byang chub ces bya ba 'di'ang ming tsam mo//'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa'
102a3('bum): zhes bya ba 'di'ang ming tsam mo//'di lta ste/stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di'ang ming tsam mo//'di lta ste/gzugs zhes bya ba 'di'ang ming tsam mo//'di lta ste/tshor ba zhes bya ba
102a4('bum): 'di'ong ming tsam mo//'di lta ste/'du shes zhes bya ba 'di'ong ming tsam mo//'di lta ste/'du byed ces bya ba 'di'ang ming tsam mo//'di lta ste/rnam par shes pa zhes
102a5('bum): bya ba 'di'ang ming tsam mo//de'ang 'di ltar gzugs ni sgyu ma lta bu'o//tshor ba ni sgyu ma lta bu'o//'du shes ni sgyu ma lta bu'o//'du byed ni sgyu ma lta bu'o//rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma
102a6('bum): lta bu'o//sgyu ma ni ming tsam ste/phyogs na gnas pa'ong ma yin/yul na gnas pa'ang ma yin pas/sgyu ma mthong ba ni yod pa ma yin te/byung ba ma yin/log par gyur
102a7('bum): pa/rang bzhini med pa/ngo bo nyid med pa/ma skyes pa ma 'gags pa gnas med pa/'phel ba med pa/'grib pa med pa/kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa/rnam par byang ba med
102b1('bum): pa ste/de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems da' chen po ni chos gang la' skye ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //'gag pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //gnas pa yang /
102b2('bum): dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //'phel ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //'grib po yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //kun nas nyon mongs par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //rnam
102b3('bum): par byang ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //tshor ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //'du shes yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
102b4('bum): 'du byed yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //gang la byang chub ces bya ba'am/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de'ang yang dag
102b5('bum): par rjes su mi mthong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar chos rnams so so'i ming ni sgyu ma ste/rnam par brtogs pa de dag 'phral du byung ba'i ming yang dag pa ma yin pa las/yongs
102b6('bum): su brtags pas tha snyad du brjod do//tha snyad kyi rgyus mngon par zhen par gyur pas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
102b7('bum): chos thams cad yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste dmigs pa med do//yang dag par rjes su ma mthong la dmigs pa med pas rlom sems med do//mngon por zhen pa med do//shA
103a1('bum): radwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/'di ltar yongs su rtog ste/'di ltar byang chub sems
103a2('bum): dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam mo//'di lto ste/byang chub ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam mo//'di lta ste/sangs rgyas zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam mo//'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu
103a3('bum): phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam mo//'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam mo//'di lta ste/gzugs zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam mo//'di lta
103a4('bum): ste/tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam mo//'di lta ste/'du shes zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam mo//'di lta ste/'du byed ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsamo mo//'di lta ste/rnam par shes pa
103a5('bum): zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam mo//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/bdag bdag ces bya ba ni tha snyad du brjod mod kyi/de la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su brtags na dmigs
103a6('bum): su med do/sems can sems can zhes bya ba ni tha snyad du brjod mod kyi/de la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su brtags na dmigs su med do/srog srog ces bya ba ni tha snyad
103a7('bum): du brjod mod kyi/de la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su brtags na dmigs su med do//gso ba gso pa zhes bya ba ni tha snyad du brjod mod kyi/de la yang rig pa ji lto ba bzhin du/
103b1('bum): yongs su brtags na dmigs su med do//skyes bu skyes bu zhes bya ba ni tha snyad du brjod mod kyi/de la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su brtags na dmigs su med do//gang zag gang zag
103b2('bum): ces bya ba ni tha snyad du brjod mod kyi/de la yang dag po ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su brtags na dmigs su med do/shed can shed can zhes bya ba ni tha snyad du brjod mod kyi/de la yang dag
103b3('bum): pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su brtags na dmigs su med do//shed bdag shed bdag ces bya ba ni tha snyad du brjod mod kyi/de la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su brtags na dmigs
103b4('bum): su med do//byed pa po byed pa po zhes bya ba ni tha snyad du brjod mod kyi/de la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su brtags na dmigs su med do//byed du 'jug pa po byed du 'jug pa po zhes bya ba
103b5('bum): ni tha snyad du brjod mod kyi/de la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su brtags na dmigs su med do//tshor ba po tshor ba po zhes bya ba ni tha snyad du brjod mod kyi/de la yang dag pa ji lta bo
103b6('bum): bzhin du yongs su brtags na dmigs su med do//tshor bar byed pa po tshor bar byed pa po zhes bya ba ni tha snyad du brjod mod kyi de lo yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su brtags na dmigs
103b7('bum): su med do//slong ba po slong ba po zhes bya ba ni tha snyad du brjod mod kyi/de la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su brtags na dmigs su med do//kun tu slong ba kun tu slong ba zhes bya ba ni tha
104a1('bum): skad du brjod mod kyi/de la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su brtags na dmigs su med do//shes pa po shes pa po zhes bya ba ni tha snyad du brjod mod kyi/de la
104a2('bum): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su brtags na dmigs su med do//mthong ba po mthong ba po zhes bya ba ni tha snyad du brjod mod kyi/de la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su brtags
104a3('bum): na dmigs su med do//reg pa po reg pa po zhes bya ba ni tha snyad du brjod mod kyi/de la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su brtags na dmigs su med do//'di lta ste dper na
104a4('bum): rnam par shes pa po rnam par shes pa po zhes bya ba ni tha snyad du brjid mod kyi/de la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su brtags na mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir dmigs su med
104a5('bum): do/ming dang brda' tsam du 'ol byir tha snyad du brjod do//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
104a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' yang drag por rjes su mi mthong ngo //byang chub yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //sangs rgyas yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //shes rab kyi pha rol tu
104a7('bum): phyin pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
104b1('bum): tshor ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //'du shes yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //'du byed yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong
104b2('bum): rdongo/ming gang gis tha snyad du brjod pa'i ming de'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de
104b3('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab mu gtogs par de ma yin pa'i shes rab nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes rab kyi bar du dmigs su med pa'i stong pa nyid nye bar bzung
104b4('bum): bas/zil gyis gnon to//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar des gang gis mngon par chags par 'gyur ba de'ang nye bar mi dmigs te/shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems
104b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gral te dzam bu'i gling 'di dge slong shA ra dwa ti'i bu dang /maud+gal gyi bu lta bu sha stag
104b6('bum): gis 'di lta ste dper na/'dam bu'i tshul lam/spa'i tshal la mo/bu ram shing gi tshil lAm/smyig ma'i tshal lam/'bras kyi zhing dme/til gyi zhing lhur yongs su gang bar
104b7('bum): gyur kyang /de dag gi shes rab kyis ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//stong gi

110a7('bum): shes lan nyin gcig bye ba rnams pa bdag gis lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyad du/sems can thams cad kyi byas la/rgyas thams cad rnam po thams cad drim
110b1('bum): par sangs rgyas par byas te sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o zhes don gang gi phyir sta gon du gnas pa de lta bu'i don du nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes rab

111a4('bum): 'di snyam du bdag cag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad de/sems can yongs su smin par byas la sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas te/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
111a5('bum): bcu yongs su rdzogs par byas la/mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
111a6('bum): bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byas te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/sems can tshad med grangs med pa yongs su mya
111a7('bum): ngan las 'da'o snyam du sems som/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar soms pa ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
111b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di snyam du bdag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad de/sems can yongs su smin par byas la/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ste/de bzhin
111b2('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byas la/mi 'jigs po bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang sangs rgyas kyi
111b3('bum): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byas te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can tshad med grangs
111b4('bum): med pa yongs su mya ngan las 'dra'o snyam du sems so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/srog chags kyi rigs me khyer ni 'di ltar bdag gi snang bas dzam bu'i gling kun tu snang bar
111b5('bum): bya'o//bdag gi 'od kyis dzam bu'i gling rgyas par gang bar bya'o snyam du mi sems so//shA ra dwa tI'i bu de bzhin du nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang 'di ltar bdag cag
111b6('bum): gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod de/sems can yongs su smin par byas la/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas te/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs
111b7('bum): par byas la/mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs
112a1('bum): bar byas te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs pad+ma sangs rgyas nas/sems can tshad mod grangs med pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das
112a2('bum): bar bya'o snyam du mi sems so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba ni/dzam bu'i gling thams cad snang bas rgyas par byed do//dzam bu'i gling thams cad
112a3('bum): snang bas gasngal bar byed do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'ang /sems can yongs su smin par byas shing
112a4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas nas/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byas te/mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang
112a5('bum): byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs por byas nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
112a6('bum): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/sems can tshad med grangs med pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/
112a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'dis shing phyir
112b1('bum): mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'thob pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i lam yongs su sbyong ba lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA rang
112b2('bum): ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/sems dang po bskyed pa nye bar bzung nas/pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i
112b3('bum): tshe/stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i chos la gnas te/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas/phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'thob bo//
112b4('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gang la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sbyin pa'i gnas su 'gyur ba lags/
112b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu thog ma sems bskyed phyin chad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa ni/snying po byang chub la 'dug
112b6('bum): gi bar du nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sbyin pa'i gnas su gyur pa yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yod pas/dag
112b7('bum): ba'i chos thams cad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur te/'di ltar dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//bslab pa lnga rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur
113a1('bum): pheM/yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gas sbyin 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//bsam gtan bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//chad med pa bzhi 'jig rten du
113a2('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ro//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jog pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//mngon par shes pa lnga 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rjes su dran
113a3('bum): pa drug 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
113a4('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du
113a5('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ro//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//phyi stong pa nyid 'jog rten du 'byung bar
113a6('bum): 'gyur ro//phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//chen po stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
113a7('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
113b1('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur
