209b3('bum): zhes yongs su bsrung ba mdzad do//rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang /mtshe ma dang /dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams
209b4('bum): dang /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang /tshangs lha nye phan dang /tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /tshangs chen dang /snang ba dang /chung snang dang /tshad med snang ba dang /kun snang dang ba dang /dge

210a1('bum): dpa' chen po de/sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro//nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/sangs rgyas

210a3('bum): bsrung ba mdzad do//rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang /mtshe ma dang /dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang /
210a4('bum): tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang /tshangs lha nye phan dang /tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /tshangs chen dang /snang ba dang /chung snang dang /tshad med snang ba dang /kun snang dang ba dang /dge ba dang /

211b1('bum): mas pas sgrub par byed pa'i phyir//shar m+b+hi'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dgan/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzugs pa dngag

212a1('bum): pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro//lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa/

212a3('bum): lha rnams dang /mtshe ma dang /dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang /tshangs lha nye pan dang /tshangs pa kun

212a7('bum): thams cad du thams cad med par 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can thams cad la/byams pas khyab par
212b1('bum): byed pa'i phyir ro//nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag kyang /byang chub sems dpa'
212b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po de la nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar lhung du 'ong ngo zhes yongs su bsrung ba mdzad do//rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang /mtshe ma dang /dga'
212b3('bum): ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang /tshangs lha nye phan dang /tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /tshangs chen dang /snang ba dang /chung
212b4('bum): snang dang /tshad mod snang ba dang /kun snang dang ba dang /dge ba dang /chung dge dang /tshad med dge ba dang /dge rgyas dang /che ba dang /chung che dang /tshad med che ba dang /'bras bu che ba dang /mi

212b6('bum): tu 'ong ngo zhes yongs su bsrung ba byed do//de la lus kyi skyon du bya ba gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang /tshe 'di nyid la thams cad du thams cad med par 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir na na/de ni
212b7('bum): 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro//'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ga ng+gA'i klong gi bye ma snyed
213a1('bum): don du yangs rgyas bcom ldan das gang spyod zugs pa dag sa ma 'am du na pa sa / byu
213a2('bum): gyis myung byud du nas yongs su bsrung ba mdzad //rgyal bachen pa bzhid pa/de mnacha gsam mi rnams dang /mtsha ma dang /dga' ldan dang /'phrul dag dang
213a3('bum): 'phrul deb byed kyi lha rnams dang /tshongs ris kyi lha rnams dang /chas kyi nye pa na dang /tshangs pa tsun labar nga /mtshan dang /snang zed de/rgyu da/ med
213a4('bum): da pyod pa/dge ba dang /tshung dang / mye du pa dang /da nga/dang/rgyu ci dag/ra klu dang /'dres kyi nga/mi dge
213a5('bum): shin tu mthong ba dang /grwa num snang ba dang /'og min gyi lha rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po da le/la la zhig par rmed byed par gyur tu 'ong dzi nas mongs
213a6('bum): sru bsgrud ba byed do//de la zhus kyi skyon du byu ba gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang /tshe 'di nyid la rnams rgyud du rnams cad med par 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir shi n+de/don 'di ltar byang chub sem
213a7('bum): sa sa 'i dzin po mams can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i / N+DI ga phyogs kyi yin rte gyi mo ga gyim maung dam
213b1('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag kyang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar lhung du 'ong ngo zhes yongs/
213b2('bum): su bsrung ba mdzad do//rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang /mtshe ma dang /dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang /
213b3('bum): tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang tshangs lha nye phan dang /tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /tshangs chen dang /snang ba dang /chung snang dang /tshad med snang ba dang /kun snang dang ba dang /dge ba dang /
213b4('bum): chung dge dang /tshad med dge ba dang /dge rgyas dang /che ba dang /chung che dang /ched med che ba dang /'bras bu che ba dang /mi che ba dang /mi gdung ba dang /shin tu mthong ba
213b5('bum): dang /gya nom snang ba dang /'og min gyi lha rnams kyang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la/la la zhig bar chad byed par gyur tu 'ong ngo zhes yongs su bsrung ba byed
213b6('bum): do//de la lus kyi skyon du bya ba gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang tshe 'di nyid la thams cad du thams cad med par 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'
213b7('bum): sems dpa' chen po de/sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi
214a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//gzung
214a2('bum): kyi sgo dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang /spobs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa'i sgo dag kyang tshigs mi che bar mngon du 'gyur ro//skye ba'i skye mched thams cad du'ang /de bzhin gshegs
214a3('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed par 'gyur te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi
214a4('bum): bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang /nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
214a5('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa ni/'di snyam du chos gang la la chos rnams dang 'du ba 'am/'bral bar 'gyur ba 'am/'phrad pa 'am/mi 'phrad par 'gyur ba de lta bu yod dam zhes bya bar mi
214a6('bum): sems so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar des chos gang 'du ba 'am/'bral bar 'gyur ba 'am/'phrad pa 'am mi 'phrad par 'gyur ba de lta bu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //shA radwa
214a7('bum): ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
214b1('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/'di snyam du bdag gis chos kyi dbyings mngon par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ram/'on tam mi 'gyur zhes bya bar mi sems te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/
214b2('bum): chos kyi dbyings kyis chos kyi dbyings mngon par sangs rgyas pa med do//mngon par 'tshang rgya ba med do//mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba med do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sde mos dpa'
214b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
214b4('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/chos gang yang chos kyi dbyings dang /tha dad par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni/shes
214b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/chos kyi dbyings dang /
214b6('bum): chos rnams su bye brag tu bya ba mi 'byed de/shwa ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o//shA ra dwa ti
214b7('bum): bugazhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/'di snyam du chos kyi dbyings khong du chud par 'gyur ram 'on tam khong du chud par mi
215a1('bum): 'gyur zhes bya bar mi sems te/de ni 'di ltar des chos gang gis chos gang khong du chud par bya ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mthong ba med do//de'ang /
215a2('bum): 'di ltar de ni chos kyi dbyings stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor/mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro//shA radwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol
215a3('bum): tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gzugs dang stong pa nyid du mi
215a4('bum): sbyor/stong pa nyid dang gzugs su mi sbyor ro//tshor ba dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/stong pa nyid dang tshor bar mi sbyor ro//'du shes dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/stong pa nyid dang 'du shes
215a5('bum): su mi sbyor ro//'du byed dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/stong pa nyid dang 'du byed du mi sbyor ro//rnam par shes pa dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/stong pa nyid dang rnam par shes par mi sbyor
215a6('bum): ro/mig dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/stong pa nyid dang mig tu mi sbyor ro//rna ba dang snying po nyid du mi sbyor/stong pa nyid dang rna bar mi sbyor ro//sna dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/stong pa nyid dang
215a7('bum): snar mi sbyor ro//lce dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/stong pa nyid dang lhor mi sbyor ro//lus dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor//stong pa nyid dang lus su mi sbyor ro//yid dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/
215b1('bum): stong pa nyid dang yid du mi sbyor ro//gzugs dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/stong pa nyid dang gzugs su mi sbyor ro//sgra dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/stong pa nyid dang sgrar mi sbyor ro//dri dang stong pa nyid
215b2('bum): du mi sbyor/stong pa nyid dang dIr mi sbyor ro//ro dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/stong pa nyid dang ror mi sbyor ro//reg dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/stong pa nyid dang reg tu mi sbyor ro//chos dang stong
215b3('bum): pa nyid du mi sbyor/stong pa nyid dang chos su mi sbyor ro//mig gi khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/stong pa nyid dang mig gi khams su mi sbyor ro//gzugs kyi khams dang stong pa nyid du mi
215b4('bum): sbyor/stong pa nyid dang gzugs kyi khams su mi sbyor ro//mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khamos dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/stong pa nyid dang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams su mi sbyor ro//
215b5('bum): rno ba'i khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/stong pa nyid dang rna ba'i khams su mi sbyor ro//sgra'i khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/stong pa nyid dang sgra'i khams su mi sbyor ro//rna ba'i rnam
215b6('bum): par shes pa'i khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/stong pa nyid dang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams su mi sbyor ro//sna'i khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/stong pa nyid dang sna'i khams su mi
215b7('bum): sbyor ro//dri'i khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/stong pa nyid dang dri'i khams su mi sbyor ro//sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/stong pa nyid dang sna'i rnam par shes
216a1('bum): pa'i khams su mi sbyor ro//lce'i khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/stong pa nyid dang lce'i khams su mi sbyor ro//ro'i khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/stong pa nyid dang ro'i
216a2('bum): khams su mi sbyor ro//lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/stong pa nyid dang lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams su mi sbyor ro//lus kyi khams dang stong pa
216a3('bum): nyid du mi sbyor/stong pa nyid dang lus kyi khams su mi sbyor ro//reg bya dang snying po nyid du mi sbyor/stong pa nyid dang rog byar mi sbyor ro//lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang stong pa nyid
216a4('bum): du mi sbyor/stong pa nyid dang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams su mi sbyor ro//yid kyi khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/stong pa nyid dang yid kyi khams su mi sbyor ro//chos kyi khams
216a5('bum): dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/stong pa nyid dang chos kyi khams su mi sbyor ro//yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/stong pa nyid dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i
216a6('bum): khams su mi sbyor ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor 'di ni rnal 'byor dam pa ste/shA radwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
216a7('bum): chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa ni/nyan thos kyi sa'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ngo //sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed do//sems can rnams kyang yongs
216b1('bum): smin par byed do//b+h+yon med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu'ang myur du mngon par 'tshang rgya'o//shU radwa ti'i bu/rnal 'byor du bya ba gang ni 'ang rung ste/de dag gi nang na shes//
216b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor ni/rab ces bya/mchog ces bya/dam pa zhes bya/phu le zhes bya/gtso bo zhes bya/gya nom pa zhes bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di lta ste/shes
216b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'di ni stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i rnal 'byor te/bla na med pa'i rnal 'byor to//shU ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar brtson pa'i
216b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lung bstan pa zhes bya ba ste/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur pa'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar brtson pa'i
216b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/sems can chad med grangs med pa'i don byed kyang /de 'di snyam du bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa yin no zhe 'am//
216b6('bum): brtson pa ma yin no zhes bya bar mi sems so//bdag la ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams lung ston pa mdzad do//bdag ni lung bstan pa la nye bar gyur to//bdag gis ni sangs
216b7('bum): rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong bar bya'o//bdag gis ni sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya'o//bdag gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs
217a1('bum): rgyas te/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o snyam du mi sems so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar de chos kyi dbyings la bye brag tu 'byed pa med de/de ni chos kyi
217a2('bum): dbyings las chos gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'am/gang la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis lung bstan par bya ba 'am/gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
217a3('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba/de lta bu'i chos gzhan gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de
217a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/sems can gyi 'du shes mi skye'o//bdag gi 'du shes mi skye'o//srog gi 'du shes mi skye'o//'gro ba'i 'du shes mi skye'o//gso
217a5('bum): ba'i 'du shes mi skye'o//skyes bu'i 'du shes mi skye'o//gang zag gi 'du shes mi skye'o//sheng can gyi 'du shes mi skye'o//shed bdag gi 'du shes mi skye'o//byed pa po'i 'du
217a6('bum): shes mi skye'o//tshor ba po'i 'du shes mi skye'o//shes pa po'i 'du shes mi skye'o//mthong ba po'i 'du shes mi skye'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar sems can shin tu skye ba med
217a7('bum): cing 'gag pa med pa'i phyir te/sems can la ni skye ba dang 'gag pa med do//gang la skye ba dang 'gag pa med pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang ji ltar 'gyur te/shA
217b1('bum): rAdwa ti'i bu de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can skye ba med pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin/sems can stong pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi
217b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin/sems can mi dmigs pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin/sems can dben pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin//
217b3('bum): sems can rang bzhin med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin/sems can ngo bo nyid med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin te/shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub
217b4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po rnams kyi rnal dbyor dam pa s+ho/'di ltar stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor to//shA rAngadwa ti'i du 'dzin byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
217b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor te/des de ma yin pa'i rnal 'byor rnams zil gyis mnan tI gnas so//shA ra dwa te'i bu rnal 'byor 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
217b6('bum): de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mngon par bsgrub bo//mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /bya mos pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas
217b7('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mngon par bsgrub bo//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnal 'byor 'di po spyod pa ni ser sna'i sems mi skye'o//tshul khrims ngan
218a1('bum): pa'i sems dang gnod par sems pa'i sems dang /lo lo'i sems dang /'khrug pa'i sems dang /shes rab 'chal pa'i sems mi skyed do//de skad ces bka'
218a2('bum): stsal pa dang /shA ra dwa tI'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
218a3('bum): rnal 'byor 'dis spyod pa de gang nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes pa lags/'di nas shi 'phos nas ni gang du skye bar 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub
218a4('bum): sems dpa' semos dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'dis rnam par spyod pa de ni/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes pa'am/dga'
218a5('bum): ldan gyi lha'i ris dang mi'i nang nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes par shes par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan nas shi
218a6('bum): 'phos te 'dir skyes pa de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la rnal 'byor myur du 'grub pa ste/tshe rabs 'di 'das nas kyang chos zab mo 'di dag de la mngon du 'gyur ro//de nas
218a7('bum): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la mnyam par gzhog go/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
218b1('bum): sangs rgyas rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu'ang skye bar 'gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la'ang bsnyen bkur byed
218b2('bum): par 'gyur ro//shA ra dwa ti'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang /dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes pa de ni tshe gcig gis thogs pa ste/
218b3('bum): de ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug la nyams po med pa'o//gzungs kyi sgo dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad kyang drer ma 'dus pa med do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
218b4('bum): sems dpa' tshon po glang mi'i nang nas shi 'phos nas/mi dang skal ba mnyam pa nyid du skyes pa de ni/phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma gtogs
218b5('bum): par dbang po rtul ba yin te/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la'ang myur du mnyam par gzhog pa ma yin no//de la gzungs kyi sgo dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams
218b6('bum): kyang myur du mngon du mi 'gyur ro//shA ra dwa tI'i bu gang khyod kyis de skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'di la snyoms
218b7('bum): par 'jug pa de/'di nas shi 'phos nas gang du skye bar 'gyur zhes smras pa ni/shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shi 'phos
219a1('bum): nas gang na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing /'tsho skyong ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas der 'gro ste/nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
219a2('bum): byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
219a3('bum): thabs la ma mkhas pa dag/bsam gtan dang po la'ang mnyam par gzhog/bsam gtan gnyis pa la'ang mnyam par gzhog/bsam gtan gsum pa la'ang mnyam par
219a4('bum): gzhog/bsam gtan bzhi pa la'ang mnyam par gzhog cing pha rol tu phyin pa drug la'ang spyod de/de dag bsam gtan thob pas lha tshe ring po'i nang du skyes shing /gal te mi'i
219a5('bum): rlung du skye ba thob nas/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag la/bsnyen bkur byed na'ang /de dag dbang po rtul zhing dbang po mi rno ba'ang yod do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub
219a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/bsam gtan gnyis pa la'ang mnyam par gzhog lnga/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang spyod de/de dag thabs la mi mkhas pas
219a7('bum): bsam gtan rnams spangs nas phyir 'dod pa'i khams su skye ba yang yod de/shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'o sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang dbang po rtul ba yin te/
219b1('bum): dbang po rno ba ma yin no//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po//bsam gtan dang po la'ang snyoms par 'jug/bsam gtan gnyis pa la'
219b2('bum): snyoms par 'jug/bsam gtan gsum pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug/bsam gtan bzhi pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug/byams pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug/snying rje la'ang snyoms
219b3('bum): par 'jug/dga' ba la'ang snyoms par 'jug/btang snyoms la'ang snyoms par 'jug/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug/rnam shes mtha' yas
219b4('bum): skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug/cung zad med pa'i skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug/'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug/dran pa nye bar bzhag
219b5('bum): po bzhi la'ang snyoms par 'jug/yang dag par spong ba bzhi la'ang snyoms par 'jug/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la'ang snyoms par 'jug/dbang po lnga la'ang snyoms par 'jug/stobs lnga
219b6('bum): la'ang snyoms par 'jug/byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la'ang snyoms par 'jug/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug/snying rje chen po la'ang snyoms
219b7('bum): par 'jug ste/snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de dag thabs mkhas pas/bsam gtan gyi dbang gis mi skye/tshangs pa'i rnam par spyod pa'i dbang gis mi skye/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
220a1('bum): 'jug pa'i dbang gis mi skye ste/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang na bzhugs shing /'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye bar 'gyur ba yod do//de dag ni shes rab
220a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor dang ma bral bas/bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan
220a3('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/bsam gtan dang po la'ang snyoms par 'jug/bsam gtan gnyis pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug/bsam gtan gsum pa la'ang
220a4('bum): snyoms par 'jug/bsam gtan bzhi pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug/byams pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug/snying rje la'ang snyoms par 'jug/dga' ba la'ang snyoms par 'jug
220a5('bum): btang snyoms la'ang snyoms par 'jug/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug/cung zad med
220a6('bum): pa'i skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug/'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mchod la'ang snyoms par 'jug cing /de dag thabs mkhas pas bsam gtan dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /
220a7('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis mi skye'o//de dag ni phyir 'dod pa'i khams 'dir skyes kyang /rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye'o//bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su
220b1('bum): skye'o//khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye ste/de'ang srid pa la brkam pa'i phyir ma yin gyis/sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir ro//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang
220b2('bum): bosam gtan dang po la'ang snyoms par 'jug/bsam gtan gnyis pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug/bsam gtan gsum pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug/bsam gtan bzhi pa
220b3('bum): la'ang snyoms par 'jug/byams pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug/snying rje la'ang snyoms par 'jug/dga' ba la'ang snyoms par 'jug/btang snyoms la'ang snyoms par 'jug/
220b4('bum): nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug/cung zad med pa'i skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug/'du
220b5('bum): shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug cing /de dag thabs mkhas pas/bsam gtan dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis mi skye
220b6('bum): ba'ang yod de/de dag ni rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o//sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o//mtshe ma'i lha rnams dang skal
220b7('bum): pa mnyam par skye'o//dgo' ldan gyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o//'phrul dga'i lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o//gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang skal ba
221a1('bum): mnyam par skye ste/de dag na gnas shing sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do//sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do//sangs rgyas bcom ldan
221a2('bum): 'das rnams kyang mnyes par byed do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dag/thobs mkhas pas/
221a3('bum): bsam gtan dang po la'ang snyoms par 'jug/bsam gtan gnyis pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug/bsam gtan gsum pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug/bsam gtan bzhi pa
221a4('bum): la'ang snyoms par 'jug/byams pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug/snying rje la'ang snyoms par 'jug/dga' ba la'ang snyoms par 'jug/btang snyoms la'ang snyoms par
221a5('bum): 'jug/nam mkha' mtha' yos skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug/cung zad med pa'i skye mched la'ang snyoms par
221a6('bum): 'jug/'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug pa yod de/de dog ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye'o//de dag do na'ang
221a7('bum): tshangs po tshangs chen dbang chen po dang ldan pa brgya phrag bcu la dbang sgyur ba de lta bu'i sems can gyi nang na'ang mchog dam pa phul du bya bar 'gyur te/de dag de na 'khod cing gang
221b1('bum): na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mngon par sangs rgyas shing /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba bzhugs pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas
221b2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rgyu zhing 'dong ngo //de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la'ang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i don du gsol ba gdab pa
221b3('bum): byed do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po che gcig gis thogs pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dag thabs mkhas pas/bsam
221b4('bum): gtan dang po la'ang snyoms par 'jug/bsam gtan gnyis pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug/bsam gtan gsum pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug/bsam gtan bzhi pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug
221b5('bum): byams pa la'ang snyoms par 'jug/snying rje la'ang snyoms par 'jug/dga' ba la'ang snyoms par 'jug/btang snyoms la'ang snyoms par 'jug/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la'ang
221b6('bum): snyoms par 'jug/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug/cung zad med pa'i skye mched la'ang snyoms par 'jug/'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched lo'ang snyoms par
221b7('bum): 'jug/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi'ang yongs su sgom/yang dag par spong ba bzhi'ang yongs su sgom/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'ang yongs su sgom/dbang po lnga'ang yongs su sgom/stobs
222a1('bum): ltu'adu sangasasu ma/byung chub kyiyan 'gu nas dus sa / gas mam yun lag rgyu pa yongs su sug/stong pa stod dag
222a2('bum): na me nga/sgyi ma 'i nas rnams pa ni da / sa smre sa su gas su rgyas ma du skye yang na chu
222a3('bum): na b+h+ri /dadag sgrub /drug kun gyi snying nga myal ba mnyam pa/deng nam na nas nas/debang pa mnyams
222a4('bum): ni shes basbyin du lta ga khrig pan myong du mis sgyu te/mdun du bya nas 'di mya ba ston te/rten med pa yang dag ra rdegs pa'i byung chung rgyu mngon pa
222a5('bum): nas/sangs rgyas kyi ni sna tshogs dag tu chos kyi 'khor lo ra ba spyod do///shis kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong drug //ma
222a6('bum): shA dwa tI'i bu 'di ltar b+h+ri byung chub sems dpa' sems dang 'dzin du mngon par shes bya //khyong pa dag 'ang ba'i khams su /gzugs kyi khams su
222a7('bum): rgya mi 'i sa rgyas nga nag shegs pa / tsam pa me dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs kyis rnams la rnam /su kyi dang /phu
222b1('bum): pabyed cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dod pa drug kyang yod do//shA rA dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug/
222b2('bum): thob pa dag/mngon par shes pa drug po de dag gis rnam par rtse zhing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na theg pa chen po ma gtogs par/nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi
222b3('bum): theg pa'i sgra'ang mi grag pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong ba dag kyang yod do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par
222b4('bum): shes pa drug thob pa dag/mngon par shes pa de dag gis rnam par rtse zhing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na sems can rnams kyi tshe dpag tu med pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas
222b5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong ba dag kyang yod do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa dag thob pa dag/'jig rten gyi khams
222b6('bum): gang na sangs rgyas kyi sgra mi grug pa dang chos kyi sgra ma grag pa dang /dge 'dun gyi sgra mi grag pa de lta bu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi khams su 'dong zhing /sngangs rgyas
222b7('bum): kyi legs pa brjod/chos kyi legs pa brjod/dge 'dun gyi legs pa brjod pas/sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang /chos kyi sgra dang /dge 'dun gyi sgra ngos
223a1('bum): sems dang bar gyur te/gang nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs pa de dag tu skye bar 'gyur bar byed pa dag kyang yod do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar
223a2('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed phyin chad bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med po bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /mngon
223a3('bum): par shes pa lnga dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun
223a4('bum): dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa
223a5('bum): chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad dag kyang thob nas/de dag nam yang 'dod pa'i khams su'ang mi skye/gzugs kyi khams su'ang mi
223a6('bum): skye/gzugs med pa'i khams su'ang mi skye zhing /de dag tu'ang sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yod do/shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
223a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa dag dang po sems bskyed pa nyid kyis byang chub sems dpe'i skyon med par zhugs nas/phyir mi ldog pa'i sa 'thob pa'ang yod do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu
223b1('bum): 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang po sems bskyed pa nyid kyis/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya zhing /mngon par sangs rgyas
223b2('bum): nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/sems can grangs med tshad med pa'i don byas nas phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das po'i dbyings su yongs su myo ngan las 'da' ba dang /de dag
223b3('bum): yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos bskal pa'am bskal pa'i lhag mar gnas pa dag kyang yod do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
223b4('bum): chen po dang po sems bskyed pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug cing /de dag byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dag dang lhan cig
223b5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams blta ba dang /sems can rnams yongs su smin pararo bya ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par
223b6('bum): bya ba'i don du 'dong ba dag kyang yod do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/bsam gtan bzhi thob pa/tshad med
223b7('bum): po bzhi thob pa/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi thob pa dag bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med po'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis/tshul du mas rnam
224a1('bum): par rtse zhing /'di lta ste/bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug go//de dag bsam gtan dang po de las langs nas/'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam
224a2('bum): par gzhog go/'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug go/bsam gtan gnyis pa las langs nas/'gag pa'i snyoms
224a3('bum): par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go/'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug go/bsam gtan gsum pa las
224a4('bum): langs nas/'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go/'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug go//bsam
224a5('bum): gtan bzhi pa las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go//'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched
224a6('bum): la snyoms par 'jug go/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las langs nas/'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa lnga mnyam par gzhog go/'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug
224a7('bum): pa las langs nas/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mchod la snyoms par 'jug go/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las langs nas/'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug
224b1('bum): pa la mnyam par gzhog go//'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/cung zad med pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go//cung zad med pa'i skye mched las langs nas/'gog
224b2('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go/'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go/'du
224b3('bum): shes me 'du shes med min skye mched las langs nas/'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go//shA rA dwa ti'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
224b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa rnams/bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag yang dang yang du rnam
224b5('bum): par mnan cing snyoms par 'jug po dag kyang yod do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi thob pa/yang dag par spong
224b6('bum): ba bzhi thob pa/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi thob pa/dbang po lnga thob pa/stobs lnga thob po/byang chub kyi yan lag bdun thob pa/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa thob pa/'phags
224b7('bum): pa'i bden pa bzhi thob pa/bsam gtan bzhi thob pa/tshad med pa rnams thob pa/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams thob pa/rnam par thar pa brgyad thob pa/mthar gyis
225a1('bum): d+hAganas pa'i rnams par dus/pa dag ts+tsha/pa nyid dung/mtshanam med du du/skyon spyod pa sa d+d+han
225a2('bum): 'dzin rnams thob pa/gzungs kyi sgo rnams thob pa/de bzhin du shegs pa ni snrums bcuthob pa/mi 'jigs pa bani thob pa/so so yang dag par rig pa bani thob pa/sa
225a3('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad pa'i pad//rnam par bang por sgo gsum po 'i gyung /rgyun du zhugs pa 'i bras bu thob par mi byed/lhan cig phyir 'ong ba dri 'bras bu
225a4('bum): par mi byed/phyir mo 'ong ba'i 'bras bu tho par ma byed/dgra bcom pa nyid thob par mi rnyed/ri bya chu thob par mi byed kyi/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod sbyi/
225a5('bum): mkhas pas yongs su bzung bste/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brjod pa sems ston rnams lo mongs su ston par byed de/sems can de dag des rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu tsa
225a6('bum): bar 'gyur dang /len cig phyir myod pa'i 'grus na thob par 'gyur ba dang /phyir mi ba'i 'bras bu sgrub par 'gyur ba dang /drug pa rnam pa nyid pa'i pa 'gyur ba dang
225a7('bum): byang chub thob par 'gyur ba byed pa dag kyang med de/shA tu'i rgyan gyisang ngo //rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sras bu thob par bye ba'i ye shes gang yin pa 'i byang chub ses
225b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa yin te/shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de lta bus de ltar rnam par spyod pa de dag ni/phyir/
225b2('bum): mi ldog pa yin par shes par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing /dga' ldan gyi gnas yongs su spyod pa
225b3('bum): dag kyang yod de/shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni bskal pa bzang po par shes par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' semos
225b4('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/bsam gtan bzhi thob pa/tshad med pa bzhi thob pa/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi thob pa/byang chub kyi phyogs
225b5('bum): kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun thob pa/mngon par shes pa drug thob pa/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu thob pa/mi 'jigs pa bzhi thob pa/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob pa/sangs
225b6('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad thob pa dag/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi khong du chud par bya ba'i don du spyod kyang bden pa bzhi rtogs par mi byed pa dag kyang yod de/shA ra dwa ti'i
225b7('bum): bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni tshe gcig gis thogs par shes par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin
226a1('bum): padrug la spyod pa dag/'jig rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi khams su 'dong shing de dag gi sems can rnams byung rgyu ba tu yang dag par sum 'byed cing /sangs
226a2('bum): rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa dag kyang yod de/shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni bskal pa grangs med tshad med pas/bla na med pa yang dag par
226a3('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon por 'tsha brgya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing /sems can rnams
226a4('bum): kyi don du rtog par brtson te/nam yang gnod par 'gyur ba'i tshig mr-i smra/gnod pa dang ldan pa'i lus kyi las dang /yid kyi las mi byed pa dag kyang yod do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu
226a5('bum): 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing /sems can gyi don du rtag tu brtson pas/sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi
226a6('bum): zhing du 'dong zhing sems can rnams kyi na song gi lam gsum po rgyun gocod pa dag kyang yod do//shA ra dwa tI'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol
226a7('bum): tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa spyir byas te/sems can rnams kyi bde ba'i yo byad thams cad nye bar sgrub cing /zas 'dod pa rnams la
226b1('bum): sa dang /skom 'dod pa rnams lo skom dang /bzhin pa 'dod pa rnams la bzhon pa dang /me tog 'dod pa rnams la me tog dang /spos 'dod pa rnams la spos dang /phreng ba 'dod pa rnams/
226b2('bum): la phreng ba dang /byug pa 'dod pa rnams la byug pa dang /mal stan 'dod pa rnams la mal stan dang /gos 'dod pa rnams la gos dang /rgyan 'dod pa rnams la rgyan dang /'tsho ba 'dod pa
226b3('bum): rnams la 'tsho ba dang /khyim 'dod pa rnams la khyim gyis yongs su sdud cing 'tsho bA'i yo byad skyon med pa yongs su sgrub pa dag kyang yod do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems
226b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myur byas te/sems can rnams lus drang ngag dang yid kyi sdom po la rab tu 'god pa
226b5('bum): dag kyang yod do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ltar byas te/sems can
226b6('bum): rnams khro ba med pa dang /gnod sems med pa la rab tu 'god pa byed pa dag kyang yod do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la
226b7('bum): gnas shing /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas te/sems can rnams dge ba'i chos thams cad la mngon par brtson pa la rab tu 'god pa dag kyang yod do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta
227a1('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas te/sems can rnams zhi gnas/
227a2('bum): rtse gcig tu bya ba dang /'dod pa las dben pa la rab tu 'god pa drug kyang yod do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug
227a3('bum): la gnas shing /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas te/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i lus su mngon par sprul te/sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams
227a4('bum): dang /byol song gi skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can rnams la ngan song thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba'i phyir chos ston pa
227a5('bum): dag kyang yod do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing /sangs rgyas kyi sku ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i lus su mngon
227a6('bum): par sprul nas/shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing semaso can rnams la chos ston pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur
227a7('bum): byed pa dang /chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing /de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag
227b1('bum): gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems
227b2('bum): dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bor byed pa dag kyang yod do//lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gad+hA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing /sems can rnams la chos
227b3('bum): ston pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang
227b4('bum): mthong bar byed cing /de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshon ma yongs su bzung ste/de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing /
227b5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bor byed pa dag kyang yod do//nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi
227b6('bum): bye ma skyed dag tu dong zhing /sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /sangs
227b7('bum): rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing /de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan mo yongs su bzung ste/de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa
228a1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po che gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar
228a2('bum): byed pa dag kyang yod do//byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing grang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing /sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen
228a3('bum): bkur byed pa dang //chos nyon cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing /de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing
228a4('bum): de dag go mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems
228a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po che gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do//byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu
228a6('bum): dong zhing /sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams lnga bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /sangs rgyas
228a7('bum): kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing /de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i
228b1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po che gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do//
228b2('bum): shwashar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing /sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /
228b3('bum): chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing /de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs
228b4('bum): su bzung ste/de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
228b5('bum): tshe gcig gis thogs pa shra stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do//lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu drong zhing /sems can rnams la chos
228b6('bum): ston pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang
228b7('bum): mthong bar byed cing /de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshon ma yongs su bzung ste/de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing /sangs
229a1('bum): nargyus rdzun dudukun byang chum sos snang pa sdoms dpa nam tshan rten nas thogs pa shA m+b+hag skye bar spyod po dag kyang yod //na rgya smyin su mam rgya
229a2('bum): rgyas kyi ning gat+ta klung gi bye ma stong dag tu de shing /sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang /de bzhin gshegasas pa rnams la basbyin dkur myong ba dang /chos nyan
229a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan nem par phye ba dag kya mthong bar byung cid/de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung
229a4('bum): /de rjes kya rgya che ba khyed par 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi nid mang pa yongs su sgru ba rnying /sa sa rgyas kyi zhing deng glu tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'an
229a5('bum): sa rtogs pa sho steg skye hU~Mr byed pa dag sang yid do//don gyi phyogs kyisang sa rgyam kyi nga ba ng+gA'i rlung gi bye ma skyed dge slo rnyed/sems can rnams la chos rten
229a6('bum): de bzhin na shegs pa rnams la sbyin bkur byed pa dang /chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam phyir bye bdag kyi
229a7('bum): bar bye tshong /de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su tsung ste/de bas rgyam rgya tshol byid par du 'asags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ming po yongs su grub cig
229b1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sbyi dag tu byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen du ma gcig gis thags pa shA myug skyeb pyod pa dag kyang medade//stong gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung
229b2('bum): byA ma rnyed dag tu dong zhing /sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bston btsud byed pa dang /chos nyi cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /sangs rgyas
229b3('bum): gling gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing /de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/de bas kyang chu tshe ba khyud par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas
229b4('bum): kying mang po yongs su sgrub cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub semos dpa' sems dpa' chen po che gcig gis thigs pa shA stug skye bar byed pa dge kyang yod do//shA rodwa
229b5('bum): ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe/mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan par byas te/dbang po gsal zhing
229b6('bum): yongs su dag pa dang ldan par gyur nas/de dag lus yongs su drug pa de dag gis skye bo mang po'i dga' ba dang /mos pa bskyed do//de dag 'gro ba mang po'i snying du sdug cing yid du'ong
229b7('bum): bdang /sems can de dag kyang sems mos par gyur pa'i dge ba'i rtse ba de nyid kyis mthor gyis theg pa gsum gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed pa dag kyang yid do//shA ridwa
230a1('bum): ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/lus yongs su dag pa la bskyab par bya'o//ngag yongs/
230a2('bum): su dag pa la bslab par bya'o//yid yongs su dag pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod
230a3('bum): pa dag dbang po shin tu gsal ba thob nas/de dag dbang po shin tu gsal ba de dag gis bdag mi bstod cing gzhan mi smod pa dag kyang yod do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang
230a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang po sems bskyed phyin chad/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /phyir mi ldog
230a5('bum): po'i sa ma thob kyi bar du nam yang dbul bar mi 'gyur zhing log par 'gro ba dang don song du mi ltung po dag kyang yod do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
230a6('bum): chen po dang po sems bskyed phyin chad/phyir mi ldog pa'i snga ma thob kyi bur du nam yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam mi gtong ba dag kyang yod do//shA ri dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byung
230a7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur nas/de dag dge ba
230b1('bum): bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la sems can rab tu 'god pa dang /sbyin pa dang ngag snyan pas sems can yongs su sdud pa dag kyang yod do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa'
230b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrimos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid yongs su bzung ste/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal
230b3('bum): srid brgya stong du ma la gnas shing /de dag la gnas nas/sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma mnyes par byed de/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la yo byad thams cad dang //
230b4('bum): mchod pa sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang /bkur sti dang /pu dud dang /mchod pa byed pa dag kyang yod do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu
230b5('bum): phyin pa drug la gnas shing /sems can log par lta ba'i mun pa can rnams la/sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis snang bar byed pa dang /bdag nyid kyang nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
230b6('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/sangs rgyas kyi chos snang ba de dang nam yang 'bral bar mi byed pa dag kyang yod de/shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
230b7('bum): sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi chos la yang dag par byung ba yin no//shA ra dwa ti'i bu de lta bas na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/shes rab kyi
231a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'i lus dang /ngag dang /yid kyi las rnams kyi ga yang bye'o//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
231a2('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus kyi las kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa
231a3('bum): gang lags/ngag gi las kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa gang lags/yid kyi las khA na ma tho ba dang bcas pa gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu
231a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam du sems shing /'di ni lus yin gyis des ni lus kyi las shig brtsam/'di ni ngag yin gyis des ni dag gi lus shig
231a5('bum): rtsam/'di ni yid yin gyis des ni yid kyi las shig bam snyam na/de ni shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus dang /ngag dang yid kyi las rtsom pal
231a6('bum): nam tho ba dang bcas pa'o//shA ra ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas ni/lus gang dang /ngag kang dang /yid blang shi
231a7('bum): 'jungs pa'i sems bskyed pa 'am/tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems bskyed pa'am/gnod sems kyi semaso bskyed pa'om/le lo'i sems bskyed pa'am/'khrug pa'i sems
231b1('bum): bskyed pa 'am/shes rab 'chal pa'i sems bskyed par bya ba de lta bu'i lus mi dmigs so//ngag mi dmigs so//sems mi dmigs so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
231b2('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/lus kyi gnas ngan len skyed pa dang /ngag gi gnas ngan len skyed pa dang /yid kyi gnas ngan len spyod pa tsam du ni shes par mi bya ste/
231b3('bum): de ni gnas med pa'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/lus kyi gnas ngan len yongs
231b4('bum): su sbyong ngo //ngag gi gnas ngan len yongs su sbyong ngo //yod kyi gnas ngan len yongs su sbyong ste/shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi lus
231b5('bum): kyi los kha na ma tho ba med pa'o//ngag gi las kha na ma tho ba med pa'o//yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba med pa'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
231b6('bum): chen po lus kyi gnas ngan len sbyong ba lags/ngag gi gnas ngan len skyong ba lugs/yid kyi gnas ngan len sbyong ba lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang
231b7('bum): gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus mi dmigs/ngag mi dmigs/sems mi dmigs na/shA ra dwa ti'i bu de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
232a1('bum): lus kyi gnas ngan len yongs su sbyong ba yin/ngag gi gnas ngan len yongs su sbyong ba yin/yid kyi gnas ngan len yongs su sbyong ba yin no//shA ra dwa ti'i
232a2('bum): bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed phyin chad dge ba bcu'o las kyi lam yang dag par blangs te gnas shing /nyan thos kyi sems sam/
232a3('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sems bskyed pa med par de rtag tu rgyun mi chad par sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems nye bar gzhog na/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
232a4('bum): chen po'i lus kyi gnas ngan lon dang /ngag gi gnas ngan len dang /yid kyi gnas ngan len yongs su dag pa zhes ngas bshad do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
232a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/byang chub kyi lam yongs su spong zhing /smin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
232a6('bum): pa la spyod pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /shes ra
232a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dag kyang yod do//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpo' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam gang logs/bcom ldan
232b1('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nam lus la dmigs pa med pa dang /dgra la dmigs pa med pa dang /
232b2('bum): yid la dmigs pa med pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la dmigs pa med pa dang /tshu lo khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dmigs pa med pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la dmigs
232b3('bum): pa med pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dmigs pa med pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dmigs pa med pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dmigs pa
232b4('bum): med pa dang /nyan thos kyi theg pa la dmigs pa med pa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la dmigs pa med pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la dmigs pa med pa dang /yang
232b5('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la dmigs pa med par gyur pa de ni/shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam yin te/'di ltar
232b6('bum): chos thams cad la dmigs pa med cing blang ba med pa dang /dor ba med pa'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lam de lta bus pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing
232b7('bum): nan tan byed pa de dag ni sus kyang thub pa med do//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul ji lta bur spyod pa rnams thub pa mo mchis pa logs//
233a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gzugs la rlom sems
233a2('bum): med pa dang /tshor ba la rlom sems med pa dang /'du shes la rlom sems med pa dang /'du byed la rlom sems med pa dang /rnam par rdzoshes pa la rlom sems med pa dang //
233a3('bum): mig dang gzugs la rlom sems med pa dang /rna ba dang sgra la rlom sems med pa dang /sna dang dri la rlom sems med pa dang /lce dang ro la rlom sems med pa dang /lus dang reg la
233a4('bum): rlom sems med pa dang /yid dang chos la rlom sems med pa dang /sa'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang /chu'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang /me'i khams la rlom sems
233a5('bum): med pa dang /rlung gi khams la rlom sems med pa dang /nam mkha'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang /rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang /mig gi
233a6('bum): khams la rlom sems med pa dang /gzugs kyi khams la rlom sems med pa dang /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang /rna ba'i khams la rlom
233a7('bum): sems med pa dang /sgra'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang /sna'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang /dri'i
233b1('bum): khams la rlom sems med pa dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang /lho'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang /ro'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang /lce'i
233b2('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang /lus kyi khams la rlom sems med pa dang /reg bya'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang /lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams
233b3('bum): la rlom sems med pa dang /yid kyi khams la rlom sems med pa dang /chos kyi khams la rlom sems med pa dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang /
233b4('bum): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rlom sems med pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems med pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems med pa dang /bzod
233b5('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems med pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems med pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems med pa dang /shes
233b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems med pa dang /nang stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang /phyi stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang //
233b7('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang /chen po stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid la rlom sems med po dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jom sems
234a1('bum): med pa dang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la rnam sems med pa dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la rlom
234a2('bum): sems med pa dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang //
234a3('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang /ngo bo nyid stong
234a4('bum): pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang /dran pa nye bar bzhug pa bzhi la rlom sems med pa dang /yang dag par
234a5('bum): spong ba bzhi la rlom sems med pa dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la rlom sems med pa dang /dbang po lnga la rlom sems med pa dang /stobs lnga la rlom sems med pa dang /byang
234a6('bum): chub kyi yan lag bdun la rlom sems med pa dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la rlom sems med pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la rlom sems med pa dang /bsam
234a7('bum): gtan bzhi la rlom sems med pa dang /tshad med pa bzhi la rlom sems med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la rlom sems med pa dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad
234b1('bum): la rlom sems med pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la rlom sems med pa dang /stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang /mtshan ma med pa la rlom sems
234b2('bum): med pa dang /smon pa med pa la rlom sems med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams la rlom sems med pa dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams la rlom sems med pa dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rlom
234b3('bum): sems med pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la rlom sems med pa dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi la rlom sems med pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la rlom sems
234b4('bum): med pa dang /byams pa chen po la rlom sems med pa dang /snying rje chen po la rlom sems med pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la rlom sems med pa dang /rgyun du
234b5('bum): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rlom sems med pa dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rlom sems med pa dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rlom sems med pa dang /dgra bcom pa
234b6('bum): nyid la rlom sems med pa dang /rang byang chub la rlom sems med pa dang /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
234b7('bum): la rlom sems med pa dang /'khor ba la rlom sems med pa dang /mya ngan las 'das pa la rlom sems med par gyur pa de'i tshe/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni
235a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis rnam par 'phel ba yin te/sus kyang thub pa med do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol
235a2('bum): tu phyin pa drug la gnas te/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed cing /ye shes de dang ldan pas nam yang ngan song rnams su mi skye/mi dbul zhing
235a3('bum): phongs pa rnams su myong bar mi 'gyur te/lus gang dang ldan pas lha dang /mi dang /lha mo yan du bcas pa'i nang na smad par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin par mi
235a4('bum): 'gyur ba dag kyang yod do//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pas/
235a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam yang ngan song rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ba dang /mi dbul zhing phongs pa nyams su myong bar mi 'gyur ba dang /lus gang dang
235a6('bum): ljon pas/lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin gyi nang na smad par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin par mi 'gyur ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de gang lags/bcom
235a7('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i
235b1('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo //chos kyang nyan to//byang chub sems dpa'i dge
235b2('bum): 'dun dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo //byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni lho phyogs kyi 'jig
235b3('bum): rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo //chos kyang nyan to//byang
235b4('bum): chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo //byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/nub
235b5('bum): phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo //chos kyang
235b6('bum): nyan to//byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo //byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta
235b7('bum): bu dang ldan pas ni/byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang
236a1('bum): mthong ngo //chos kyang nyan to//byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gri yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo //byang chub sems
236a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshogs pa dgra bcom
236a3('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag kyang mthong ngo //chos kyang nyan to//byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan
236a4('bum): rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo //byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung
236a5('bum): gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo //chos kyang nyan to//byang chub sems dpa'i dge
236a6('bum): 'dun dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo //byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams
236a7('bum): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo //chos kyang nyan
236b1('bum): to//byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo //byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan
236b2('bum): pas ni/nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
236b3('bum): snyed kyang mthong ngo //chos kyang nyan to//byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo //byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
236b4('bum): chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
236b5('bum): rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo //chos kyang nyan to//byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par bye ba dag kyang mthong ngo //byang
236b6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
236b7('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo //chos kyang nyan to//byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang //sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par
237a1('bum): phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo //ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes mi skyed do//chos kyi 'du shes mi skyed/
237a2('bum): do//dge 'dun gyi 'du shes mi skyed do//nyan thos kyi 'du shes mi skyed de//rang sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes mi skyed do//byang chub sems dpa'i 'du shes mi skyod do//sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes mi
237a3('bum): skyed do//bdag gi 'du shes mi skyed do//gzhan gyi 'du shes mi skyed do//sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes mi skyod do//ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
237a4('bum): chen po ni/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs
237a5('bum): so//bzod po'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi
237a6('bum): dmigs so//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/bAs mr-i gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/shes rab kyi pha rol tu
237a7('bum): phyin pa mi dmigs so//nang stong pa nyid sgom ste/nong stong pa nyid mi dmigs so//phyi stong pa nyid sgom ste/phyi stong pa nyid mi dmigs so//phyi nong stong pa nyid sgom ste/phyi nang
237b1('bum): stong pa nyid mi dmigs so//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid skom ste/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs so//chen po stong pa nyid sgom ste/chen po stong pa nyid mi dmigs so//don dam pa
237b2('bum): stong pa nyid sgom ste/don dam pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs so/'dus byas stong pa nyid sgom ste/'dus byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs so//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sgob ste/'dus
237b3('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs so//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sgom ste/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs so//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong nga nyid sgom ste/
237b4('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs so//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid sgom ste/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs so//rang bzhin stong pa nyid sgom ste/rang bzhin stong pa
237b5('bum): nyid mi dmigs so//chos thams cad stong pa nyid skom ste/chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi dmigs so//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sgom ste/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
237b6('bum): mi dmigs so//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid sgom ste/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs so//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid sgom ste/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs so///
237b7('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom ste/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs so//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom ste/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs so//dran
238a1('bum): pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi sgom ste/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams mi dmigs so//yang dag par spong ba bzhi sgom ste/yang dag par spong ba rnams mi dmigs so//
238a2('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi sgom ste/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi dmigs so//dbang po lnga sgom ste/dbang po rnams mi dmigs so//stobs lnga sgom ste/stobs rnams mi
238a3('bum): dmigs so//byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sgom ste/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi dmigs so//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom ste/'phags pa'i lam yan
238a4('bum): lag brkyad pa mi dmigs so//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sgom ste/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi dmigs so//bsam gtan rnams sgom ste/bsem gtan rnams mi
238a5('bum): dmigs so//tshad med pa rnams sgom ste/tshad med pa rnams mi dmigs so//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgom ste/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
238a6('bum): pa rnams mi dmigs so//rnam par thar pa brgyad sgom ste/rnam par thar pa rnams mi dmigs so//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu sgom ste/mthar gyis gnas
238a7('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi dmigs so//stong pa nyid skom ste/stong pa nyid mi dmigs so//mtshan ma med pasgom ste/mtshan ma med pa mi dmigs so//smon pa med
238b1('bum): bsgom ste/smon pa med pa mi dmigs so//mngon par shes pa rnams sgom ste/mngon par shes pa rnams mi dmigs so//ting nge 'dzin rnams sgom ste/ting nge 'dzin rnams
238b2('bum): mI dmigs so//gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgom ste/gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi dmigs so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sgom ste/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams
238b3('bum): mi dmigs so//mi 'jigs pa bzhi sgom ste/mi 'jigs pa rnams mi dmigs so//so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi sgom ste/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi dmigs
238b4('bum): so//byams pa chen po sgom ste/byams pa chen po mi dmigs so//snying rje chen po sgom ste/snying rje chen po mi dmigs so//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sgom ste/
238b5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi dmigs so//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sgom ste/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mi dmigs so//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
238b6('bum): sgom ste/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi dmigs so//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sgom ste/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi dmigs so//dgra bcom po nyid sgom ste/
238b7('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid mi dmigs so//rang byang chub sgom ste/rang byang chub mi dmigs so//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sgom ste/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi dmigs so//
239a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sgom ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
239a2('bum): po'i ye shes te/ye shes de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed de/sangs rgyas kyi
239a3('bum): chos thams cad kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
239a4('bum): mig lnga rab tu 'thob pa dang /yongs su sbyong ba yod de/lnga gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sha'i mig dang /lha'i mig dang /shes rab kyi mig dang /chos kyi mig dang /sangs
239a5('bum): rgyas kyi mig go/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
239a6('bum): pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig gis dpag tshad brgya mthong ba yod do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
239a7('bum): po sha'i mig gis dpag tshad nyis brgya mthong ba yod do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig gis dpag tshad sum brgya mthong ba yod do//
239b1('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mgo sa dpag tshad bzhi pargya mthong ba yod do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig
239b2('bum): gis dpag tshad lnga brgya mthong ba yod do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shi'i mig gis dpag tshad do drug brgya mthong ba yod do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub
239b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shi'i mig gis dpag tshod bdun brgya mthong ba yod do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig gis dpag tshod brgyad
239b4('bum): brgya mthong ba yod do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig gis dpag tshad dgu brgya mthong ba yod do/shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
239b5('bum): dpa' chen po sha'i mig gis dpag tshad stong mthong ba yod do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig gis dzam+bu'i gling mthong ba yod do//shA
239b6('bum): radwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig gis gling gnyis mthong ba yod do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig gis
239b7('bum): gling gsum mthong ba yod do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig gis gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yod do//shA ra dwa
240a1('bum): ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig gos stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yod do//shA radwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
240a2('bum): dpa' chen po sha'i mig gis stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yod do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig gis stong gsum gyi stong
240a3('bum): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yod do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig yongs su dag pa'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan
240a4('bum): 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu rgyal po chen po bzhi'i
240a5('bum): ris kyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so//sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu
240a6('bum): shes so//mtshe ma'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so//dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig grang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas
240a7('bum): rab tu shes so//'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so//gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi lho'i mig gang yin pa
240b1('bum): de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so//tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so//tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang
240b2('bum): yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so//tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so//tshangs chen gyi lha rnams
240b3('bum): kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so//snang ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so//chung snang gi lha
240b4('bum): rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so//tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so//kun
240b5('bum): snang drang ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so//dge ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so//chung
240b6('bum): dge'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so//tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes
240b7('bum): so//dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so//che ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes
241a1('bum): so//chung che'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so//tshad med che ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub
241a2('bum): sems dpas rab tu shes so//'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so//mi che ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de
241a3('bum): ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so//mi gdung ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so//shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams kyi
241a4('bum): lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so//gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so//'og
241a5('bum): min gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig grong yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni rgyal po chen po
241a6('bum): bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni/sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so//byang chub sems
241a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni mtshe ma'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes
241b1('bum): so//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni gzhan 'phrul
241b2('bum): dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so//byang chub sems dpa' sems
241b3('bum): dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams kyis mi
241b4('bum): shes so//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni tshangs chen gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni
241b5('bum): snang ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni chung snang gi lha rnams kyis mi shes so//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
241b6('bum): chen po'i lha'i mig de ni tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so//byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni kun snang drang ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so//
241b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni dge ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni chung dge'i lha rnams
242a1('bum): kyis mi shes so//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so//byang chub sems dpa' sems
242a2('bum): dpa' chen po'i lha'i mag de ni dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni che ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so//byang chub
