242a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni chung che'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni tshad med che ba'i lha rnams kyis
242a4('bum): mi shes so//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i
242a5('bum): mig de ni mi che ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni mi gdung ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so//byang chub sems
242a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni gya nom snang ba'i lha
242a7('bum): rnams kyis mi shes so//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni 'og min gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so//lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems
242b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gAng+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho drang skye ba rab tu shes so//lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i
242b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gr-ing+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes so//lha'i mig de lta ba dang
242b3('bum): ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes so//lha'i mig
242b4('bum): de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes
242b5('bum): so//lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can
242b6('bum): rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes so//lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
242b7('bum): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'ching 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes so//lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/lho nub kyi
243a1('bum): phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes so//lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i
243a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes
243a3('bum): so//lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi
243a4('bum): 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes so//lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi
243a5('bum): bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig yongs su dag pa'o///
243a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam po bcu gnyis pa//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi mig
243a7('bum): yongs su dag pa gang logs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi mig gang dang ldan pas 'dus
243b1('bum): byas sam/'dus ma byas sam/dge ba 'am/mi dge ba 'am/kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'am/khrun ma tho ba med pa 'am/kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/kun nus nyon mongs
243b2('bum): pa med pa 'am/'jig rten pa 'am/'jig rten las 'das pa 'am/zag pa dang bcas pa'am/zag pa med pa'i chos gang yang mi shes pa med pa dang /shes rab kyi mig gang dang
243b3('bum): ldan pas/chos gang yang ma mthong ba med/ma thos pa med/ma bsams pa med/khong du ma chud pa med pa 'di ni/shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
243b4('bum): shes rab kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/bcom ldan 'das
243b5('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi mig gis gang zag 'di ni dad pa'i rjes su 'gro ba/gang zag 'di ni chos kyi rjes su 'gro ba gang
243b6('bum): zag 'di ni stong pa nyid la gnas pa ste/gang zag 'di'i dbang po lnga ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid kyis skye bar 'gyur ro//dbang po lngas de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro//
243b7('bum): de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba skye bar 'gyur ro//rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang /the tshom dang tshul khrims
244a1('bum): dang /brtul zhugs bsnyems pa'i kun tu sbyor ba gsum rab tu spong bar 'gyur te/gang zag 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya'o//des sgom pa'i lam rab tu
244a2('bum): thob nas/'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang /ngan sems rab tu spobs par byed de/gang zag 'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o//de lam de nyid de bos kyang shin tu bsgoms nas/'dod
244a3('bum): pa'i 'dod chags dang /gnod sems rab tu spong ba thob par byed de/gang thog 'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'o//de la ma de nyid de bas kyang shin tu bsgoms pas/gzugs kyi 'dod chags
244a4('bum): dang /gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags dang /ma rig pa dang /nga rgyal dang /rgod pa rab tu spong ste/gang zag 'di ni dgra bcom pa'o//gang zag 'di ni mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa ste//
244a5('bum): gang zag 'di'i dbang po lnga ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pas skye bar 'gyur ro//dbang po lngas de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro//de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis
244a6('bum): rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba skye bar 'gyur ro//rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang /the tshom dang /tshul khrims dang /brtul zhugs
244a7('bum): bsnyems pa'i kun tu sbyor ba gsum rab tu spong bar 'gyur te/gang zag 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya'o//des bsgom pa'i lam rab tu thob nas/'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang /
244b1('bum): ngan rnams ra gams pa na na 'donaldan cog phyir 'a ba'o//de lAm ting ngo bas rdzu na nas/'do pa'i 'dod chags dang /gnangasam na
244b2('bum): ba thob par byed de/gang zag 'di na phyir mi 'ong ba'o//de lam de nyid de bas kyang shin tu bsgoms pas/gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang /gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags dang /ma
244b3('bum): rig pa dang /nga rgyal dang /rgod pa rab tu sbyong ste/gang zag 'dri ni dgra bcom pa'o//gang zag 'di ni smon pa med pa la gnas pa ste/gang zag 'di'i dbang po lnga ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo
244b4('bum): smon pa med pas skye bar 'gyur ro//dbang po lngas de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro//de ma theg pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bar skye bar 'gyur ro//
244b5('bum): rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang /the tshom dang /tshul khrims dang /brtul zhugs bsnyems pa'i kun tu sbyor ba gsum rab tu spong bar 'gyur te//
244b6('bum): gang zag 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya'o//des bsgom pa'i lam rab tu thob nas/'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang /ngan sems rab tu srabs par byed de/gang zag 'di ni lan cig phyir
244b7('bum): 'ong ba'o//de lam de nyid de bas kyang shin tu bsgoms pas/'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang /gnod sems rab tu spong ba thob par byed de/gang zag 'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'o//de lom
245a1('bum): de nyid de bas kyang shin tu bsgoms pas/gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang /gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags dang /ma rig pa dang /nga rgyal dang /rkyod pa rab tu spyongad
245a2('bum): ste/gang zag 'di ni dgra bcom pa'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o//shA ra dwa ti'i
245a3('bum): bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang ci'ang rung ste/kun 'byung ba'i chos can de thams cad ni 'grag pa'i chos can no zhes bya bar shes pas/dad
245a4('bum): pa la sogs po dbang po lnga 'thob par 'gyur te/'di ni shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag po'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan
245a5('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi mig gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni sems dang po bskyed pa ste/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
245a6('bum): do//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
245a7('bum): spyod do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de'i rgyus dad pa'i dbang po dang /brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang ldan te/thabs mkhas pas ched du bsams te/lus yod
245b1('bum): su'adzin pa byed do//dge ba'i rtsa bas brtan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye'o//bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye'o//
245b2('bum): khyim bdag tsho zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye'o//rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i nang du skye'o//sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i nang du skye'o//mtsho ma'i lha'i nang du skye'o//dga' ldan gyi lha'i nang du
245b3('bum): skye'o//'phrul dga'i lha'i nang du skye'o//gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i nang du skye'o//de de dag na gnas shing sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur te/bde ba'i yo byad
245b4('bum): thams cad kyis de dag la rim gro byed par 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed do//de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
245b5('bum): rnams la'ang bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro//rim gro dang /bkur sti dang /phu dud dang /mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro//nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang mi ltung ngo //
245b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya bar rab tu shes
245b7('bum): te/shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi migo yongs su dag pa'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
246a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni bla na mod pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstun pa'o//'di ni lung ma bstan pa'o//'di ni ngas pa'o//
246a2('bum): 'dra ni ma nges pa'o//'di ni lung bstan par 'gyur ba'o//'di ni lung bstan par mi 'gyur ba'o//'di dag ni phyir mi ldog pa ste/dbang po thob pa'o//'di dag ni phyir mi ldog pa ma
246a3('bum): yin pa ste/dbang po ma thob pa'o//'di ni mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o//'di ni mngon par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
246a4('bum): chen po 'di ni mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs pas/shwar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
246a5('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do//rim gro dang /bkur sti dang /phu dud dang /mchod pa byed do//lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi
246a6('bum): bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do//rim gro dang /bkur sti dang /phu du de dang /
246a7('bum): mchod pa byed do//nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
246b1('bum): mnyes par byed do//rim gro dang /bkur sti dang /phu dud dang /mchod par byed do//byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing /de bzhin
246b2('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do//rim gro dang /bkur sti dang /phu dud dang /mchod par byed do//byang shar gyi phyogs
246b3('bum): mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do//rim
246b4('bum): gro dang /bkur sti dang /phu dung dang /mchod pa byed do//shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
246b5('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do//rim gro dang /bkur sti dang /phu dud dang /mchod pa byed do//lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi
246b6('bum): khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do//rim gro dang /bkur sti
246b7('bum): dang /phu dud dang /mchod pa byed do//nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
247a1('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do//rim gro dang /bkur sti dang /phu dud dang /mchod pa byed do//'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams/
247a2('bum): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do//rim gro dang /bkur sti dang /
247a3('bum): phu dud dang /mchod pa byed do//steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang drag par rdzogs
247a4('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do//rim gro dang /bkur sti dang /phu dud dang /mchod pa byed do//'dis ni mngon par shes pa thob par 'gyur ro//'dis ni mngon
247a5('bum): par shes pa thob par mi 'gyur ro//'di ni bzod pa thob pa'o//'di ni bzod pa thob pa ma yin no//'di ni dbang po thob pa'o//'di ni dbang po thob pa ma yin no//byang chub
247a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni yongs su dag par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni yongs su
247a7('bum): dag par mi 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni smon lame chen po dang ldan pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni smon lam chen
247b1('bum): po dang mi ldan pa'o//'dis ni sems can yongs su smin par byas so//'dis ni sems can yongs su smin par ma byas so//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di la ni phyogs/
247b2('bum): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams legs pa brjod pa mdzad do//'di la ni legs pa brjod pa mi mdzad do//byang chub
247b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro//'di dag ni nye bar gnas par mi 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems
247b4('bum): dpa' chen po 'di ni byang chub thob nas tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ro//'di'i tshe ni dpag tu yod par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di'i 'od dang dbyangs dang dge
247b5('bum): slong gi dge 'dun ni tshad med par 'gyur ro//'di ni tshad yod par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
247b6('bum): rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang ldan par 'gyur ro//'di ni ldan par mi 'gyur ro//'di ni dka' ba spyod par 'gyur ro//'di ni spyod par mi 'gyur ro///
247b7('bum): 'di ni srid pa tha ma pa'o//'di ni srid pa tha ma pa ma yin no//'di ni snying po byang chub la 'dug par 'gyur ro//'di ni 'dug par mi 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
248a1('bum): chen po 'di dag la ni bdud yod par mi 'gyur ro//'di dag la ni bdud yod par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/de ltar na shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
248a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi mig yongs su
248a3('bum): dag pa gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi sems kyi rjes la/rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin
248a4('bum): la mnyam par bzhag nas/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do//de na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan pa yin/mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ldan pa yin//
248a5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang ldan pa yin/byams po chen po dang ldan pa yin/snying rje chen po dang ldan pa yin/dga' ba chen po dang ldan pa yin/btang
248a6('bum): snyoms chen po dang ldan pa yin/sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar po bsgribs pa med pa dang ldan pa yin/de ni de'i mig ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mig
248a7('bum): de dang ldan pas/rnam pa thams cad du ma mthong ba 'am/ma thos pa 'am/ma shes pa 'am/khong du ma chud pa gang yang med de/shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems
248b1('bum): ruba' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar byang chub
248b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mig lnga yongs su sbyang bar 'dod pa dang /thob par 'dod pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la brtson par bya'o//shA radwa ti'i bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di
248b3('bum): ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug tu dge ba'i chos thams cad mo 'dus pa med de/nyan thos kyi chos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang /byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang /sangs rgyas
248b4('bum): kyi chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu la la zhig yang dag par smra bas/dge ba'i chos thams cad 'dus zhes brjod pa zhig tu dgos na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu
248b5('bum): phyin pa yang dag par smra bas brjod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mig lnga skyed pa'o//mig lnga po de dag la bslabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
248b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
248b7('bum): sems dpa' chen po ni mngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rab tu 'thob ste/de rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa du ma nyams su myong bar byed do//de ni sa chen po 'di'ang rab tu g.yo bar byed do//
249a1('bum): gcig tu gyur cing mang por 'gyur ro//mang por gyur cing gcig tu 'gyur ro//snang ba dang mi snang ba'ang nyams su myong bar byed do//rtsig pa las thal ba dang //
249a2('bum): rab las thal ba dang /ri las thal bar thogs pa med pa'i lus kyis 'gro ste/dper na nam mkha' la bye ba bzhin no//nam mkha' la'ang skyil mo krung gis 'gro ste/dper na 'dab
249a3('bum): chags bya bzhin no//sa la'ang gyen du 'byung ba dang /'og tu 'dzul ba byed do/dper na chu la bya bo bzhin no//chu la'ang 'bying ba med par 'gro ste/dper ni sa la bya ba bzhin no//
249a4('bum): du bar 'thul zhing mer 'bar te/dper na me'i phung po chen po bzhin no//nyi mo dang zla ba 'di dag 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul tshe la 'di ltar mthu che zhing 'di ltar dbang che ba dag kyang lagau pas byugs
249a5('bum): shing tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du lus kyis dbang sgyur te/rdzu 'phrul des rlom sems su 'gyur ba med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang /rang bzhin gyis dben pa dang /
249a6('bum): rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'i phyir des rdzu 'phrul grang gis rlom sems su 'gyur ba'i rdzu 'phrul de lta bu mi dmigs te/de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs par rdzu/
249a7('bum): 'phrul mngon par slob pa'i bsam pa tsam yang mi skyed do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
249b1('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa yin no//de lha'i rna ba'i khams rnam par dag pa'i mi las 'das pas lha dang mi gnyis ka'i
249b2('bum): sgra thos te/lha'i rna ba'i khams des bdag ni sgra nyan ces bya bar rlom sems su 'gyur ba med do//de ni 'di ltar des rang bzhin stong pa dang /rang bzhin dben pa dang /rang bzhin ma skyes
249b3('bum): pa'i phyir/rna ba dang skur dmigs pa med de/de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs par lha'i rna ba'i khams la bsam pa'ang mi skyed do//de ltar na shA ra dwa ti bu
249b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/lha'i rna ba'i khams mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i saM shes mngon par sgrub pa
249b5('bum): yin no//des sems can pha rol dang gang zag pha rol gyi sems sems kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes s+ho//'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems la 'dod chags
249b6('bum): dang ldan pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba
249b7('bum): bzhin du rab tu shes so//zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i sems la zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sems pa ni sdang dang
250a1('bum): bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems la gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji
250a2('bum): ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//gti mug dang bral ba'i sems la gti mug dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//sred pa dang ldan pa'i sems la
250a3('bum): sred pa dang ldan pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//sred pa dang bral ba'i sems la sred pa dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta
250a4('bum): pab bzhin du rab tu shes so//nye ba ro len pa dang bcas pa'i sems la nye bar len pa drang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//nye bar len
250a5('bum): pa med pa'i sems la nye bar len pa med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//kun nas 'dus pa'i sems la kun nas 'dus pa'i sems zhes bya bar
250a6('bum): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//rnam par 'phros pa'i sems la rnam par 'phros pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//rgya chung de'i
250a7('bum): sems la rgya chung ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//rgya che ba'i sems la rgya che bo'i sems zhes bya bar yang dge pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes
250b1('bum): so//yangs pa'i sems la yangs pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//che bar gyur pa'i sems la che bar gyur pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji
250b2('bum): lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//tshad med pa'i sems la tshad med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems la mnyam par
250b3('bum): bzhag pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems la mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta
250b4('bum): ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//rnam par grol ba'i sems la rnam par grol ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//rnam par ma grol ba'i sems la rnam
250b5('bum): par ma grol ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//zag pa dang bcas pa'i sems la zag pa dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
250b6('bum): du rab tu shes so//zagro pa med pa'i sems la zag pa med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//nyon mongs pa drang bcas pa'i sems la nyon
250b7('bum): mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//nyon mongs pa med pa'i sems la nyon mongs pa med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag
251a1('bum): pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//bla na yod pa'i sems la bla na yod pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//bla na med pa'i
251a2('bum): sems la bla na med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/gzhan gyi semaso shes pa des rlom sems su 'gyur ba med do//de ni 'di ltar sems
251a3('bum): de nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir te/de ni bdag gis shes so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do//'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa dang rang bzhin dben pa dang /rang bzhin ma skyes
251a4('bum): pa'i phyir/gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sems mi dmigs te/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs par sems shes par bya ba'i bsam po'am//
251a5('bum): sems shes pa mngon par sgrub pa'i bsam pa tsam yang mi skyed do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
251a6('bum): cing /sems can thams cad kyi sems dang /spyod pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa yin no//de ni sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa
251a7('bum): mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes rnam pa du ma mngon par sgrub ste/sems gcig kyang rjes su dran pa nas/sems brgya'i bar du'ang rjes su dran no//nyi
251b1('bum): ma gcig kyang rjes su dran pa nas nyi ma brgya'i bar du'ang rjes su dran no//zla ba gcig rjes su dran pa nas zla ba brgya'i bar du'ang rjes su dran no//lo gcig rjes su dran pa nas lo brgya'i bar du
251b2('bum): 'ang rjes su dran no//bskal pa gcig rjes su dran pa nas bskal pa brgya'i bar du'ang rjes su dran no//bskal pa brgya phrag du ma'ing rjes su dran no//bskal pa stong phrag du ma'ang rjes su
251b3('bum): dran no//bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma'ang rjes su dran no//bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'ang rjes su dran te/bdag de lta bu zhig na 'dug 'dug ste/ming ni 'di zhes bya/rus
251b4('bum): ni 'di zhes bya/rigs ni 'di zhes bya/kha zas ni 'di lta bu zhig za za/yun ni 'di srid cig tu 'dug 'dug/tshe'i mtha' ni 'di tsam zhig tu gyur te/de ltar bdag de nas sho 'phos
251b5('bum): nas ni che ge mo zhig tu skyes so zhes bya ba nas/de nas shi 'phos nas ni 'dir skyes so zhes bya ba'i bar du rnam pa dang bcas gtan tshigs dang bcas ngan rtags dang bcas par bdag
251b6('bum): dang gzhan gyi gnas rnam pa du mar rjes su dran te/sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes des kyang rlom sems su 'gyur ba med do//de ni 'di ltar/
251b7('bum): ye shes de ye shes ma yin te/bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro//de ni bdag gis rab tu shes so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do//'di ltar des ye shes de nyid kyang rang
252a1('bum): bzhin stong pa dang /rang bzhin dben pa dang /rang ba ni na ma skyes pa'i phyir/gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ye shes mi dmigs so//de ni thams
252a2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs par rjes su dran pa'i ye shes kyi don du bsam pa tsam yang mi skyed do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
252a3('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa yin no//de ni lha'i mig rnam par dag
252a4('bum): pa mi las 'das pas/sems can 'chi 'pho ba dang /skye ba dang /kha dog sdug pa dang /kha dog mi sdug pa dang /bzang ba dang /ngan pa dang /ngan song na gnas pa dang /bde
252a5('bum): 'gro na gnas pa dag kyang rab tu shes te/sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan/ngag gis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan/yid kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/
252a6('bum): 'phags pa rnams la skur pa 'debs pa log par lta ba rnams te/de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis lus zhig nas/ngan song dang /ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba dag tu
252a7('bum): skye'o//sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan/ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang ldan/yid kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/'phags pa la
252b1('bum): skur ba mi 'debs pa/yang dag par lta ba rnams te/de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis lus zhig nas/bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar rab tu shAs te/
252b2('bum): de ltar phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas//nAm mkhwa'i mthas gzugs pa dag gi 'bri ba drug tu gautogs pa rnams kyi skyo ba dang / 'pho yang/
252b3('bum): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/des kyang rlom sems su 'gyur ba med do//de ni 'di ltar mig de mig ma yin ning bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir te/de bdag gis mthong
252b4('bum): zhes bya bar rlom sems med do//de'ang 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa dang /rang bzhin dben pa dang /rang bzhin ma skyes pa'i phyir gang gis rlomA sems su 'gyur ba'i mig de lta bu des mi/
252b5('bum): dmigs te/de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa ma gtogs par lha'i mig gi bsam pa'am/lha'i mig mngon par bsgrub pa'i bsam pa tsam yang mi byed do//
252b6('bum): rarAdwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /lha'i mig mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub
252b7('bum): pa yin no//de ni thog pa zad pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub kyang nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ring songs rgyas kyis thob par mi byed do//gang bla na
253a1('bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang mi mthong ngo //de mngon par shes pa des rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin thob par byas nas/
253a2('bum): 'bra chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu spyong bu byed de/zag pa zad pa mngon du bya ba mngon par shes pa des rlom sems su 'gyur ba med do//de ni
253a3('bum): 'di ltar ye shes de nyid ye shes ma yin zhing bsdam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir te/de bdag gis rab tu shes sau zhes bya bar rlom sems med do//de'ang 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa dang //
253a4('bum): rang bzhin dben pa dang /rang bzhin ma skyes pa'i phyir gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur ba'i zag pa zad pa'i ye shes mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa de lta bu mi dmigs so//
253a5('bum): de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs par/zag pa zad pa'i ye shes kyi bsam pa'am zag bzud pa mngon du bya ba'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa'i bsam
253a6('bum): pa tsam yang mi skyed do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/zag pa zad pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon
253a7('bum): par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa yin no//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod cing /mngon par
253b1('bum): shes pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ni/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis rnam par 'phel lo//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
253b2('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir chags pa med pa'i sems nye bar bzung bas/rnam pa
253b3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/tshul
253b4('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ltung ba bya ba med pa nye bar bzung bas/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lom sbyong ba dag
253b5('bum): kyang yod do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spod pa'i tshe/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /mtha'
253b6('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi 'khrug pa nye bar bzung bas/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa'
253b7('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/brtson 'grub kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus
254a1('bum): mi gzhig pa nye bar bzung bas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
254a2('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/'khrug pa med pa'i sems
254a3('bum): bar bzung bas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
254a4('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/shes rab 'chal pa'i sems mi dmigs pa nye bar bzung bas
254a5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
254a6('bum): pa'i tshe/pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing /mtha' lus 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'ong ba med pa dang /'gro ba med pa nye bar bzung ba dang /yongs su 'dzin pa med pa
254a7('bum): nye bar bzung bas/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam yongs su sbyong ba yin no//de la sbyin pa ni yongs su 'dzin pa nye bar bzung ba las gdags so//tshul khrims ni tshul
254b1('bum): khrims ngan pa nye bar bzung ba las gdags so//bzod pa ni 'khrug pa nye bar bzung ba las gdags so//brtson 'grus ni le lo nye bar bzung ba las gdags so//ting nge 'dzin na mnyam par
254b2('bum): ma bzhag pa nye bar bzung ba las gdags so//shes rab ni shes rab 'tshal ba nye bar bzung ba las gdags te/de ni rgal to zhes bya bar rlom sems med do//ma rgal to zhes bya bar rlom
254b3('bum): sems med do//sbyin pa byed do zhes bya bar rlom sems med do//sbyin pa mi byed do zhes bya bar rlom sems med do//tshul khrims dang ldan no zhes bya bar rlom sems med do//tshul
254b4('bum): khrims ngan pa can no zhes bya bar rlom sems med do//bzod pa phun sum tshogs so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do//khro ba can no zhes bya bar rlom sems med do//brtson 'grus brtsams
254b5('bum): pa'o zhes bya bar rlom sems med do//le lo can no zhes bya bar rlom sems med do//mnyam par bzhag pa'o zhes bya bar rlom sems med do//mnyam par ma bzhag pa'o zhes bya bar
254b6('bum): rlom sems med do//shes rab dang ldan no zhes bya bar rlom sems med do//shes rab 'chal pa can no zhes bya bar rlom sems med do//smyos so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do//
254b7('bum): phyag byas so zhes bya bar rlom sems med de//rim gro byas so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do//rim gro ma byos so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ra dwa
255a1('bum): ti'i bu ma skyes pa ni spyos so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do//phyag byas so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do//rim gro byas so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do//rim
255a2('bum): gro ma byas so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rlom sems thams cad yang dag pararo gcod pa'i phyir te/'di la shA
255a3('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/yon tan ji snyed cig yod pa de dag ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad la
255a4('bum): med de/de yon tan 'di dag yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i tshe/sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed/rnam pa thams cad
255a5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang thob par byed do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/sems can thams cad
255a6('bum): la snyoms pa'i sems bskyed de/sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems bskyed nas/chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid rab tu 'thob bo//chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid
255a7('bum): rab tu thob nas/chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la sems can thams cad rab tu 'god do//de ni tshe 'di nyid la'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs su byon cing
255b1('bum): dben par bya ba yin te/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /nyan thos thams cad dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang yid du 'ong zhing dben par bya ba yin/de ni skye ba gang
255b2('bum): drang gang dra skyes kyang /de dang de dag tu nAm yang mig gis yid du mi 'ong ba'i gzugs mi mthong ngo //rna bas yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra mi thos so//snas yid du mi 'ong ba'i dri mi tshor ro//lces
255b3('bum): yid du mi 'ong ba'i ro mi myong ngo //lus kyis yid du mi 'ong ba'i reg bya mi reg go/yid kyis yid du mi 'ong ba'i chos rnam par rig pa med do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
255b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro//shes rab kyi pha
255b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di bstan pa'i tshe/dge slong sum po rgyas gos gyon gyon pa bcom ldan 'das la yon du gsol te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
255b6('bum): bskyed do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe zhal 'dzum pa mdzad do//de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo stan las langs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas/pus mo g.yas
255b7('bum): pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar bas btud de/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
256a1('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni spyad tshun mnyes par ba nad pa ma mdzadanaN+Di'i rkyen gyis zhal 'am
256a2('bum): mdzad/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//dge'abod geyub 'phye'o 'di dag ni bskal pa
256a3('bum): gcig 'angs nas/bskal pa dpeskar ma lta bu la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal chen po zhes bya ba sha stag 'jig rten du 'byung //
256a4('bum): 'di dag ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi skul ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye'o//'dod pa la spyod pa'i lha'i dri
256a5('bum): phrag drug nus kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/de dag kyang de bzhin gshezhes pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa
256a6('bum): nanyes par byed par 'gyur ro//de nyid du rab tu byung nas tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod par 'gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa des kyang /de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
256a7('bum): pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ro//de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i tshe 'khor bzhi po de dag ni 'di na 'khod bzhin du/shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to//
256b1('bum): lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to//nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to//byung phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to//byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams
256b2('bum): kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to//shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to//lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to//nub byang gi
256b3('bum): phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to//'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to//steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur te//'jig rten gyi
256b4('bum): khams de dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba gang ji lta bur mthong ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba de dag ni mi
256b5('bum): mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na yod par mi mthong ngo //de nas 'khor de'i nang nas/srog chags stong phrag bcus bdag cag gis las gang byas pas/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag
256b6('bum): du skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i las spyad par bya'o zhes smon lam btab bo//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu de dag gi bsam pa thugs su chud nas/zhal 'dzum pa mdzad do//de nas tshe dang
256b7('bum): ldan pa dga' bo stan las langs to/bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas/pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar bas btud de/
257a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gasngob to//bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rgyu dang rkyen ma mchis par bzhad pa mi mdzad na/ci'i rgyu ci'i
257a2('bum): rkyen gyis zhal 'dzum pa mdzad/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dga' bo srog chags stong phrag bcu po 'di dag mthong ngam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo //
257a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dga' bo srog chags stong phrag bcu po 'di dag ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro//de bzhin gshegs
257a4('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang yang nam du'ang mi 'bral te/phyi ma'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
257a5('bum): sangs rgyas rgyan gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba shra stag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//de nas tshe dang ldan po shA ra dwa ti'i bu dang /tshe dang ldan pa maung+ga le chen po'i bu dang /tshe dang ldan pa rab
257a6('bum): 'byor dang /tshe dang ldan pa bshos pa'i bu gang po dang /tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po dang /dge slong gzhan dag kun kyang mngon par shes pa shin tu mang ba dag dang /byang chub
257a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shin tu mang ba dag dang /dge slong pha dang /dge slong ma dang /dge bsnyen pa dang /dge bsnyen ma shin tu mang ba dag gis/bcom ldan 'das
257b1('bum): la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chen po'o//
257b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yangs pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
257b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dam pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
257b4('bum): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rab bo//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
257b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa phul lo//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
257b6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa mchog go/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gya nom pa'o//
257b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzang po'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste
258a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bla na ma mchis pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste//
258a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ltag na ma mchis pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab
258a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa ma mchis pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu
258a4('bum): phyin pa 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
258a5('bum): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dra ba ma mchis pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang
258a6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshungs pa ma mchis pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub
258a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nam mkha'//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
258b1('bum): chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha///
258b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa chos thams cad stong pa nyid do//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po
258b3('bum): ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yon
258b4('bum): tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
258b5('bum): yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thug pa ma
258b6('bum): mchis pa'o//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sbyin pa yongs su
258b7('bum): btang ngo //yongs su gtong ngo //yongs su gtong bar 'gyur ro//de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur to//yongs su rdzogs
259a1('bum): so//yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i lus thob par gyur to//thob bo//'thob par 'gyur ro//de'i slad du mi mnyam pa
259a2('bum): dang mnyam pa'i chos 'di lta ste/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur to//thob bo//'thob par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu
259a3('bum): byiphyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i tshul khrims bsrungs so//bsrung ngo /srung bar 'gyur ro//de'i slad
259a4('bum): du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur to//yongs su rdzogs so//yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//de'i slad du mi mnyam pa
259a5('bum): dang mnyam pa'i lus thob par gyur to//thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//de'i skad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos 'di lta ste/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
259a6('bum): thob par gyur to//thob bo//'thob par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis
259a7('bum): ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bzod pa bsgoms so//bsgom mo//sgom par 'gyur ro//de'i slod du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs
259b1('bum): par gyur to//yongs su rdzogs so//yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i lus thob par gyur to//thob bo//'thob par 'gyur ro//de'i skad du mi mnyam/
259b2('bum): pa dang mnyam pa'i chos 'di lta ste/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur to//thob bo//'thob par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
259b3('bum): 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i brtson 'grus brtsams so//brtsam mo//rtsom par 'gyur ro//de'i slad du mi
259b4('bum): mnyam po dang mnyam pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur to//yongs su rdzogs so//yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang
259b5('bum): mnyam pa'i lus thob par gyur to//thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos 'di lta ste/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par
259b6('bum): gyur to//thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ni mi mnyam pa dang
259b7('bum): mnyam pa'i bsam gtan bskyed do//skyed do//skyed par 'gyur ro//de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur to//yongs
260a1('bum): su rdzogs so//yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i lus thob par gyur to//thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//de'i slad
260a2('bum): du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos 'di lta ste/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur to//thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das shes rab
260a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms so//bsgom
260a4('bum): mo//sgom par 'gyur ro//de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur to//yongs su rdzogs so//yongs su rdzogs par
260a5('bum): 'gyur ro//de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i lus thob par gyur to//thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos 'di lta ste/bla na med
260a6('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur to//thob bo//'thob par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la spyad pas/mi
260a7('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i gzugs thob par gyur to//mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i tshor ba thob par gyur to//mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i 'du shes thob par gyur to//mi mnyam
260b1('bum): pa dang mnyam pa'i 'du byed thob par gyur to//mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rnam par shes pa thob par gyur to//mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i byang chub tu mngon par byang chub nas/mi mnyam
260b2('bum): pa dang mnyam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gyur to//'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la spyad pas/mi mnyam pa dang /
260b3('bum): mnyam pa'i gzugs thob par gyur to//mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i tshor ba thob par gyur to//mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i 'du shes thob par gyur to//mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
260b4('bum): pa'i 'du byed thob par gyur to//mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rnam par shes pa thob par gyur to//mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i byang chub tu mngon par byang chub nas/mi mnyam pa
260b5('bum): dang mnyam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gyur to//ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la spyad pas/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
260b6('bum): pa'i gzugs 'thob par 'gyur ro//mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i tshor ba 'thob par 'gyur ro//mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i 'du shes 'thob par 'gyur ro//mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i
260b7('bum): 'du byed 'thob par 'gyur ro//mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rnam par shes pa 'thob par 'gyur ro//mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i byang chub tu mngon par byang chub nas/mi mnyam/
261a1('bum): pA dang mnyam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ro//da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
261a2('bum): nyid la spyad pas/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i gzugs thob par gyur to//mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i tshor ba thob par gyur to//mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i 'du shes thob par
261a3('bum): gyur to//mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i 'du byed thob par gyur to//mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rnam par shes pa thob par gyur to//mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i byang chub
261a4('bum): tu mngon par byang chub nas/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gyur to//de lta lags pas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
261a5('bum): chen po chos thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'tshal bas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
261a6('bum): po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa de dag ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bgyi ba la gas so//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom
261a7('bum): ldan 'das kyis nyan thos chen po de dag thams cad dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu dag de de
261b1('bum): bzhin no//de de bzhin te/ji skad du smras pa bzhin no//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa dag ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du
261b2('bum): bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bya bar 'os pa'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yod na/mi'i 'jig rten 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//lha'i
261b3('bum): 'jig rten 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rgyal rigs che zhing mtho bo'i rigs dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar
261b4('bum): 'gyur ro//khyim bdag che zhing mtho bo'i rigs dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rgyal chen bzhi'i ris
261b5('bum): kyi lce rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//mtsha ma'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//dga'
261b6('bum): ldan gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//'phrul dga'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur
261b7('bum): ro tshangs ris kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//tshangs lha nye pa ni gya lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du
262a1('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ro//tshangs chen gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//chung snang gi lha rnams/
262a2('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//dge ba'i lha
262a3('bum): rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//chung dge'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//tshad ming dge ba'i lho rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//dge rgyas kyi
262a4('bum): lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//chung che'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//tshad med che ba'i
262a5('bum): lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//mi che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//mi
262a6('bum): gdung ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar
262a7('bum): 'gyur ro//'og min gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rgyun du zhugs pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams 'jig rten
262b1('bum): du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//phyir mi 'ong ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//dgra bcom pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rang sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar
262b2('bum): 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
262b3('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yod na/bza' ba dang /btung ba dang /bzhon pa dang /gos dang /mal cha dang /khyim dang 'tsho
262b4('bum): ba dang /nor bu dang /mu tig dang /bai DUr+ya dang /dung dang /man shel dang /byu ru dang /gser dang /dngul dag kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu dag sems can
262b5('bum): rnams kyi bde ba'i yo byad mi'i rkyen dang /lha rdzas su bya ba 'am/yang dag par bral ba'i bde ba'ang rung ste/de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yod na//
262b6('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rigs kyi bu dag byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas te/bdag sbyin pa
262b7('bum): yongs su gtong zhing gzhan yang sbyin pa la sbyor ro//bdag tshul khrims bsrung zhing gzhan yang tshul khrims la sbyor ro//bdag bzod pa bsgom zhing gzhan yang bzod pa la sbyor ro///
263a1('bum): bdag brtson 'grus rtsom zhing gzhan yang brtson 'grus la sbyor ro//bdag bsam gtan bskyed cing gzhan yang bsam gtan la sbyor ro//bdag shes rab bsgom
263a2('bum): zhing gzhan yang shes rab bsgom pa la sbyor ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brten cing /sems can rnams pha rol tu phyin po drug la spyod de/de dag pha rol tu
263a3('bum): phyin pa drug la spyod pas/'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'thob bo//rigs kyi bu dag de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni
263a4('bum): sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don du zhugs pa yin no//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po bkram ste/stong gsum gyi stong chen
263a5('bum): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khyab par mdzad do//de nas de'i tshe ljags kyi dbang po de las 'od 'phro ba kha dog du ma dang /kha dog sna tshogs su ldan pa mang po byung bar gyur to//de
263a6('bum): byung nas shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos rgyas par gyur to//lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen
263a7('bum): pas rgyas par gyur to//nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos rgyas por gyur to//byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gaung+gA'i klung gi bye
263b1('bum): ma snyed snang ba chen pos rgyas par gyur to//byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos rgyas par gyur to//shar lho'i phyogs mtshams//
263b2('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma skyod snang ba chen pos rgyas par gyur to//lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos rgyas par gyur to//
263b3('bum): nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos rgyas par gyur to//'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba
263b4('bum): chen pos rgyas par gyur to//steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos rgyas par gyur to//de nas shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i
263b5('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis 'od rnam par phye ba de mthong nas/rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
263b6('bum): la zhus te/bcom ldan 'dis 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag snang ba chen pos bltam pa 'di su'i mthu lags zhes yongs su dris so//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis
263b7('bum): bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni nub phyogs logs na/'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
264a1('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/des zhal gyi sgo nas lcags kyi dbang po bkram nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la
264a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i phyir/'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po 'di dag snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do//lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
264a3('bum): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis 'od rnam par phye ba de mthong nas/rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan

264a5('bum): 'das de dag gis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni byang phyogs logs na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
264a6('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/des zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po bkram nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la

264b1('bum): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis 'od rnam par phye ba de mthong nas/rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das

264b5('bum): phyin pa bstan pa'i phyir/'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snying po 'di dag snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do//byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye
264b6('bum): mo snyed po de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis 'od rnam par phye ba de mthong nas/rang rang gi songs rgyas kyi zhing gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
264b7('bum): la zhus te/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag snang ba chen pos bltam pa 'di su'i mthu lags zhes yongs su dris so//sangs rgyas bcom ldan

265a3('bum): dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i phyir/'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po 'di dag snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do//byang
265a4('bum): shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis 'od rnam par phye ba de mthong nas/

265b1('bum): gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po bkram nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams lnga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i phyir/'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung

265b4('bum): 'di dag snang ba chen pos bltam pa 'di su'i mthu lags zhes yongs su dris so//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni nub byang gi
265b5('bum): phyogs mtshams logs na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba
265b6('bum): bzhugs te/des zhal gyi sgo nas lcags kyi dbang po bkram nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i phyir/'jig rten gyi
265b7('bum): khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po 'di dag snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do//lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi byang chub
266a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis 'od rnam par phye ba de mthong nas/rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus te/bcom

266a4('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/des zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po bkram nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes
266a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i phyir/'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po 'di dag snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do//nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi
266a6('bum): khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis 'od rnam par phye ba de mthong nas/rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sangs rgyas
266a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das la zhus te/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag snang ba chen pos bltam pa 'di su'i mthu lags zhes yongs su dris so//sangs rgyas
266b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni shar lho'i phyogs mtshams logs na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin
266b2('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/des zhal gyi sgo nas lcags kyi dbang po bkrom nas/byang chub sems dpa'
266b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i phyir/'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po 'di dag snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do//'og gi
266b4('bum): phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis 'od rnam par phyi ba mthong nas/rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing
266b5('bum): gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus te/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag snang ba chen po bltam pa 'di su'i mthu lags zhes yongs su dris so//
266b6('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni steng gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa

267a1('bum): dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i phyir/'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po 'di dag snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad

267a3('bum): rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus te/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag snang ba chen pos bltam pa 'di su'i mthu lags
267a4('bum): zhes yongs su dris so//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni 'og gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de//
267a5('bum): de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/des zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po bkram nas/byang
267a6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bston pa'i phyir/'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po 'di dag snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad
267a7('bum): do//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis sangs rgyas bcomo ldan 'das de dag la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de lta lags na bdag cag
267b1('bum): kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang /de la phyag bgyi ba dang /bsnyen bkur ba dang /byang
267b2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa de dag kyang blta ba dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'ang mnyan pa'i slad du mchi'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan
267b3('bum): 'das de dag gis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu dag de'i dus la bab par shes na dengs shig/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa
267b4('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal nas/la ro bdun du g.yas phyogs nas bskor ba byas te/phyogs bcu na pa gdugs dang /
267b5('bum): rgyal mtshan dang /lha'i ba dan dang /me tog dang /phyeng ba dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /na bza' dang /gser gyi me tog dang /dngul gyi me tog la sogs pa rnam pa du na khyer
267b6('bum): te/glu dang /rol mo brdung ba dang /dkrol ba mang pos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dang
267b7('bum): ngo//de nas rgyal chen bani'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /sum cu rtsa gsum dang /mtshe ma dang /dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dang dbyed dang /tshangs rimed
268a1('bum): tshangs lha nye phan dang /tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /tshangs chen dang /snang ba dang /chung snang dang /chud med snang ba dang /kun snang dang ba dang /dge ba dang /chung
268a2('bum): dge dang /tshad med dge ba dang /dge rgyas dang /che ba dang /chung che dang /tshad med che ba dang /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams dang /gnas gtsang ma shin tu mthong ba dang /gya
268a3('bum): nom snang ba dang /mi che ba dang /mi gdung ba dang /'og min gyi lha rnams kyang lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /bdug pa dang /phye ma dang /
268a4('bum): lha rdzas kyi me tog ut+pal dang /pad+mo dang ku mu de dang /puN+Da ri ka dang /lha rdzas kyi me tog man+da ra ba dang /man+da ra ba chen po dang /ke sa ra dang /ta ma la'i lo mo mang po khyer
268a5('bum): te/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyase shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste/de na byang chub sems dpa' sems
268a6('bum): dpa' chen po de dag dang /lha de dag gis me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /bdug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan
268a7('bum): dang /lha'i ba den de dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la gtor to//mngon par gtor to//
268b1('bum): de nas me tog la sogs pa de dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa gru bzhi ka sa zho dang
268b2('bum): ldan pa cha kun tu mnyam pa/shin tu rnam par phye ba mdangs dga' zhing yid du 'ong bar red de 'dug go//de nas 'khor de'i nang nas/srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya steng du ma stan las
268b3('bum): langs nas/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der thol mo sbyar bas btud de/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/de
268b4('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/gang brnyes par gyur pa'i chos kyi rnam pa de lta bu thams cad thob par gyur te/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun
268b5('bum): 'di lta bu ni yongs su bsdu bar bgyi'o//da ltar 'dir de bzhin gshegs pas chos ji ltar bstan pa de bzhin du 'khor 'di dang 'dra bar ni chos bstan par bgyi'o zhes smon lam btab
268b6('bum): bo//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu de dag gi bsam pa thugs su chud de/chos thams cad la skye ba med pa dang /'gag pa med pa dang /mngon par 'du byed pa med
268b7('bum): pa dang /'byung ba med pa la bzod par gyur pa mkhyen nas/zhal 'dzul pa mdzad do//de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo stan las langs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar
269a1('bum): nas/pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das gang nu ba der thal mo sbyar bas btud de/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
269a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rgyu dang rkyen ma mchis par bzhed pa mi mdzad na/ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis zhal 'dzum pa mdzad/bcom ldan 'das kyis
269a3('bum): bka' stsal pa/dga' bo 'khor 'di'i nang nas srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to//de dag gis ma 'ongs pa'i dus bskal pa
269a4('bum): bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad na/bskal pa me tog gi 'byung gnas zhes bya ba la/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub kyi yan
269a5('bum): log me tog ces bya ba sha stag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phra/brgya pa las/shA ri'i bu'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//
269a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam pa bcu gsum pa//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor khyod kyis byang chub
269a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtsom ste/ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinapa
269b1('bum): las 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos kyi gtam bya bar spobs pa bskyed cig/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /nyan thos chen po de dag dang /lha'i bu de
269b2('bum): dag 'di snyam ste/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di rang gi shes rab dang /spobs pa tsam gyi stobs dang /shugs kyi go chas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes
269b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston tam/'on tam sangs rgyas kyi mthus ston par 'gyur snyam pa dang /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/sangs rgyas kyi mthus/byang chub sems dpa'
269b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /nyan thos chen po de dag dang /lha'i bu de dag gis sems kyi kun tu rtog pa sems kyis yongs su shes nas/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la smras pa/
269b5('bum): dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams ni gang ci smra'ang rung /gang ci ston kyang rung /gang ci rjod kyang rung ste/de thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o///
269b6('bum): de bzhin gshegs pas chos gang bstan pa de thams cad kyang chos nyid dang mi 'gal lo//de ltar rigs kyi bu de dag ni chos bstan pa de la slob cing chos nyid de lta bu mngon du byed
269b7('bum): do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thabs kyis ston pa mdzad kyi/tshe dang ldan
270a1('bum): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa ni/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
270a2('bum): yul ma yin no//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'
270a3('bum): zhes bgyi na/'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'am/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba 'di chos gang gi tshig bla dgas lagaso/bcom ldan 'das
270a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba 'am/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba de lta bu bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag
270a5('bum): gis byang chub sems dpa' de dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ming de'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/byang chub sems dpa' sems
270a6('bum): dpa' chen po ni su zhig/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang zhig la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe
270a7('bum): dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' dang /byang chub sems dpa'i
270b1('bum): yid du bya ba de dag ni ming tsam ste/ming de ni nang na'ang med/phyi rol na'ang med/gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/sems can sems can

277b4('bum): rmemed/gnyis ka mod par yang mi dmigs so//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/dper na nang gi lus zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsom du tha snyad kyis gdags pa ste/mgo'i rus pa zhes ming du tha spyad

277b6('bum): gdags pa dang /tshogs pa'i rus pa zhes ming du tha snyad kyis gdags pa dang /rtsi bla ma'i rus pa zhes ming du bsnyad kyis gdags pa dang /dpyi'i rus pa zhes ming du tha snyad kyis

322b6('bum): mo mthong ngo //sangs rgyas kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //sangs rgyas kyi ming yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi bsgom pa'i phyir/
322b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming yang yang dag por rjes
323a1('bum): su mi mthong ngo //byang chub sems dpa' yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //byang chub sems dpa'i ming yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //sangs rgyas
323a2('bum): kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //sangs rgyas kyi ming yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bsgom pa'i phyir/shes rab
323a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming yang yang dag por rjes su ma mthong
323a4('bum): ngo //byang chub sems dpa' yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //byang chub sems dpa'i ming yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //sangs rgyas kyang yang dag par rjes
323a5('bum): su mi mthong ngo //sangs rgyas kyi ming yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/chos
323a6('bum): rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid shin tu rtogs pa yin te/chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ro//rnam par byang bar mi 'gyur ro//
323a7('bum): rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ming dang brdar bya ba'i chos kyi gdags pa khong du chud par bya ste/
323b1('bum): de ltar des ming dang brdar bya ba'i chos su gdags pa khong du chud nas/gzugs la chags par 'gyur ba med do//tshor ba la chags par 'gyur ba med do//'du shes la chags par
323b2('bum): 'gyur ba med do//'du byed la chags par 'gyur ba med de//rnam par shes pa la tshugs par 'gyur ba med do//mig la chags par 'gyur ba med de//gzugs la chags par
323b3('bum): 'gyur ba med do//migo gi rnam par shes pa la chags par 'gyur ba med do//mig gi 'dus te rig pa la chags par 'gyur ba med do//gang yang mig dang gzugs dang /
323b4('bum): mig gi rnam par shes pa 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/bde ba'ang ma yin/sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin pa skye ba de la'ang chags par 'gyur ba
323b5('bum): med do//rna ba la chags par 'gyur ba med do//sgra la chags par 'gyur ba med do//rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la chags par 'gyur ba med do//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la chags
323b6('bum): par 'gyur ba med do//gang yang rna ba dang sgra dang /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba 'am/sdug bsngal ba 'am/bde ba'ang ma yin/sdug bsngal
323b7('bum): ba'ang ma yin pa skye ba de la'ang chags par 'gyur ba med do//sna la chags par 'gyur ba med do//dri la chags par 'gyur ba med do//sna'i rnam par shes pa la chags par
324a1('bum): 'gyur ba med do//sna'i 'dus te reg pa la chags par 'gyur ba med do//gang yang sna dang dri dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
324a2('bum): bde ba 'am/sdug bsngal ba 'am/bde ba'ang ma yin/sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin pa skye ba de la'ang chags par 'gyur ba med do//lce la chags par 'gyur ba med do//rol
324a3('bum): chags par 'gyur ba med do//lce'i rnam par shes pa la chags par 'gyur ba med do//lce'i 'dus te reg pa la chags par 'gyur ba med do//gang yang lce dang ro dang /lce'i
324a4('bum): rnam par shes pa 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba'am/sdug bsngal ba 'am/bde ba'ang ma yin/sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin pa skye ba de la'ang chags par 'gyur
324a5('bum): pa med do//lus la chags par 'gyur ba med do//reg bya la chags par 'gyur ba med do//lus kyi rnam par shes pu la chags par 'gyur ba med do//lus kyi 'dus te reg
324a6('bum): pa la chags par 'gyur ba med do//gang yang lus dang reg bya dang /lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba 'am/sdug bsngal ba 'am/
324a7('bum): bde ba'ang ma yin sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin pa skye ba de la'ang chags par 'gyur ba med do//yid la chags par 'gyur ba med do//chos la chags par 'gyur ba med do//
324b1('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa la chags par 'gyur ba med do//yid kyi 'dus te rnyog pa la chags par 'gyur ba med do//gang yang yid dang chos dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'dus

325b5('bum): la chags par 'gyur ba med do//stong pa nyid la chags par 'gyur ba med do//mtshan ma med pa la chags par 'gyur ba med do//smon pa med pa la chags par 'gyur ba myed

326a1('bum): ba med do//byams pa chen po la chags par 'gyur ba med do//snying rje chen po la chags par 'gyur ba med do//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyud la chags/

326a7('bum): pos rnam par 'phel lo//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rnam par 'phel lo//byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par yang dag par 'jug par 'gyur ro//phyir mi
326b1('bum): ldog pa'i sna yongs su gnon par 'gyur ro//mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs par byas nas kyang /sems can
326b2('bum): yongs su smin par byed cing /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gror bya ba dang /bkur stir bya ba dang /phu dud du bya ba dang /mchod pa byed cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing

330b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bkra' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/lus ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam
