369b2('bum): snyam du sems/srid pa'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma legs so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
369b3('bum): rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/byang chub sems dpa' la srid pa'i de bzhin nyid yod snyam mam/gsol pA/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das
369b4('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/srid pa'i de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam ma me/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags
369b5('bum): so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/skye ba'i de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mAm/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma
369b6('bum): lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/skye ba'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam//
369b7('bum): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/skye bo'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa'
370a1('bum): mau sgyum mam/gsolag/com ldan 'das doltas lags so//bcom ldas ngas kyis pa//'phrul pa/ra kyi snyam du sams/byang chub sems/
370a2('bum): dpa' la skye ba'i de bzhin nyid yod snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/skye ba'i
370a3('bum): de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol po/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rob
370a4('bum): 'byor do ji snyam du sems/ni shrI'i de bzhin nyid byung chub sems dpa' yin snyam mAm/zhesol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
370a5('bum): sprul pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/rga shi'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mamo/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags
370a6('bum): so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/rga shi'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mAm/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das
370a7('bum): de lta ma lags sa//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/byang chub sems dpa' la rga shi di bzhin nyid med snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom
370b1('bum): ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/rga shi'i de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/
370b2('bum): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so///shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam po bcwo brgyad pa//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal//
370b3('bum): pa/rab 'byor khyod kyis don gyi dbang gang zhig mthong na/de skad du gzugs kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/gzugs ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin//
370b4('bum): gzugs la'ong byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang gzugs yod pa ma yin/gzugs med pa'ang byang chub snyoms dpa' ma yin/tshor
370b5('bum): ba'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/tshor ba ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/tshor ba la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa'
370b6('bum): la'ang tshor ba yod pa ma yin/tshor ba med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/'du shes kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/'du shes ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub
370b7('bum): sems dpa' ma yin/'du shes la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang 'du shes yod pa ma yin/'du shes med pa'ang byang chub sems
371a1('bum): dpa' ma yin/'du byed kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/'du byed ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/'du byed la'ang byang chub sems
371a2('bum): dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang 'du byed yod pa ma yin/'du byed med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/rnam par shes pa'ang byang chub sems dpa'
371a3('bum): ma yin/rnam par shes pa ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/rnam par shes pa la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa'
371a4('bum): la'ang rnam par shes pa yod pa ma yin/rnam par shes pa med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/mig kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/mig ma yin pa gzhan yang
371a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/mig la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' lnga'ong mig yod pa ma yin/mig med pa'ang byang chub sems
371a6('bum): dpa' ma yin/rna ba'ang byang chub sems dpa'i ma yin/rna ba ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/rna ba la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang
371a7('bum): chub sems dpa' la'ang rno ba yod pa ma yin/rna ba med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa'i ma yin/sna'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/sna ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub
371b1('bum): sems dpa' ma yin/sna la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang sna yod pa ma yin/sna med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/lce'ang
371b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/lce ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/lce la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang lce yod
371b3('bum): po ma yin/lce med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/lus kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/lus ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/lus la'ang byang
371b4('bum): chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang lus yod pa ma yin/lus med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/yid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/
371b5('bum): yid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/yid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yino/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang yid yod pa ma yin/yid med pa'ang
371b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/gzugs kyang byang chub sems dpa' mo yin/gzugs ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/gzugs la'ang byang chub sems
371b7('bum): dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang gzugs yod pa ma yin/gzugs med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/sgra'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin//
372a1('bum): sgra ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/sgra la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang sgra yod pa ma
372a2('bum): yin/sgra med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/dri'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/dri ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/dri la'ang byang chub sems
372a3('bum): dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang dri yod pa ma yin/dri med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ro'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ro mo yin pa gzhan
372a4('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ro la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang ro yod pa ma yin/ro med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa'
372a5('bum): ma yin/reg kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/reg ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/reg la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang
372a6('bum): chub sems dpa' lo'ang rig yod pa ma yin/reg med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/chos kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/chos ma yin pa gzhan yang
372a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/chos la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang chos yod pa ma yin/chos med pa'ang byang chub
372b1('bum): sems dpa' ma yin/mig gi khams kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/mig gi khams ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/mig gi khams la'ang byung
372b2('bum): chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang mig gi khams yod pa ma yin/mig gi kha mos med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/gzugs kyi
372b3('bum): khyams kyang byang chub sems dpa' mo yi ni/gzugs kyi khams ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/gzugs kyi khams la'ang byang chub sems dpa'
372b4('bum): yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang gzugs kyi khams yod pa ma yin/gzugs kyi khams med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/mig gi rnam par shes
372b5('bum): pa'i khams kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/myig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/mig gi rnam par shes pa'i
372b6('bum): khams la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams yod pa ma yin/mig gi rnam par shes pa'i
372b7('bum): khams med pa'ong byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/rna bo'i khams kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/rna ba'i khams ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma
373a1('bum): yin/rna ba'i khams la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang rna ba'i khams yod pa ma yin/rna ba'i khams med pa'ang
373a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/sgra'i khams kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/sgra'i khams ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/sgra'i khams la'ang
373a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang sgra'i khams yod pa ma yin/sgra'i khams med po'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/rna ba'i rnam
373a4('bum): por shes pa'i khams kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/rna ba'i rnam par shes
373a5('bum): pa'i khams la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams yod pa ma yin/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams
373a6('bum): med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/sna'i khams kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/sna'i khams ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/sna'i khams
373a7('bum): la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yini/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang sna'i khams yod pa ma yin/sna'i khams med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/dri'i khams
373b1('bum): kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/dri'i khams ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/dri'i khams la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa'
373b2('bum): la'ong dri'i khams yod pa ma yin/dri'i khams med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/sna'i rnam par shes
373b3('bum): pa'i khams ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang
373b4('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams yod pa ma yin/sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/lce'i khams kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/lce'i
373b5('bum): khrikhams ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/lce'i khams la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang lce'i khams yod pa ma yin/
373b6('bum): lce'i khams med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ro'i khams kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ro'i khams ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ro'i khams
373b7('bum): la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang ro'i khams yod pa ma yin/ro'i khams med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/lce'i rnam par shes
374a1('bum): pa'i khams kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/lce'i rnam par shes
374a2('bum): pa'i khams la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams yod pa ma yin/lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams
374a3('bum): med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/lus kyi khams kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/lus kyi khams ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/lus kyi
374a4('bum): khams la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang lus kyi khams yod pa ma yin/lus kyi khams med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin
374a5('bum): reg bya'i khams kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/reg bya'i khams ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/reg bya'i khams la 'dra byang chub sems dpa' yod
374a6('bum): pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang reg bya'i khams yod pa ma yin/reg bya'i khams med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams
374a7('bum): kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la'ang byang
374b1('bum): chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams yod pa ma yin/lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa'ang byang chub sems
374b2('bum): dpa' ma yin/yid kyi khams kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/yid kyi khams ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/yid kyi khams la'ang byang chub sems
374b3('bum): dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang yid kyi khams yod pa ma yin/yid kyi khams med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/chos kyi khams kyang byang chub
374b4('bum): sems dpa' ma yin/chos kyi khams ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/chos kyi khams la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems
374b5('bum): dpa' la'ang chos kyi khams yod pa ma yin/chos kyi khams med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/yid kyi rnam por shes pa'i khams kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin//
374b6('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byung
374b7('bum): chub sems dpa' la'ang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams yod pa ma yin/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/sa'i khams kyang
375a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/sa'i khams ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/sa'i khams la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin//
375a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' la'ang sa'i khams yod pa ma yin/sa'i khams med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/chu'i khams kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/chu'i khams
375a3('bum): ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/chu'i khams la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang chu'i khams yod pa ma yin/chu'i
375a4('bum): khams med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/me'i khams kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/me'i khams ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/me'i
375a5('bum): khams la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang me'i khams yod pa ma yin/me'i khams med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin//
375a6('bum): rlung gi khams kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/rlung gi khams ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/rlung gi khams la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa
375a7('bum): ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang rlung gi khams yod pa ma yin/rlung gi khams med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/nam mkha'i khams kyang byang chub
375b1('bum): sems dpa' ma yin/nam mkha'i khams ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/nam mkha'i khams la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang
375b2('bum): chub sems dpa' la'ang nam mkha'i khams yod pa ma yin/nam mkha'i khams med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang byang chub sems
375b3('bum): dpa' ma yin/rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/rnam par shes pa'i khams la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin//
375b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' la'ang rnam par shes pa'i khams yod pa ma yin/rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' mo yini/ma rig pa'ang byang chub sems
375b5('bum): dpa' ma yin/ma rig pa ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ma rig pa la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa'o la'ing ma rig pa
375b6('bum): yod pa ma yin/ma rig pa med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/'du byed kyang byang chub semos dpa' ma yin/'du byed ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma
375b7('bum): yin/'du byed la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ong 'du byed yod pa ma yin/'du byed med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma
376a1('bum): yin/rnam par shes pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/rnam par shes pa ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/rnam par shes
376a2('bum): pA la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang rnam par shes pa yod pa ma yin/rnam por shes pa med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma
376a3('bum): yin/ming dang gzugs kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ming dang gzugs ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ming dang gzugs la'ang byang chub
376a4('bum): sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang ming dang gzugs yod pa ma yin/ming da gzugs med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/skye moched drug
376a5('bum): kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/skye mched drug ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/skye mched drug la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/
376a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' la'ang skye mched drug yod pa ma yin/skye mched drug med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/reg pa'or byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/reg pa
376a7('bum): mo yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/reg pa la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang reg pa yod pa ma yin/reg
376b1('bum): pa med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/tshor ba'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/tshor ba ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dga' ma yin/tshor ba la'ang byang chub sems
376b2('bum): dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang tshor ba yod pa ma yin/tshor ba med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/sred pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin//
376b3('bum): sred pa ma yin pa gzhan ying byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/sred pa la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang sred pa yod pa ma yin/sred
376b4('bum): pa med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/len pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/len pa ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/len pa la'ang bya
376b5('bum): chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang len pa yod pa ma yin/len pa med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/srid pa'ang byang chub sems
376b6('bum): dpa' ma yin/srid pa ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/srid pa la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' l-i'ang srid pa
376b7('bum): yod pa ma yin/srid pa med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/skye ba'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/skye ba ma yin pa gzhon yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/
377a1('bum): skyo ba la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa'i la'adu skye ba yod pa ma yin/skye ba med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/
377a2('bum): shi'ang byang chub sems dpa'o ma yin/rga shi ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/rga shi la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems
377a3('bum): dpa' lo'ang rga shi yod pa ma yin/rga shi med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid
377a4('bum): ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa mi yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang gzugs kyi de bzhin
377a5('bum): nyid yod pa ma yin/gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ma
377a6('bum): yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid
377a7('bum): yod pa ma yin/tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid
377b1('bum): ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid
377b2('bum): yod pa ma yin/'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin
377b3('bum): pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa
377b4('bum): ma yin/'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid
377b5('bum): ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' mo yin/rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' ma'adra rnam par shes
377b6('bum): pa'i de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/mig gi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/mig gi de
377b7('bum): bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/mig gi de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang mig gi de
378a1('bum): bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/mig gi de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/rna ba'i de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/rna ba'i
378a2('bum): de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/rna ba'i de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la 'dra rna ba'i
378a3('bum): de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/rna ba'i de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/sna'i de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/sna'i de bzhin nyid ma yin
378a4('bum): pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/sna'i dri bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yid pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang sna'i de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin//
378a5('bum): sna'i de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/lho'i de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/lce'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
378a6('bum): ma yin/lce'i de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'adra lce'i de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/lce'i de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byung //
378a7('bum): chub sems dpa' ma yin/lus kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/lus kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/lus
378b1('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang lus kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/lus kyi de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems
378b2('bum): dpa' ma yin/yid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/yid kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/yid kyi de bzhin nyid
378b3('bum): la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang yid kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/yid kyi de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin
378b4('bum): gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang
378b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin//
378b6('bum): sgro'i de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/sgra'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/sgra'i de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa'
378b7('bum): yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang sgra'i de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/sgra'i de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/dri'i de bzhin nyid kyang byang
379a1('bum): chub sems dpa' ma yin/dri'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/dri'i de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma
379a2('bum): yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang dri'i de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/dri'i de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ro'i de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa'
379a3('bum): ma yin/ro'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ro'i de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa'
379a4('bum): la'ang ro'i de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ro'i de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/reg gi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/reg gi de bzhin
379a5('bum): nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/reg gi de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang reg gi de bzhin
379a6('bum): nyid yod pa ma yin/reg gi de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/chos kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/chos kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin
379a7('bum): pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/chos kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang chos kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa
379b1('bum): ma yin/chos kyi de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/mig gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/mig gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa
379b2('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/mig gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang mig gi khams kyi de
379b3('bum): bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/mig gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/gzugs kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/
379b4('bum): gzugs kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/gzugs kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang
379b5('bum): chub sems dpa' la'ang gzugs kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/gzugs kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/mig gi rnam par
379b6('bum): shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/
379b7('bum): mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de
380a1('bum): bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/rna ba'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang
380a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/rna ba'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/rna ba'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems
380a3('bum): dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang rna ba'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/rna ba'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin//
380a4('bum): sgra'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/sgra'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/sgra'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid
380a5('bum): la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang sgra'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa mi yin/sgra'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub
380a6('bum): sems dpa' ma yin/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khyams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa
380a7('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang
380b1('bum): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa mu yin/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/sna'i khams kyi de bzhin
380b2('bum): nyid nga byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/sna'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/sna'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la 'ang byang chub sems
380b3('bum): dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang sna'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/sna'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa'o ma yin/dri
380b4('bum): khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/dri'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/dri'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang byang
380b5('bum): chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang dri'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/dri'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' mo
380b6('bum): yin/sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin po gzhon yang byang chub sems
380b7('bum): dpa' mi yin/sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa'i yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams
381a1('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/lce'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang
381a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/lce'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/lce'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa'
381a3('bum): yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang lce'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/lce'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ro'i khams
381a4('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ro'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ro'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang
381a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang ro'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ro'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems
381a6('bum): dpa' ma yin/lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khrims kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khrims kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan
381a7('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang lce'i
381b1('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/lus kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid
381b2('bum): kying byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/lus kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/lus kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa'
381b3('bum): yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang lus kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/lus kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/reg bya'i/
381b4('bum): khams kyi de bzhini nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/reg bya'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/reg bya'i khams kyi de bzhin
381b5('bum): nyi la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' lnga'ang reg bya'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yong po ma yin/reg bya'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byu ba
381b6('bum): chub sems dpa' ma yin/lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid mo yin
381b7('bum): po grazhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'
382a1('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa 'dra byang chub sems dpa' mu yin/
382a2('bum): yid kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/yid kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma smon/yid kyi khams kyi de bzhin
382a3('bum): nyi lnga'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang yid kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa mo yin/yid kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang
382a4('bum): chub sems dpa' ma yin/chos kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/chos kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin phra gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/
382a5('bum): chos kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang chos kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/chos kyi khams
382a6('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub semos dpa' ma yin/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/yid kyi rnam par shes bya'i
382a7('bum): khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin//
382b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' la'ang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa'
382b2('bum): ma yin/sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/sa'i khams kyi de bzhin
382b3('bum): nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems
382b4('bum): dpa' ma yin/chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/chu'i khams
382b5('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang
382b6('bum): chub sems dpa' ma yin/me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin//
382b7('bum): mi'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod po ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/me'i khams kyi de bzhin
383a1('bum): nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa
383a2('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpe'i ma yin/rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang rlung gi khams kyi de
383a3('bum): bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin//
383a4('bum): nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/
383a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' la'ang nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/rnam par
383a6('bum): shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/rnam par
383a7('bum): shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la 'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/rnam
383b1('bum): bapar shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa
383b2('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/mo rig pa'i de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid yod pa
383b3('bum): ma yin/mi rig pa'i de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa
383b4('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' lnga'ang 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa
383b5('bum): ma yin/'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid
383b6('bum): ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa'i yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang rnam par shes
383b7('bum): pa'i de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin//
384a1('bum): ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa
384a2('bum): ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/skye
384a3('bum): mched drug gi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/skye mched drug gi de bzhin
384a4('bum): nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid med pa'ang
384a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/reg pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' mo yin/rig pa'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/reg
384a6('bum): po'i de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang reg pa'i de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/reg pa'i de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byung
384a7('bum): chub sems dpa' ma yin/tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/tshor
384b1('bum): ba'i de bzhin nyid la'ang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' la'ang tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid med pa'ang byang chub sems

399a4('bum): sems dpa' la reg gi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/reg gi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/bcom ldan 'das
399a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/de la chos kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgos byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/chos kyi de bzhin
399a6('bum): nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems drapar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/chos kyi dri bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/byang chub
399a7('bum): sems dpa' la chos kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/chos kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis po byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/bcom ldan
399b1('bum): des byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/de la mig gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dper 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/mig
399b2('bum): gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/mig gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la/
399b3('bum): 'khar /byang chub sems dpa' la mig gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/mig gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur
399b4('bum): ba lta'ang ga la mchis/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/de la gzugs kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub
399b5('bum): sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/gzugs kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/gzugs kyi khams
399b6('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/byang chub sems dpa' lo gzugs kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur//gzugs
399b7('bum): kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ong ga la mchis/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na//
400a1('bum): /de la mig gi rnam par shes pa'o khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin
400a2('bum): nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lha'ang ga la mchis/mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis
400a3('bum): bIr yang ga la 'gyur/byang chub sems dpa' la mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang gal 'gyur/mi ga gi rnam par shes pa'i khams
400a4('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid ma chis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/de
400a5('bum): la rna ba'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/rna ba'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems
400a6('bum): drapar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/rna ba'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/byang chub sems dpa' la rna ba'i khams
400a7('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/rna ba'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta 'jig la mchis/bcom ldan 'das byang
400b1('bum): rluchung sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/de la sgra'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba ltag la mchis/sgra'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags/
400b2('bum): pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/sgra'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/byang chub sems dpa' la
400b3('bum): sgra'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang grwa la 'gyur/sgra'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/bcom ldan 'das byang
400b4('bum): chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs ni/de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lcag la mchis//
400b5('bum): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la
400b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/byang chub sems dpa' la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/rna ba'i rnam
400b7('bum): por shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing
401a1('bum): mi dmigs na/de la sna'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lha ga la mchis/sna'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa
401a2('bum): gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'angag la mchis/sna'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/byang chub sems dpa' la sna'i
401a3('bum): khams kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/sna'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/bcom ldan 'das byed
401a4('bum): chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/de la dri'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/dri'i khams
401a5('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/dri'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur//
401a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' la dri'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang grwa la 'gyur/dri'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang gra la mchis
401a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs ni/de la sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgis byang chub sems dpa
401b1('bum): 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'angag la mchis/sna'i rnam par shes pa'i
401b2('bum): khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/byang chub sems dpa' la sku'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur//
401b3('bum): sna rnam par shes pa'i khoms kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchi so/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi
401b4('bum): dmigs na/de la lce'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/lce'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems
401b5('bum): dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/lce'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/byang chub sems dpa' la lce'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid
401b6('bum): mchis par yang ga lnga 'gyur/lce'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchi sngo pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shing tu
401b7('bum): ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/de la ro'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig blo dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ro'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa
402a1('bum): gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'angag la mchis/ro'i khams kyi de ba nin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'brum
402a2('bum): chub sems dpa' la re'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ro'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid mi mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ong ga la
402a3('bum): mchis/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/de la lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgas byang
402a4('bum): chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lto ga la mchis/lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis//
402a5('bum): lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/byang chub sems dpa' la lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin
402a6('bum): nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'angag la mchis/bcom ldan 'das byang chub
402a7('bum): sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/de la lus kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/lus kyi khams
402b1('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/lus kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/byang
402b2('bum): chub sems dpa' la lus kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang gi la 'gyur/lus kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis po byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis//
402b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/de la reg bya'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig blo dwags byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga lnga mchis
402b4('bum): reg bya'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/reg bya'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par
402b5('bum): yang ga la 'gyur/byang chub sems dpa' la reg bya'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/rig bya'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems
402b6('bum): dpar 'gyur ba lta'angag la mchis/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigaso na/de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin
402b7('bum): nyid kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba
403a1('bum): lta'ang ga lnga mchis/lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga lnga 'gyur/byang chub sems dpa'
403a2('bum): la lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid mi mchis pa byang chub sems
403a3('bum): dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/de la yid kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dwags byang
403a4('bum): chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/yid kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/yid kyi khams
403a5('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/byang chub sems dpa' la yid kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur//
403a6('bum): yid kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lto'ang ga la mchis/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi
403a7('bum): dmigs na/de la chos kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/chos kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan
403b1('bum): byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/chos kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/byang chub sems dpa' la chos kyi
403b2('bum): khams kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/chos kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/bcom ldan 'das
403b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta
403b4('bum): gau la mchis/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchi sa/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams
403b5('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/byang chub sems dpa' la yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la
403b6('bum): 'gyur/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
403b7('bum): shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/de la sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma
404a1('bum): lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur//
404a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' la sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang gi la
404a3('bum): mchis/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/de la chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta
404a4('bum): ga la mchis/chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa'
404a5('bum): mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/byang chub sems dpa' la chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang gA la 'gyur/chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid mi mchis pa byang chub sems
404a6('bum): dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/de la me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgas
404a7('bum): byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis me'i khams
404b1('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/byang chub sems dpa' la me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang grwa la 'gyur/me'i khams kyi
404b2('bum): de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/de la rlung gi
404b3('bum): khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba
404b4('bum): lta'ang ga la mchis/rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/byang chub sems dpa' la rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang
404b5('bum): glal 'gyur/rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing
404b6('bum): mi dmigs na/de la nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan/
404b7('bum): byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/nam mkha'i' khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/byang chub sems dpa' la
405a1('bum): nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang
405a2('bum): ga la mchis/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/de la rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgas byang
405a3('bum): chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lte grwa la mchis/rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang gru la mchis/rnam par
405a4('bum): shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/byang chub sems dpa' la rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par
405a5('bum): yang ga la 'gyur/rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
405a6('bum): dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/de la ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ma rig pa'i de bzhin
405a7('bum): nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/byang
405b1('bum): chub sems dpa' lam rig pa'i de bzhin nyid mchis par yang grwa la 'gyur/ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'angag la mchis//bcom/
405b2('bum): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/de la 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/'du byed kyi
405b3('bum): de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems drapar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/byang
405b4('bum): chub sems dpa' la 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang grwa la 'gyur/'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis po byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis//
405b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/de lo rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta grwa la
405b6('bum): mchis/rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dper 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis
405b7('bum): par yang ga la 'gyur/byang chub sems dpa' la rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub
406a1('bum): sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/de la ming dang gzugs kyi de
406a2('bum): bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mches/ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang
406a3('bum): ga la mchis/ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/byang chub sems dpa' lo ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid mchis
406a4('bum): par yang ga la 'gyur/ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang gau la mchis/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu
406a5('bum): ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/de la skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid ma lags
406a6('bum): pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/byang chub sems
406a7('bum): dpa' la skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis//
406b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/de la reg pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/reg pa'i/
406b2('bum): debazhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'adagu la mchis/reg pa'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa'i mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/byang chub sems
406b3('bum): dpa' la reg pa'i de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/reg pa'i dri bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/bcom ldan 'angs byang chub
406b4('bum): sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/de la tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid mo lags
406b5('bum): pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga lnga mchis/tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/byang chub sems dpa' la tshor ba'i
406b6('bum): de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/tshor bu'i de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin
406b7('bum): tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/de la sred pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgos byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/sred pa'i de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan
407a1('bum): byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta'ang ga la mchis/sred pa'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang gA la 'gyur/byang chub sems dpa'

413b7('bum): mtshan ma med pa'i tshig bla dgas yin snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems//
414a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di gzugs smon pa yod pa'i tshig bla dgas yin snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom
414a2('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di gzugs smon pa med pa'i tshig bla dgas yin snyam mam/gsol pa/
414a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di tshor ba smon pa yod pa'i tshig
414a4('bum): bla dgas yin snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/byang chub sems
414a5('bum): dpa' zhes bya ba 'di tshor ba smon pa med pa'i tshig bla dgas yin snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
414a6('bum): rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di 'du shes smon pa yod pa'i tshi ge bu dgas yin snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags
414a7('bum): so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di 'du shes smon pa med pa'i tshig bla dgas yin snyam mam//
414b1('bum): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di 'du
414b2('bum): byed smon pa yod pa'i tshig bla dgas yon snyam mam/gsol pA/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor do ji snyam du sems/
414b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di 'du byed smon pa med pa'i tshig bla dgas yin snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
414b4('bum): stsol pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di rnam par shes pa smon pa yod pa'i tshig bla dgas yin snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan
414b5('bum): 'dus de lta ma lagos so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di rnam par shes pa smon pa med pa'i tshig bla dgas
414b6('bum): yin snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor khyed kyis don gyi dbang 'di nye bar bzung nas 'di skad
414b7('bum): du/gzugs kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' ma yin zhes zer/tshor ba'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' mi yin zhes zer/'du shes kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub
415a1('bum): sems dpa' ma yin zhes zer/'du byed kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' ma yin zhes zer/rnam par shes pa'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' ma
415a2('bum): yin zhes zer/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de gzugs rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de gzugs mi rtag pa'i tshi go bla dgas ma yin/byang
415a3('bum): chub sems dpa'o zhes bya ba de gzugs bde ba'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de gzugs sdug bsngal ba'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/byang chub sems
415a4('bum): dpa' zhes bya ba de gzugs bdag yod pa'i tshig bla dwags ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de gzugs bdag med pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/byang chub sems
415a5('bum): dpa' zhes bya ba de gzugs zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de gzugs ma zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba
415a6('bum): de gzugs stong pa'i tshig bla dwags ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de gzugs mi stong pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba
415a7('bum): de gzugs mtshan ma yod pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/byang chub sems dpa'o zhes bya ba de gzugs mtshan ma med pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' zhes
415b1('bum): bya ba de gzugs smon pa yod pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de gzugs smon pa med pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya
415b2('bum): baM de tshor ba rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de tshor ba mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dwags ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de tshor ba bde ba'i
415b3('bum): tshig bla dgas ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de tshor ba sdug bsngal ba'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de tshor ba bdag yod pa'i tshig
415b4('bum): bla dgas ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de tshor ba bdag med pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de tshor ba zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas ma
415b5('bum): yin/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de tshor po ma zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de tshor ba stong po'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/byang chub
415b6('bum): sems dpa' zhes bya ba de tshor ba mi stong pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de tshor ba mtshan ma yod pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/byang chub sems
415b7('bum): dpa' zhes bya ba de tshor ba mtshan ma med pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de tshor ba smon pa yod pa'i tshig bla dwags ma yin/byang chub sems dpa'
416a1('bum): zhes bya ba de tshor ba smon pa med pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de 'du shes rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/byang chub sems
416a2('bum): dpa' zhes bya ba de 'du shes mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dwags ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de 'du shes bde ba'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba
416a3('bum): de 'du shes sdug bsngal ba'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de 'du shes bdag yod pa'i tshig bla dwags ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de
416a4('bum): 'du shes bdag med pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de 'du shes zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de 'du shes
416a5('bum): ma zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de 'du shes sbyong pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de 'du shes mi stong pa'i tshig bla
416a6('bum): dgas ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de 'du shes mtshan ma yod pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de 'du shes mtshan ma med pa'i tshig bla
416a7('bum): dgas pa yin/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de 'du shes smon pa yod pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de 'du shes smon pa med pa'i tshig bla
416b1('bum): dgas ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de 'du byed rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de 'du byed mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin//
416b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de 'du byed bde ba'i tshig blo dwags ma yin/byang chub sems dpa'o zhes bya ba de 'du byed sdug bsngal pa'i tshig bla dwags ma yin/byang chub sems
416b3('bum): dpa' zhes bya ba de 'du byed bdag yod pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de 'du byed bdag med pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/byang chub sems dpa'
416b4('bum): zhes bya ba de 'du byed zhi bo'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de 'du byed ma zhi ba'i tshi glo bla dgas ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de 'du
416b5('bum): byed stong pa'i tshi ga bla dwags ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de 'du byed mi stong pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de 'du byed mtshan ma yod
416b6('bum): po'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de 'du byed mtshan ma med pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de 'du byed smon pa yod pa'i
416b7('bum): tshig bla dgas ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de 'du byed smon pa med pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/byang chub sems dpa'o zhes bya ba de rnam par shes pa rtag pa'i
417a1('bum): tshig bla dgas ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de rnam par
417a2('bum): shes pa bde ba'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de rnam par
417a3('bum): shes pa bdag yod pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/byang chub sems dpa'o zhes bya ba de rnam par shes pa bdag med pa'i tshig bla dgas mo yin/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya
417a4('bum): ba de rnam par shes pa zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de rnam par shes pa ma zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' zhes
417a5('bum): bya ba de rnam par shes pa stong pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de rnam par shes pa mi stong pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya
417a6('bum): po de rnam par shes pa mtshon ma yod pa'i tshig bla dag so ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/byang
417a7('bum): chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de rnam par shes pa smon pa yod pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de rnam par shes pa smon pa med pa'i tshig bla
417b1('bum): dgas ma yin zhes zer/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gzugs shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/byang chub sems dpa' gzugs kyi tshig bla dgas su 'gyur
417b2('bum): ba lta ga la mchis/bcom ldan 'das tshor ba shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/byang chub sems dpa' tshor ba'i tshig bla dgas su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/bcom ldan
417b3('bum): 'das 'du shes shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/byang chub sems dpa' 'du shes kyi tshig bla dgas su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/bcom ldan 'das 'du byed shin tu ma
417b4('bum): mchis shing mi dmigs na/byang chub sems dpa' 'du byed kyi tshig bla dgas su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa shin tu ma mchis shing mi/
417b5('bum): dmigs na/byang chub sems dpa' rnam par shes pa'i tshig bla dgas su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/bcom ldan 'das rtag pa shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/byang
417b6('bum): chub sems dpa'i gzugs rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/bcom ldan 'das mi rtag pa shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/byang chub sems dpa' gzugs
417b7('bum): mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/bcom ldan 'das rtag pa shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/byang chub sems dpa' tshor ba rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas
418a1('bum): su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/bcom ldan 'das mi rtag pa shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/byang chub sems dpa' tshor ba mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas su
418a2('bum): 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/bcom ldan 'das rtag pa shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/byang chub sems dpa' 'du shes rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas su 'gyur ba lta ga la
418a3('bum): mchis/bcom ldan 'das mi rtag pa shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/byang chub sems dpa' 'du shes mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis//
418a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das rtag pa shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/byang chub sems dpa' 'du byed rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas su 'gyur ba lha ga la mchis/bcom ldan 'das
418a5('bum): mi rtag pa shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/byang chub sems dpa' 'du byed mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/bcom ldan 'das rtag pa shin
418a6('bum): tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/byang chub sems dpa' rnam par shes pa rtag po'i tshig bla dgas su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/bcom ldan 'das mi rtag pa shin tu ma
418a7('bum): mchis shing mi dmigs na/byang chub sems dpa' rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/bcom ldan 'das bde ba shin tu ma mchis
418b1('bum): shing mi dmigs na/byang chub sems dpa' gzugs bde ba'i tshig bla dgas su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal ba shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/byung
418b2('bum): ba sems dpa' gzugs sdug bsngal ba'i tshig bla dgas su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/bcom ldan 'das bde be shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/byang chub sems dpa'
418b3('bum): cher ba bde ba'i tshig bla dgas su 'gyur ba lta gra la mchis/bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal ba shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/byang chub sems dpa' tshor ba sdug bsngal
418b4('bum): ba'i tshig bla dwags su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/bcom ldan 'das bde ba shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/byang chub sems dpa' 'du shes bde ba'i tshig bla dgas su 'gyur
418b5('bum): ba lta ga la mchis/bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal ba shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/byang chub sems dpa'i 'du shes sdug bsngal ba'i tshig bla dgas su 'gyur ba lta ga
418b6('bum): la mchis/bcom ldan 'das bde ba shin tu me mchis shing mi dmigs na/byang chub sems dpa' 'du byed bde ba'i tshig bla dgas su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/bcom ldan
418b7('bum): 'das sdug bsngal ba shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/byang chub sems dpa' 'du byed sdug bsngal ba'i tshig bla dgas su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/bcom ldan
419a1('bum): 'das badre ba shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/byang chub sems dpa' rnam par shes pa bde ba'i tshig bla dgas su 'gyur ba lta gra la mchis/bcom
419a2('bum): ldan 'das sdug bsngal ba shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/byang chub sems dpa' rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba'i tshig bla dgas su 'gyur pa lta ga la mchis/bcom

419a5('bum): 'das bdag shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/byang chub sems dpa' tshor ba bdag mchis pa'i tshig bla dgas su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/bcom ldan 'das bdag
419a6('bum): ma mchis pa shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/byang chub sems dpa' tshor ba bdag ma mchis pa'i tshig bla dgas su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/bcom ldan 'das
419a7('bum): bdag shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/byang chub sems dpa' 'du shes bdag mchis pa'i tshig bla dgas su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/bcom ldan 'das bdage ma mchis
419b1('bum): pa shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/byang chub sems dpa' 'du shes bdag ma mchis pa'i tshig bla dgas su 'gyur ba lta gu la mchis/bcom ldan 'das bdag shin tu

419b5('bum): ma mchis shing mi da mi gros na/byang chub sems dpa' rnam par shes pa bdag ma mchis pa'i tshige bla dgas su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/bcom ldan 'das zhi ba shin
419b6('bum): tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/bcom ldan 'das ma zhi ba shin tu ma mchis shing mi

420a1('bum): sems dpa' tshor ba zhi pa'i tshig bla dgas su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/bcom ldan 'das ma zhi ba shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/byang chub
420a2('bum): sems dpa' tshor ba ma zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas su 'gyur ba lta ka la mchis/bcom ldan 'das zhi bA shin tu mA mchis shing mi dmigs na/byang chub sems dpa'a'

420a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das zhi ba shin tu mi mchis shing mi dmigs na/byang chub sems dpa' rnam par shes pa zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchichis/bcom ldan 'das
420a7('bum): ma zhi ba shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/byang chub sems dpa' rnam par shes pa ma zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/bcom ldan 'das stong pa shin tu
420b1('bum): ma mchis shing ma dmigs na/byang chub sems dpa' gzugs stong pa'i tshig bla dgas su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/bcom ldan 'das mi stong pa shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs

420b3('bum): ba stong pa'i tshig bla dgas su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/bcom ldan 'das mi spyod pa shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/byang chub sems dpa' tshor ba mi stong pa'i tshig bla dgas
420b4('bum): su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/bcom ldan 'das stong pa shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/byang chub sems dpa' 'du shes stong pa'i tshig bla dgas su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis

421a1('bum): na/byang chub sems dpa' rnam par shes pa stong pa'i tshig bla dgas su 'gyur ba lta gA la mchis/bcom ldan 'das mi stong pa shin tu ma mchis shing mi/

421a3('bum): mi dmigs na/byang chub sems dpa' gzugs mtshan ma yod pa'i tshig bla dgas su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/bcom ldan 'das mtshan ma med pa shin tu ma mchis shing
421a4('bum): mi dmigs na/byang chub sems dpa' gzugs mtshan ma med pa'i tshig bla dgas su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/bcom ldan 'das mtshan ma yod pa shin tu ma mchis
421a5('bum): shing mi dmigs ni/byang chub sems dpa' tshor ba mtshan ma yod pa'i tshig bla dgas su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/bcom ldan 'das mtshan ma med pa shin tu ma mchis
421a6('bum): shing mi dmigs na/byang chub sems dpa' tshor ba mtshan ma med pa'i tshig bla dgas su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/bcom ldan 'das mtshan ma yod pa shin tu ma mchis

436a3('bum): su rdzogs par bgyi bar 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
436a4('bum): 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par bgyi bar 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o//de bzhin gshegs
436a5('bum): pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par bgyi bar 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o//mi 'jigs
436a6('bum): pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bgyi bar 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o//so so yang dag par rig
436a7('bum): pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bgyi bar 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o//byams pa chen po
436b1('bum): yongs su rdzogs par bgyi bar 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o//snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par
436b2('bum): bgyi bar 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs
436b3('bum): par bgyi bar 'tshal po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o//byang chub kyi yan lag dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la
436b4('bum): gnas te/bsam gtan dang po las langs nas/'gog pa la mnyam par bzhag pa dang /'gog pa las langs nas/bsam gtan gnyis pa la mnyam par bzhag pa dang /
436b5('bum): bsam gtan gnyis pa las langs nas/'gog pa la mnyam par bzhag pa dang /'gog pa las langs nas/bsam gtan gsum pa la mnyam par bzhag pa dang //
436b6('bum): bsam glatan gsum pa las langs nas/'gog pa la mnyam par bzhag pa dang /'gog pa las langs nas/bsamu gtan bzhi pa la mnyam par bzhag pa dang /bsam
436b7('bum): gtan bzhi pa las langs nas/'gog pa la mnyam par bzhag pa dang /'gog pa las langs nas/byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag pa dang /byams
437a1('bum): pa'i ting nge 'dzin las langs nas/'gog pa la mnyam par bzhag pa dang /'gog pa las langs nas/snying rje'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag pa
437a2('bum): dang /snying rje'i ting nge 'dzin las langs nas/'gog pa la mnyam par bzhag pa dang /'gog pa las langs nas/dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag pa dang /
437a3('bum): dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin las langs nas/'gog pa la mnyam par bzhag pa dang /'gog pa las langs nas/btang snyoms kyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag pa dang /
437a4('bum): btang snyoms kyi ting nge 'dzin las langs nas//'gog pa la mnyam par bzhag pa dang /'gog pa las langs nas/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la mnyam par bzhag pa dang /
437a5('bum): nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las langs nas/'gog pa la mnyam par bzhag pa dang /'gog pa las langs nas/cung zad med pa'i skye mched la mnyam par bzhag pa dang //
437a6('bum): cung zad med pa'i skye mchod las langs nas/'gog pa la mnyam par bzhag pa dang /'gog pa las langs nas/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la mnyam par bzhag
437a7('bum): pa dang /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las langs nas/'gog pa la mnyam par bzhag pa dang /'gog pa las langs nas/'du shes med 'du shes med min
437b1('bum): skye mched la mnyam par bzhag par 'chal pa dang /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las langs nas/'gog pa la mnyam par bzhag par 'chal ba'i byang chub sems
437b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o//song ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems
437b3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o//seng ge rnam par rtse ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa'
437b4('bum): sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgrub par bgyi'o//gzungs kyi sgo dang ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad thob par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
437b5('bum): chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o//dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos

437b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po la bslab par bgyi'o//zla ba'i 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol
438a1('bum): tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o//zla ba'i rgyal mtshan dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/

438a3('bum): sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o//spyan ras gzigs kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems

438b4('bum): 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o//yang dag par 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag par
