518a3('bum): ma lags/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma
518a4('bum): med pa dang smon pa med pa'ang stong pa nyid/stong pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'o//bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs
518a5('bum): des na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med
518a6('bum): pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/de bzhin gshegs pa'i
518a7('bum): stobs bcu la gnas par mi bgyi ste/de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis
518b1('bum): stong ste/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma lags/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams las gud na'ang
518b2('bum): stong pa nyid ma mchis te/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so//bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/byang chub
518b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das gnon yang
518b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/mi 'jigs pa bzhi la gnas par mi bgyi ste/de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das
518b5('bum): ngo ni 'di ltar mi 'jigs pa rnams mi 'jigs pa rnams kyis stong ste/mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang mi 'jigs pa rnams ma lags/mi 'jigs pa
518b6('bum): rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa rnams so//bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/byang chu
518b7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/mi 'jigs pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das gzhan ya phreM nying dub
519a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gnas par mi bgyi ste/de ci'i slad du zhe
519a2('bum): na/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis stong ste/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags
519a3('bum): pa de'ang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma lags/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang stong pa
519a4('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so//bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
519a5('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yong byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol
519a6('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po la gnas par mi bgyi ste/de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar byams pa chen po byams pa
519a7('bum): chen pos stong /snying rje chen po snying rje chen pos stong ste/bcom ldan 'das byams pa chen po'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa dang /snying rje chen po'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang
519b1('bum): byams pa chen po ma lags/de'ang snying rje chen po ma lags/byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/byams pa chen po dang stong rje rgyan po'
519b2('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po'o//bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
519b3('bum): paM la spyod pa'i tshe/byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po la gnas par mi bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol
519b4('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas par mi bgyi ste/de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
519b5('bum): pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ste/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma
519b6('bum): lags/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi
519b7('bum): chos ma 'dres pa rnams so//bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/sangs rgyas kyi
520a1('bum): tshwas ma 'dres pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shesnga rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/
520a2('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/yi ge rnams la gnas par mi bkyi ste/yi ge mngon par bsgrub pa la gnas par mi bgyi/gcig tu brjod pa la gnas par mi bgyi/gnyis su brjod
520a3('bum): pa la gnas par mi bgyi/tha dad du brjod pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar yi ge rnams yi ge rnams kyis sngong ste/yi ge rnams kyi snang
520a4('bum): pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang yi ge rnams ma lags/yi ge rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/yi ge rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang yi ge rnams so//bcom
520a5('bum): ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/yi ge rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o//bcom
520a6('bum): ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi ste/de
520a7('bum): ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong ste/mngon par shes pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa/
520b1('bum): de'ang mngon par shes pa rnams ma lags/mngon par shes pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/mngon par shes pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang mngon par
520b2('bum): shes pa rnams so//bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/mngon par shes pa rnams
520b3('bum): la gnas par mi bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams
520b4('bum): cad la gnas par mi bgyi ste/de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyis stong ste/ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyi stong
520b5('bum): pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams ma lags/ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyang stong pa nyid
520b6('bum): stong pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams so//bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs nges na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
520b7('bum): tshe/ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad la gnas par mi bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das gzhon yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
521a1('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la gnas par mi bgyi ste/de ci'i slad du na no/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams gzungs kyi
521a2('bum): rnams kyis stong ste/gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang gzungs kyi /rnams me legs/garjes kyi sgo rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchi
521a3('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so//bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi
521a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la gnas par mi bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab
521a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gzugs mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs mi rtag pa nyid gzugs
521a6('bum): mi rtag pa nyid kyis stong ste/gzugs mi rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang gzugs mi rtag pa nyid ma lags/gzugs mi rtag pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid
521a7('bum): ma mchis te/gzugs mi rnan pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzugs ma rtag pa nyid do//bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/byang chub sems dpa' sems
521b1('bum): dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gzugs mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o//des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/tshor
521b2('bum): ba mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar tshor ba mi rtag pa nyid tshor ba mi rtag pa nyid kyis stong ste/tshor ba mi rtag pa nyid
521b3('bum): kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang tshor ba mi rtag pa nyid ma lags/tshor ba mi rtag pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/tshor ba mi rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang
521b4('bum): tshor ba mi rtag pa nyid do//bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/tshor ba mi rtag go zhes
521b5('bum): bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o//des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/'du shes mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das
521b6('bum): de ni 'di ltar 'du shes mi rtag pa nyid 'du shes mi rtag pa nyid kyis stong ste/'du shes mi rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang la klas pa de'ang 'du shes myi rtag pa nyid ma lags/'du shes
521b7('bum): mi rtag pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/'du shes mi rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes mi rtag pa nyid do//bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang
522a1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'acha/'du shes mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o//
522a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam po nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa//des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/'du kyang mI rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par
522a3('bum): mi bgyi ste/de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du byed mi rtag pa nyid 'du byed mi rtag pa nyid kyis skyong ste/'du byed mi rtog pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa/
522a4('bum): de'ang 'du byed mi rtag pa nyid ma lags/'du byed mi rtag pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid mi mchis te/'du byed mi rtag pa nyid kyang snying pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed mi rtag pa
522a5('bum): nyid do//bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/'du byed mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas
522a6('bum): par mi bgyi'o//des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam par shes pa mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnos par mi bgyi ste/de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan
522a7('bum): 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid rnam por shes pa mi rtag pa nyid kyis stong ste/rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang rnam par
522b1('bum): shes pa mi rtag pa nyid ma lags/rnam par shes pa mi rtog pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par/
522b2('bum): shes pa mi rtag pa nyid do//bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam par shes pa mi rtag go/
522b3('bum): zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gzugs sdug
522b4('bum): bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid kyis stong ste/gzugs
522b5('bum): sdug bsngal ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid pa lags/gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid la sngo gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/gzugs
522b6('bum): sdug bsngal ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid do//bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes
522b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gzugs sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o//des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//tshor ba sdug
523a1('bum): bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid kyis stong ste//
523a2('bum): tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid grang lags pa de'ang tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid ma lcags/tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/tshor
523a3('bum): ba sdug bsngal ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid do//bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes
523a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/tshor ba sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o//des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/'du shes sdug
523a5('bum): bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnos par mi bgyi ste/de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du shes sdug bsngal ba nyid 'du shes sdug bsngal ba nyid kyis stong ste/
523a6('bum): 'du shes sdug bsngal ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang 'du shes sdug bsngal ba nyid ma lags/'du shes sdug bsngal ba nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis
523a7('bum): te/'du shes sdug bsngal ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du shis sdug bsngal ba nyid do//bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/byang chub sems dpa' sems
523b1('bum): dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga spyod pa'i tshe/'du shes sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o//des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/'du
523b2('bum): byed sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du byed sdug bsngal ba nyid 'du byed sdug bsngal ba nyid kyis stong ste/'du
523b3('bum): byed sdug bsngal ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang 'du byed sdug bsngal ba nyid ma legs/'du byed sdug bsngal ba nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/'du byed sdug
523b4('bum): bsngal ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed sdug bsngal ba nyid do//bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu
523b5('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/'du byed sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o//des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal lo zhes
523b6('bum): bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid rnam por shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid kyis stong ste/rnam
523b7('bum): par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid ma lags/rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid las gud na'ang stong
524a1('bum): pa nyid ma mchis te/rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid do//bcom ldan 'das rnam
524a2('bum): grangs des na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi
524a3('bum): bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gzugs bdag med do zhes bgyi bar gnas
524a4('bum): par mi bgyi ste/de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs bdag med pa nyid gzugs bdag med pa nyid kyis stong ste/gzugs bdag med pa nyid kyi stong pa
524a5('bum): nyid gang lags pa de'ang gzugs bdag med pa nyid mi lags/gzugs bdag med pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/gzugs bdag med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang
524a6('bum): gzugs bdag med pa nyid do//bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs desnga na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gzugs
524a7('bum): bdag med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o//des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/tshor ba bdag med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/de ci'i slad du
524b1('bum): zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar tshor ba bdag med pa nyid tshor ba bdag med pa nyid kyis stong ste/tsherab bdag med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang tshor ba bdag med pa nyid
524b2('bum): ma lags/tshor ba bdag med pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/tshor ba bdag med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba bdag med pa nyid do//bcom ldan pa
524b3('bum): rnam grangs des na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/tshor ba bdag med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o//des
524b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/'du shes bdag med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du shes bdag med
524b5('bum): pa nyid 'du shes bdag med pa nyid kyis stong ste/'du shes bdag med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang 'du shes bdag med pa nyid ma lags/'du shes bdag med pa nyid las
524b6('bum): gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/'du shes bdag med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes bdag med pa nyid do//bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/byang chub sems
524b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/'du shes bdag med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o//des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
525a1('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/'du byed bdag med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du byed bdag med pa nyid 'du byed
525a2('bum): bdag med pa nyid kyis stong ste/'du byed bdag med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang 'du byed bdag med pa nyid me lags/'du byed bdag med pa nyid las gud na'ong
525a3('bum): stong pa nyid ma mchis te/'du byed bdag med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed bdag med pa nyid do//bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/byang chub sems dpa'
525a4('bum): sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/'du byed bdag med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o//des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
525a5('bum): pa'i tshe/rnam par shes pa bdag med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid rnam por
525a6('bum): shes pa bdag med pa nyid kyis stong ste/rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid ma lags/rnam par shes pa
525a7('bum): bdag med pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid do//bcom ldan
525b1('bum): 'das rnam grangs des na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam par shes pa bdag med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o//
525b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das gzhan yod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lo spyod pa'i tshe/gzugs zhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/de ci'i slad
525b3('bum): du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs zhi ba nyid gzugs zhi ba nyid kyis stong ste/gzugs zhi bo nyid kyi stong pa nyid gung lags pa de'ang gzugs zhi ba nyid ma lags/
525b4('bum): gzugs zhi ba nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/gzugs zhi ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzugs zhi ba nyid do//bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/byang chub
525b5('bum): snyoms dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gzugs zhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o//des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pA li
525b6('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/tshor ba zhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar tshor bzhi pa nyid tshor bzhi pa nyid kyis stong ste/tshor bzhis
525b7('bum): nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang tshor ba zhi ba nyid ma lags/tshor ba zhi pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/tshor bzhi pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba
526a1('bum): zhi ba nyid do//bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/tshor bzhi'o zhes
526a2('bum): bgyi bar gnas par ma bgyi'o//des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/'du shes zhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de
526a3('bum): ni 'di ltar 'du shes zhi ba nyid 'du shes zhi ba nyid kyis stong ste/'du shes zhi ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang 'du shes zhi ba nyid ma lags/'du shes zhi ba nyid las/
526a4('bum): gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/'du shes zhi ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes zhi ba nyid do//bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/byang chub sems dpa'
526a5('bum): sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/'du shes zhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o//des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spod pa'i tshe/
526a6('bum): 'du byed zhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du byed zhi ba nyid 'du byed zhi ba nyid kyis stong ste/'du byed zhing nyid
526a7('bum): kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang 'du byed zhi ba nyid ma lags/'du bye zhi ba nyid las sung na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/'du byed zhi ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du
526b1('bum): byang zhi ba nyid do//bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs dris na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/'du byed zhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas/
526b2('bum): por mi bgyi'o//des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam par shes pa zhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di
526b3('bum): ltar rnam par shes pa zhi ba nyid rnam par shes pa zhi ba nyid kyis stong ste/rnam par shes pa zhi ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang rnam par shes pa zhi ba nyid ma lags/rnam
526b4('bum): par shes pa zhi ba nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/rnam par shes pa zhi ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa zhi ba nyid do//bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs
526b5('bum): des na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam parang zhes pa zhi'o zhes ba gyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o//bcom ldan

526b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs stong pa nyid gzugs stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/gzugs stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang gzugs stong pa nyid ma legs
527a1('bum): gzugs stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/gzugs stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzugs stong pa nyid do//bcom ldan 'das
527a2('bum): rnam grangs des na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gzugs stong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o//des shes

527a4('bum): nyid kyis stong ste/tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang tshor ba stong pa nyid ma lags/tshor ba stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/tshor ba stong pa

528a1('bum): pa nyid ma lags/rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid las gung na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes
528a2('bum): pastong pa nyid do//bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam par shes pa stong

528a4('bum): mtshan ma med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs mtshan ma med pa nyid gzugs mtshan mo med pa nyid kyis stong

531a1('bum): pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa smon pa med pa nyid do//bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes

531b1('bum): gang lags pa dong tshor ba dpon pa nyid ma lags/tshor ba dpon pa nyid las gud na 'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/tshor byang dpon pa nyid rgyu spyod pa nyid spyong rkyod kya tshor ba dan du /

531b6('bum): chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/'du shes dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o//des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/'du byed
531b7('bum): dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du byed dben pa nyid 'du byed dben pa nyid kyis stong ste/'du byed dben pa nyid
532a1('bum): kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang 'du byed dben pa nyid ma lags/'du byed dben pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/'du byed dben pa nyid kyang stong pa
532a2('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed dben pa nyid do//bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs nges na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/'du byed
532a3('bum): dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o//des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam par shes pa dben no zhes bgyi bar gan sngo par mi bag+h+nAM ste/de ci
532a4('bum): slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid kyi stong ste/rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang ljags
532a5('bum): pa de'ang rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid ma lags/rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong
532a6('bum): pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid do//bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
532a7('bum): rnam par shes pa dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/
532b1('bum): pa'i tshe/de bzhin nyid la gnas par mi bgyi skye/de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar de bzhin nyid de bzhin nyid kyis stong ste/de bzhin nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags
532b2('bum): pa de'ang de bzhin nyid ma lags/de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/de bzhin nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin nyid do//bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des
532b3('bum): na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/de bzhin nyid la gnas par mi bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems
532b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/chos nyid la gnas par mi bgyi ste/de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar chos nyid chos
532b5('bum): nyid kyis stong ste/chos nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang chos nyid ma lags/chos nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/chos nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos
532b6('bum): nyid do//bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/chos nyid la gnas par mi bgyi'o//bcom
532b7('bum): ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/chos kyi dbyings la gnas par mi bgyi ste/de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom
533a1('bum): ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings chos kyi dbyings kyis stong ste/chos kyi dbyings kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/chos kyi
533a2('bum): dbyings las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/byang chub sems
533a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po la spyod pa'i tshe/chos kyi dbyings la gnas par mi bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems

533a5('bum): med pa nyid chos skyon med pa nyid kyis stong ste/chos skyon med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang chos skyon med pa nyid ma lags/chos skyon med pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa
533a6('bum): nyid ma mchis te/chos skyon med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos skyon med pa nyid do//bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
533a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/chos skyon med pa nyid la gnas par mi bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
533b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas par mi bgyi ste/de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar yang dag pa'i mtha' yang dag pa'i

533b3('bum): nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang yang dag pa'i mtho'//bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod

533b5('bum): mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/gzugs la gnas na de gzugs mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
533b6('bum): pa la mi spyod do//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mi mkhas pas bdog tu bgyi ba dang
